210b2(rgyud 'grel): srang ma der mdzad pa'o// sku mdog sngar bi/ g.yas na rin po che myu gu 'dzin pa/ g.yon na bum pa bkang ba bsnams pa'o// rgya yul gyi nI sa na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po de ni rgya nag po'i yul na gnas pa'o// phrag
210b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mig ces bya ba ni mdzod ldan na ni spyan dang gnas zhes bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas pa spyan gnyis si bdag gi tshul du gnas pa'o// de gnyis kha dog ni nag po dang dmar po ste/ de gnyis kyi g.yas pa na 'khor lo dang
210b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyug to'o// g.yon na sbrul zhigs bstims pa'o// ka lo ka na mtsho ba rkang zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram lho phyogs na pha brang gser yul gyi dbus na/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gnod sbyin dmar skya'o// g.yas na ral gyi g.yon na ma
210b5(rgyud 'grel): mgo bsnams pa'o// dkyil 'khor bsten dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi dbus na gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor can gnas pa/ de yang sku mdog dkar po g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// ga pu sha na la~M ka'i bdag
210b6(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho nub mtshams na gnas pa'o// gnod sbyin de ni mgrin pa bcu pa/ zhal gcig ni rta mchog gi dbu lta bu'o// phyag brgyad pa sku mdog mthing ka/ g.yas rnams na ral gri mnga' 'khor lo// gasngon zhags pa
211a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu/ tha ma gnyis na pi wang bsgyur ba'o// 'od can dga' ba'i tshang tshing na zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi lho phyogs na ko'u ri Na ya ka'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal na gnod sbyin sku mdog dkar po// g.yas na ut+pa la g.yon
211a2(rgyud 'grel): na nor gyi rgyal bu bsnams pa'o// nam mkha' srung na chos skyong ba zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi lho phyogs gser yul na phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa/ g.yas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu ti/ g.yon na me tog pad+ma bsnams pa'o//
211a3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa chen po dam pa zhes bya ba ni de'i byang phyogs na gnod sbyin kha dog dmar po g.yas pad+ma dmar po g.yon bum gong ba bsnams pa'o// rnam thos bu yi bu dpal ldan// rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i bu zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa
211a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin rnams kyi rgyal po byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams skyong ba sems can rnams kyi don byed pa pho brang lhung lo can la mnga' mdzad pa/ phyag gnyis pa sku mdog gser gyi mdog can/ g.yas na rin po che bdun gyi myu gu/ g.yon
211a5(rgyud 'grel): na bum pa nor gyis gang ba rin po che sna bdun gyi khri la bzhugs pa// gnod sbyin bye bas yang bskor cing / tho gar gyi ni yul na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang na dpal ldan rnam thos sras ni gnod sbyin gyi rigs mi gcig pa
211a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing / na mkha' la nya'i zla skar mas bskor ba bzhin du'o// 'gror bcas ri dang gangs can dag ces bya ba ni yul ba ra tA si'i nub phyogs na/ chu bo gang+gA dang sin+d+hu gnyis 'dus pa'i sa na/ gnod sbyin chen po
211b1(rgyud 'grel): de gnas so// de'i kha dog ni sngo skya/ zhal gcig phyag drug pa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ de 'og gnyis na rtse gsum dang mchod sbyin/ g.yon gnyis na phreng ba dang bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o// spyan gsum pa glang la
211b2(rgyud 'grel): zhon po// sin d+hu yi ni rgya mtshor gnas zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs kyi phyi'i rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa gnod sbyin de'i kha dog ni dkar po sbrul gyi zhags pa dang rin po che'i myu gu bsnams pa'o// grong khyer gsum na rtse gsum lag
211b3(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa stong sa bla gsum na gnas pa gnod sbyin legs ldan thal ba'i mdog can phyag g.yas na rtse gsum g.yon na phreng ba bsnams pa'o// ka li ka na rab 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgya bar dbus na gnod sbyin kha dog
211b4(rgyud 'grel): nag po gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// tshigs lnga ser po 'gro lding na zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs na gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po phyag na bum pa gsar gyis bkang ba bsnams pa'o// siM ka li na nor gyi bdag tsa so bya ba ni
211b5(rgyud 'grel): sing+ga'i gshol mnga'i yul phyi'i rgya mtsho'i tshal na gnod sbyin de gnas pa kha dog gur kAm gyi mdog can phyag g.yas no rin po che'i snod dang / gser gyi rgyal bu bsnams pa'o// ne co bzhin ni 'brog gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
211b6(rgyud 'grel): gdan gyi nags tshal chen po na gnod sbyin kha dog dmar nago phyag na ral gri zhags pa'o// 'gro 'am ci ni 'og na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gnas ni sa 'og 'gro 'am ci ni ming kha dog ni sngo sangs phyag g.yas na sbrul zhags g.yon dung
212a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// smad sbrul lo// pad+ma dkar po'i 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ni/ de ni gzugs khams na gnas pa ste/ de'i kha dog ni dkar po/ g.yas na phreng ba/ g.yon na bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o// grong khyer chen po brtse ba
212a2(rgyud 'grel): can zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnod sbyin chen po gnas pa'o// kha dog ser mo/ g.yas na skyabs sbyin g.yon rdo rje bsnams pa'o// 'jigs pa sbyin na rab 'jigs pa/ zhes bya ba ni lho nub mtshams phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram laM ka pu ri
212a3(rgyud 'grel): nag gnod sbyin thal ba'i mdog can g.yas ral gri g.yon nags pa bsnams pa'o// chu dang ldan na dmar ser gnas zhes bya ba ni/ ma dros kyi 'tsho 'gram na gnod sbyin chen po gnas pa ni sku mdog dkar po phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa dang pad+ma
212a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// ba bang bskyed pa ba ta zhes bya ba ni/ bal yul gyi byang phyogs na chu dag kyi nags gseb na gnod sbyin kha dog ljang nag phyag bzhi pa g.yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang a 'bras/ g.yon gnyis na dbyug to dang dung bsnams
212a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// 'dod pa sbyin na ma ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi byang phyogs na gnod sbyin 'dod pa zhes bya bo gnas te/ 'dod pa'i lha mo lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas na 'dod pa'i mdu' lnga bsnams pa/ g.yon na me tog gi gzhu
212a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// nyi'i rgyal mtshan dang chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'o// bu mo 'jug na ri ba bsad pa zhes bya ba ni/ ba ra NA si'i shar phyogs na seng ge lha'i yul du gnas pa'i gnod sbyin seng ge gnas pa'o// gzugs ni seng ge'i
212b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su snang ba'o// ga pu sha na nal ku bar zhes bya ba ni de'i shar phyogs bal yul dang / rgya gar gyi so mtshams na/ gnod sbyin chen po khyi'i gzugs su snang ba'o// pha rol mnga' med rdul chu na zhes bya ba ni/ rgya nag po'i shar
212b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gshin rje'i 'dam gseb na/ gnod sbyin kha dog dmar po phyag na me sgron dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o// nus pa'i gnas na zhi byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+ha'i byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gdong zhes bya ba'i gnas na gnod
212b3(rgyud 'grel): sprin chen po kha dog nag po dbyug to dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o// pa la ba na thang bzangs ris zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi byang phyogs na gnod sbyin lha ma yin bya ba gnas te kha dog dmar nag phyag na 'khor lo dang dbyug to bsnams
212b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ka ta ka na dmar ser po zhes bya ba ni/ sing+ga la'i shar phyogs na/ gnod sbyin kha dog gur kum 'dra ba/ phyag na rtse gcig dang zhags po rnams pa'o// 'phral ris 'phel na bzhin rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni/ nub phyogs kyi rgya
212b5(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i 'gram na gnod sbyin mgon po zhes bya ba gnas so// zhal bcu gcig pa thol ba'i mdog can phyag bcu gnyis pa/ dang po gnyis na mnga' gzhu/ de'i 'og g.yas pa rnams na 'khor lo dang dbyug to dang thod pa dang dgra sta
212b6(rgyud 'grel): dang rtse gsum pa/ g.yon pa rnams na zhags pa dang rin po che dang / ut+pal dang dung bsnams pa'o// skyon yul na ma rungs pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi dbus kyi nub phyogs na gnod sbyin chen po kha dog mthing nag/ gri gug dang
213a1(rgyud 'grel): thod pa bsnams pa'o// thong ga shol ngan na bum lto bo zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+hA'i shwar phyogs na/ gnod sbyin bum pa'i lto can bzhin mi sdug pa/ dud ka'i mdog can phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o//
213a2(rgyud 'grel): chu srin rgyal mtshan mya ngan dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+ha'i sa mtshams na 'dod chen zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gnas te/ sku mdog thal ba'i mdog can/ phyag gnyis na mnga' gzhu bsnams pa'o// sna tshogs sde ni bo ga na zhes bya ba ni lho
213a3(rgyud 'grel): nub mtshoms na gnod sbyin kha dog ljang gu/ phyag gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyug to bsnams pa'o// dga' dang ldan na sgra sgrogs bu zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi yul byang shar mtshams ni/ gnod sbyin thos grags ni sku mdog sor po phyag
213a4(rgyud 'grel): na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o// phung po'i bdag po dmar sar po zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs ka ma ru na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin kha dog dkar po phyag g.yas na phreng ba bsnams pa'o// g.yon no bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o// chung
213a5(rgyud 'grel): ma can na mthong dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yul ko ka nA'i shar phyogs ni gnod sbyin stobs ldan gnas pa ni/ kha dog dmar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal ba'i khab ces bya ba ni// rgyal po'i khab kyi lho ngas no//
213a6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin chu srin gyi mgo can gnas te/ sa bdag gi tshul du yod pa/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / sdigs mdzub bsnams pa'o// yang pa na ni gnas pa ste/ 'bum phrag dog ni mang po yi// zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin 'du ba mang po gnas
213b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnams khyab pa'o// gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ rgyal po chen po bka' las mi mnga' ba'o// ba lang skyong ba sbrul dug na//
213b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni rgya gar gyi nub ngos na/ sbrul gyi yul na gnas pa/ gnod sbyin pa lang gi mgo can/ phyag na dbyug to dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o// lcang lo'i grong na lcang lo pa zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos sras kyi grong na lus ngan po gnas te/ sku
213b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang gu g.yas na ral gri g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa'o// dga' ba'i grong na dga' ba can zhes bya ba ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa ni gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin ma
213b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// grong gi lha sa ni stobs can gnas bya ba ni/ lhung lo can gyi gnas ni lha dzaM b+ha la gnas pa sku mdog ser po g.yas na a r-i pu ra/ g.yon na ne'u le'i rgyal pa bsnams pa'o// lha las babs na rnam thos bu/
213b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sde ni yongs su skyong zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi khyim srung zhing gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon du mar gnas pa/ de rnams skyong zhing dbang mdzad pa'o// lcang lo can na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin bye bas kun nas bskor zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen
213b6(rgyud 'grel): po rnam thos kyi bu yang gnod sbyin thams cad kyi ded dpon pho brang lcang lo can la gnod sbyin du ma bye ba mang pos bskor te/ rgyal po'i bka' las mi mnga' ba lngar bshad pa'i/ gnod sbyin rnams rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor du gnas
214a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gnod sbyin de dag rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa stengs bla gsum du skad cig mas rgyu ba'o// sde che ba zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mi gcig pa mang po 'dus pas te/ de rnams kyang mi mthun pa med pa'o//
214a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs tsha ba zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab bdun kyang skul nus pa'o// pha rol gyi dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni stobs che ba dgra rnams kyis mi thub pa/ lha ma yin gyis grong khyer rlag par byed pa'o// thub par dka' zhing gzhan gyis mi thub
214a3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs dang ldan pa che bar sprul pa'i dus su ri rab pas tsha bar sprul pa/ chung ba ni rdul phra rab tsam du sprul nus pa'o// rdzu 'phrul dang zhes bya ba ni/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan te/ skad cig thang cig/
214a4(rgyud 'grel): gis stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa/ gnod byed dang phan byed byas pa'o// 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ so so'i kha dog gis 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'o// kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ nag po dkar po dmar po ljang
214a5(rgyud 'grel): gu la sogs pa'o// rang rang gi rigs kyi kha dog snang ba'o// grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams na grags pa'o// lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyis stobs
214a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed de/ la la lha ma yin gyi ngos nas so// la la lha'i phyogs nas so// rdzu 'phrul chen po dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs su sprul pa/ lho dang lha ma yin gyi yul na rtsod par byed pa/
214b1(rgyud 'grel): mi'i yul na yang de bzhin no// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces byas pa ni/ rig sngags 'di la mos pa'i gang zag ni/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag gis kyang bsrung ba dang skyob par
214b2(rgyud 'grel): byas shing phyi ma la yang bsrung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni/ mtshon cha dang mtshon byed gnyis dang ldan zhes mtshon pa ni shes rab ste mtshon byed pa ni rig sngags so// de gnyis med pa'i rig pa na mkha' lta bur gnas pa stong
214b3(rgyud 'grel): bar snang ba'o// stong pa'i nang na me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu/ 'jig rten khams sgyu ma lta bu'o// de'i 'od kyis snying rje dang byams pas khyab pa'o// de'i rang bzhin rig stegs ni zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa/ sku mdog ma'ing
214b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang po khro mo// g.yas dkar ba nI zhi ba/ g.yon dmar ba 'dzum pa/ rgyab sar ba ni sgeg pa'i tshul lo zhal re re la thod pa lnga lngas brgyan po/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra ser paM gyen du 'bar ba/ dbu la rdo rjes mtshon pa/ ye shes lnga
214b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pa rnams ni/ ral gri dang rdo rje dang / mdung shing / lcags kyu dang / rtse gsum dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa/ g.yon pa rnams ni/ zhags pa/ rma bya'i sgo/ dgra sta/ rin po che/ pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o//
214b6(rgyud 'grel): zhab se g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pas mnan pa ni/ gnod sbyin pho mo mnan pa/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o// sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni// sngar bshad pa bzhin no// tad+ya bya zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags de'i snying ka
215a1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ hUM gi yi ges 'od zer 'phros te/ de'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcom nas/ gnod byed rnams gsang sngags re res
215a2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms te/ sngags re re dang 'od zer re res khro bo bcur sprul pa'o// khro bo bcu ni hUM mdzad dang dbyug pa sngon po dang / gshin rje gshed po/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ rta mgrin dang / mi g.yo mgon po/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba
215a3(rgyud 'grel): dang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / stobs po che'o// 'di lta ste ni 'og ma bzhin du'o// 'og ma'i sngags kyis khro bo dkar po dang / nag po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / mthing nag dang / dmar po dang / sngo skya dang / ljang gu dang /
215a4(rgyud 'grel): ljang nag dang / mthing dkar gnas pa'o// de'i phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas rdo rje tho ba g.yon phur bu bsnams pa'o// zhabs phur pa'i rang bzhin du yod pa/ de bzhin du na mkha'i khams su spros pa'o// shar phyogs kyi khro bo'i sngags ni a ka
215a5(rgyud 'grel): te bi ka te la sogs pa'o// bdag ni mi mdza' ba rnams zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor lo bcur bris la/ drang po'i sbyin sreg gis bsregs par bya'o// 'khor lo'i nang du gang mi mdza' ba'i ming rus bris la/ hA na ha na bcu po rtsi bas la bkong la
215a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gsang sngags mu khyud la dgod par bya'o// 'khor lo de dril la gnyan pa'i sar mnan no// des grub par 'gyur ro// bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ ras sam shing shun nam/ ming rus bris la bsreg par bya'o//
215b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni da ha da ha la sogs pa gdol bar bya'o// 'di ni shar phyogs kyi khro bo'i yin no// bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams zhes bya ba ni 'byung po 'am gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo rtsibs bcu tham pa byis la/ rtsibs re re la pa tsa pa tsa zhes byu ba
215b2(rgyud 'grel): bris la/ dbus su ming rus+yA taM b+ha ya btags la bri'o// mu khrung la sngar bshad pa'i sngags bris la/ lam rgya gram mam mchod rten chen po 'am dur khrod mnan par bya'o// sngags kyang pa tsa pa tsa la sogs pa'o// de ni byung shar mtshams kyi khro ba'i
215b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags so// gzhan yang mi mthun pa 'thung po 'am smad pa'i 'dod pa snga ma bzhin du 'khor lo bris nas sgo n+ya ra mAnan ta 'byung ba'i sar ro// gzing ba'i sngags sbyong ba'i sngags naM u tsa ta ya d+hu d+hA la sogs pa'o// lha'i'o// bdag la mA~M phan d+ha
215b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad drag po'i sbyin sreg byas la/ 'byung po dang bkra po rnams la thun mong gi rdzas rnams gtor la sregs par bya'o// sngags ni he ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa nA lho nubag+hi'o// dza ti dza tI zhes bya ba ni nub kyi khro bo'o//
215b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi dgra bo rnams zhes bya ba ni dgra bo dang 'byung po rnams yid gAb+his nas bsreg pa'o// nA shrA ya zhes bya ba ni drag po'i gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o// tsu lu tsu lu zhes bya ba ni nub byung gi'o// hi li hi li zhes bya ba ni byang gi'o// mi li mi la
215b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni byang shar gyi'o// phu ru phu ru la sogs pa ni 'og gi'o// tsi ti tsi ti la sogs pa ni steng gi bcing bar bya'o// bdag gi dgra bo rnams nA sha ya zhes bya ba ni 'byung po dang dgra bo rnams bsregs nas/ sngags de rnams kyi bskrad par byas nas/
216a1(rgyud 'grel): ming rus btags nas brdungs pa'i gsang sngags so// 'dis kyang nad thams cad sel ba'o// hig ge mI ge la sogs pa ni/ rig sngags kyi snying po'o// gzhan thams cad la bsrung sar bya'o// bdag la bsrung ba gyis
216a2(rgyud 'grel): shig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ gang zag 'di la gus par byas na rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gnod sbyin de rnams kyis kyang srung bar byed de/ ngam 'ams ni grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i
216a3(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi gnas skab la #// / kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thung pas sems can gyi don la bka' stsal po// khyod kyis gang dag phyogs bcu bsrung zhing yongasu
216a4(rgyud 'grel): skyong bar byed pa gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po dag gi ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bsrung ba gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa grags pa dang kha dog tu ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang
216a5(rgyud 'grel): mo yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o// shar phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen gang dag shar phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa
216a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis gus par byed pa 'am/ yi ge gcig tsam yod par gyur na/ shar phyogs kyi gnod sbyin de rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin rnams lta ba'o// ring po dang / mig mi
216b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang dang / ser skya'o// zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi kha dog dang phyag mtshan ni dkaR+Sha bo dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dmar po'o// phyag mtshan ni rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma'o// g.yon na yang rim pa bzhin du mdungs dang /
216b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum mo// gnod sbyin bzhi po de rnams ni/ zhi ba'i tshul du gnas pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni// rjes su
216b3(rgyud 'grel): yi rang zhing bton pa tsam gyis kyang / nung thams cad bral zhing 'jigs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro sde ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi kun dga' bo la gsungs
216b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// lho phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po/ gang dag lho phyogs skyong zhing srung bar byed pa bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag kyang gzi brjid che bo/ stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul
216b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa'o// 'di lta s+t+wa~M zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po blta ba'o// seng ge dang nye ba'i seng ge dang / dung can dang / dga' bo zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po de ni/ mthu che ba/ rig sngags kyi bka'
216b6(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'da' ba ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser po dang nag po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o// de'i phyag mtshan rin po che dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang ral gri'o// g.yon rnams ni/ mnga' gzhu dang gtun shing dang lcags kyu
217a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// gnod sbyin de dag ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa'i gzugs su gnas pa/ khro bor snang ba'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni
217a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zag bdag gis rgya cher bstan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / yi ge gcig tsam klog par gyur pas kyang gnang sbyin bzhi pos lho phyogs su skyong ba dang / bsrung bar 'gyur ro// sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par
217a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong sa ri don dang sems can rnams kyi don la bka' stsal ba'o// nub phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ bzhi gnas te zhes bya ba
217a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba/ gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin
217a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po nub kyi ngos kyi bizhi blta ba'o// seng ge dang / seng ge'i ral pa dang / bla ma dang ser skya'o// zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni rig sngags kyi bka' las mi mnga' ba ste/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan nI/ dmar ba dang /
217a6(rgyud 'grel): nag po dang / dkar po/ ljang gu'o g.yas rnams na/ pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri'o// g.yon pa rnams na rtse gcig dang / te ma ra dang / 'phang mdung dang mdung rings bsnams pa'i// gnod sbyin de rnams ni mthu che zhing
217b1(rgyud 'grel): cung zad khro bar gnas pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis lus ngag yid kyi mos par byas nas bdag gi nad mdze la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro//
217b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa dang / kha don byed pa la sogs pa byas par gyur na/ nad de da ltar yang mi 'byung ste/ tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no// sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po dag gis kyang bsrung ba dang / skyob par 'gyur ro// gzhan
217b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa ni gong nas shes pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi don du gsungs pa'o// byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag byang phyogs skyong zhing yongs su srung bar byed pa
217b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni blo de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ zhes bya ba bzhi po dag gis kyang gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa ldan pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu
217b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lham yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o// de dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin chen po rnam kyis rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po bzhi po dag byang ngos nas
217b6(rgyud 'grel): lta'o// 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin dga' ba dang / brtson skyong dang / khyab 'jug gi zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin po bzhi po de dag ni/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang nag dang / nag po dang / ser
218a1(rgyud 'grel): po dang / dkar po'o// g.yas rnams ni ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / 'khor lo'o// g.yon pa rnams na zhags pa dang / dag+na sta dang / rtse gsum mo// mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o// gnod sbyin chen po de dag ni khro bor
218a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa gsum pa che ba sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig bya ba ni gang zag gis gus par byas na sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/
218a3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gcig ma klog par byed na/ gus pa dang bcas pas mtshan nas brjod par bya ste/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag gis kyang da ltar yang srung bar byed pa dang / tshe phyi ma la yang srung bar byed pa'o// sba ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar
218a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems can gyi don du bka' stsal pa'o// gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag phyogs mtshams na gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni shar lho
218a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / lho nu dang / nub byang dang / byang shar mtshams na gnas pa'o// gang dag phyogs mtshams bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag sto zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa srung ba ste/
218a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste/ gnod sbyin de dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa/ zag sa dang ma ga lang ba 'an pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyis g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag
218b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mtshams na lta'o// lnga spyod dang tshigs lha ser po dang / ri mnyam dang / gser can no zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / mthu chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag
218b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / dmarA ba~M dang / ljang gu'o// phyag g.yas rnams na pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal ser po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ut+pa la sngon po'o// g.yon rnams na 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug to dang // ral
218b3(rgyud 'grel): mi rnams so// gnod sbyin bzhi po de yang rim bzhin du zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ drag po dang ldan pa/ khro bo dang ldan pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag
218b4(rgyud 'grel): gang gis 'di la gus por byed na/ rje su yi rang ba tsam dang / lus ngag yid kyis gus pa tsam gyis kyang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon de rnams kyis/ yang dag par bsrung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro// sba ba la sogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/
218b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin de rnams kyis 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbed pa'o// de rnams kyi bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po// gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag sa la
218b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ gang dag srung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pa bzhi po 'di dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ sems cad thams cad kyi don byed pa/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag ni gzi brjid che ba/
219a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang ldan pa grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong ba byed pa dag go// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin bzhi po sa la gnas pa ltar
219a2(rgyud 'grel): ronas pa dang shin tu sa pa dang nag po dang nye nag po dang zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing 'og nas srung bar byed pa'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser po dang dmar po dang nag po dang / dmar nag gi
219a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog go// g.yas rnams na rin po che dang pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri'o// g.yon rnams na mdung dang / zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta rnams so// bzhi po 'di dag gis kyang sa yongs su bsrung zhing / sems can rnams la don byed pa'o//
219a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gang dag gis 'di la mos shing chos byed pa dang / srung ba btags pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / yongs su bzung bar gyur na/
219a5(rgyud 'grel): sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / sa bdag rnams kyi 'jigs pa la sogs pa yang dag par srungs shig/ da ltar dang phye mar yang srung bar 'gyur ro// sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gsang ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis
219a6(rgyud 'grel): srung bar 'gyur te/ de rnams kyi bshad pa ni gong ma bzhin no// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal ba'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag par snang la gnas pa te zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag
219b1(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ steng gi ngos na gnas pa'o// gang dag par snang bsrung zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che ba grags pa ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/
219b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnong sbyin chen po bzhi po 'di dag par snang la blta'o// nyi ma dang zla ba dang me dang rlung ngo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba
219b3(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / sngon po dang / dmar nag gi mdog go phyag g.yas rnams na pad+ma dmar po dkar bya ba dan dang me sbyar ba bsnams pa'o// g.yon rnams na 'khor lo// dgra sta rtse gsum ba rtse ga
219b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams pa'o// gnod sbyin de dag par snang la yongs su bsrung zhing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sdigs kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis kyang bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang gis rig sngags kyi
219b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la gus par byas na/ lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / ser ba la sogs pa yang yul der 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ 'jigs pa gzhan yang mi 'thung ba'o// sba ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa dang nang thams cad las
219b6(rgyud 'grel): thar par byas pa'o// yongasu skyong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mngal nas btsas ka dang / btsas ma thag tu skyes nas kyang ma shi bar du skyong ba'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po dang / nad rnams dang / sdug bsngal rnams
220a1(rgyud 'grel): las bsgrub pas so// yongs su bzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i mun pa spangs nas/ dge ba la sbyor ba'o// zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni drag po'i tshul du gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde legs su
220a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid bde ba ste/ 'dis nus pas lus ngag yid bde bar byed pa'o// chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i chad pa spang ba'o// mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ yul
220a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbus sam/ rkun ma 'am/ chom rkun nam/ de rnams kyi mtshon cha spang ba'o// dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsdang ba'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug dang / byed pa'i dug gsum gzhil ba'o// dug gsum pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dug
220a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum po de dag kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ lus la zhugs pa thams cad kyang 'joms par byed pa'o// mtshams cad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyis bcing ba'i sar/ gzhan rnams kyis brgal brir
220a5(rgyud 'grel): mi nus so// sa bcing ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ des bcing ba'i sar sa g.yo ba drag po byung bas kyang 'gul mi nus twe de na yod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gnod par mi nus so// lo brgya lon pa zhes bya ba ni/ nad thams cad dang bral zhing
220a6(rgyud 'grel): bcud len gyi rang bzhin du rgas pa med pa'o// ston brgya mthong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ nor phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis tshe ring zhing nad rnams dang bral te/ za ba dang 'thung ba dang / ldan pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba
220b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dge slong sa ro mtsho ba'i dug gis zin pa'i gnod pa dang / sems can thams cad mche ba'i dug gis zin pa'i don la'o// khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni kun dga' bo la'o// rgyal po rnam thos kyi chos kyi spyan gnod sbyin gyi dang dpon sde po che rnams zhes
220b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba la gzi brjid che ba stobs tsha ba/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o// gnod sbyin de
220b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang bye ba 'bum phyug gnod sbyin 'khor du mA dang ldan pa'o// gang dag sems can rnams bskyang zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad mthong ba dang dga' bas te/ de la gnod par mi byed kyi
220b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i sems kyis khyab pa'o// 'jig rten gyi yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang 'khrug pa rnams med par byed pa zhes bya ba no// stong gsum b+hi stong 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig mas khyab ste/ gnod sbyin mthu che rnams kyis kyang nad thams
220b5(rgyud 'grel): cad bcom zhing / sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can rnams skyong ba'o// 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten na rgyu ba rnams kyi ming zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ mthu chen gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon
220b6(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten/ sems can ma lus pa la phan par mdzad pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing gus par byed pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/
221a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis lta ba'o// dbang po dang / zla ba dang / chu lha dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang zhes bya ba ni/ stobs che la mthu che ba/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
221a2(rgyud 'grel): ni ser po dang dkar po dang dkar ser dang dmar po dang nag po dang g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / ri bong gi pags pa dang sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / pad+ma dang ral gri'o// g.yon rnams na mdung dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyi dang / rtse
221a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang / dgra sta rnams so// dbang ldan dang / tsan dan dang / 'dod pa'i gtso bo dang / mgrin ngan dang / mgul nges dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi dad dpon mthu tshan de rnams rig sngags kyi bka' wa mi 'da' ba sems can rnams kyi don
221a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ thal ba'i mdog dang / mthing nag dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'o// g.yas pa rnams na rtse gsum dang / tsan dan gyi be con dang / mda' gzhu dang / dbyug to mig can
221a5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// g.yon rnams na phreng ba dang / bum pa dang / ne'u le'i skyal pa dang / rin po che dang / nor gyi rkyal pa'o// sa Ti dang / nor bu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sgra rab dang / nye lnga po dang zhes bya ba ni/ nga rnams kyis
221a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang gu dang / sngo skya dang / dmar ser dang / mthing nag dang / dkar po'o// g.yas rnams na mdung dang / chu gri dang /
221b1(rgyud 'grel): tor dang / rtse gcig dang / ral gri'o// g.yon rnams me tog na ga pus pa dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da ri ga dang / kun+ta bsnams pa'o// ri mnyam dang / gser can dang / gang po dang / ser ldeng dang / g.yon can dang zhes bya ba ni mthu
221b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba sems can gyi don byed pa'o// de rnams kyis sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang gu'o// g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang /
221b3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ral gri dang / rtse gcig bsnams pa'o// g.yon rnams na nor gyi rgyal pa dang / bum pa gang ba dang / rin chen gyi snod dang / rin chen snye ma dang / gnod sbyin pa lang skyong dang / 'brog gnas dang / mi'i
221b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po dang / rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang / tshigs sdang po dang / zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bsrung ba/ sems can rnams la mi 'tshe ba'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ mthing nag dang / dmar nag dang / sngo/
221b5(rgyud 'grel): bsangs dang / ljang zhag dang / dkar ser ro// g.yas rnams na mnga' gzhu dang / mdung dang / zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra ste bsnams pa'o// g.yon rnams na dung dang a 'bras dang / bum pa spyi'u blugs dang / bI dza pu ra ka dang /
221b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi phreng ba dang / bzhin bzangs dang / gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dri sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu gsum pa dang / 'gul gsum pa dang lcags mdung ring po dang / ma ldan pa ste zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang
222a1(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// sems can rnams kyi don byed pa/ de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang /
222a2(rgyud 'grel): sngo sgra dang / dmar nag go/ de rnams kyi g.yas na mdung ring dang / ral gri dang / 'phang mdud dang / rtse gsum dang / rtse gcig dang / gtun shing dang / ta ma'o// g.yon rnams na nor bu'i rkyal ba dang / rin chen myu gu dang / 'bras kyi ste
222a3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / rin chen snye ma dang / bum pa nor gyis gang ba dang / ne'u le'i rgyal pa dang / rin chen phreng ba'o// gnod sbyin de dag ni gnod sbyin chen po zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la 'tshe ba mi byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ rig
222a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// de rnams kyi yongs su 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyi rtsod pa las bye ba dung phyur rnams kyi sde bo che/ gzhan rnams kyis mi thub pa/ rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba gnod sbyin rnams
222a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtso bor 'gyur ba'o// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'khor ba'o// 'od ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi kha dog gis rang gsal te/
222a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams gsal bar byed pa'o// kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa kha dog de bkrag dang ldan pa'o// grags pa dang ldan pa ste zhes bya ba ni/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis/ rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba stong gsum gyi
222b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyang 'jig tan gyi bsdus kyi sems can rnams kyi don byed pa rig sngags kyi rgyul sno ma thu chen mo hA bka rA las mi 'da' bar byugs pa'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thas kyi bu'i spyan te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams dang / rdo rje spun du grags pa/
222b2(rgyud 'grel): de gnyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi busau/ gnod sbyin 'di ni nga la rnam par 'tshe ba'o// zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang dri za'i gdon nam/ grul bum gyi gdon nam/ kwa'i gdon nam/ gnod sbyin
222b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi gdon la sogs pas glags tshol ba'o// gnod sbyin 'di mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba ni gang de go la go bar byed pa 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gnod par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams/ gnod pa mi gter bar/ rten gyi gang zag la
222b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba grogs byed pa'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spyan ta zhes bya ba ni/ sems can 'che bar mi sems pa/ mthu chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis/ sde chen po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos sras kyi rdo rje spyan no// de dag
222b5(rgyud 'grel): gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang nas gang du rig sngags kyi rgyakha mo rma bya chen mo le gus par byas ni/ kha don byed pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod po byed pa dang /
222b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rgya cher spel ba dang / cho ga byed pa dang / srung ba byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bla mar byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa rnams gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams kyis gang zag de la bsrung bar 'gyur ro//
223a1(rgyud 'grel): sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams kyis sba ba la sogs pa byed pa'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / zhes bya ba ni dgra bo dang g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gzhan yang sems mi bde ba dang / the tshom
223a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang / nang 'thab pa dang / de rnams la yang / gnod sbyin de rnams kyis bsrung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro// 'tshang 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dong zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis sems mi bde zhing 'tshang 'bru bas te/ de rnams
223a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'tshang 'brur mi ster te/ bsrung ba dang skyob par 'gyur te/ 'thab pa la yang de bzhin du bskyong bar 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa las yongs su skyobs shig ces bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi bgegs rnams dang / bdud rnams kyi 'tshe bar byed
223a4(rgyud 'grel): pa la yang srung ba dang skyob par byed pa'o// mi'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po 'am chos rkun la sogs pa'o// mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ bdud rnams glags tshol ba'o// lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni lha'i dbang po brgya
223a5(rgyud 'grel): byin la sogs pa 'dod lha ris drug gi lha rnams so// klu'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa rigs brgyad kyi klu rnams so// lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs
223a6(rgyud 'grel): ris bye ba 'bum phrag dung phyur tsam lha ma yin rnams so// rlung lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni rlung lha'i rgyal po rnam par dga' byed la sogs pa rlung gi gdon bdun dang / bye ba khrag khrig dung phyir tsam mo// nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang
223b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ na mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig la sogs pa bya khyung gi rigs lnga dang / de la sogs pa'i bye ba dung phyur tsam mo// dri za'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa de yang bye ba de dung phyur tsam mo//
223b2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'amo ci'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto 'phyo'i rgyal po bzang po la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam mo// gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang
223b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin chen po lnga rtsen la sogs pa 'phrog mi'i bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa'o// srin po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs pa dang 'khor dang bcas pa dung phyur tsam gnas pa'o// yi dgas kyi gdon zhes bya
223b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni yi dgas 'gul 'joms la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'o// sha za'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za gang la sogs pa du mar gnas pa'o// 'byung po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po lnga ldan la sogs pa bsam gyis mi
223b5(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'o// grul bum gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni grul bum 'dzin mig la sogs pa du mar gnas po'o// srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ srul po rab bzang la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig tsam gnas pa'o// lus srul po'i gdon dang
223b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni rab bzang chen po la sogs po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// skem byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni skem byed mchu rings la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun bcur gnas pa'o// smyo byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ smyo byed nyi shurtsa
224a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te/ sba ba sum 'gyur la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// grib gnon gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni grib gnon 'bum la sogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong tsam mo// brjed byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i bum
224a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa bye ba du mar gnas pa'o// gnon po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni gnon mig bzangs la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam mo// rgyu skar gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de smin drug la sogs pa brjod gyis mi
224a3(rgyud 'grel): lang ba'o// byug pa'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni byug pa dri la dga' ba ste/ gser thub la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gnas pa'o// de yang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin/ rlung dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
224a4(rgyud 'grel): dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye tshan po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha zla dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / rjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / grib gnon dang / skem byed dang / gnon po dang / skar ma dang / dbyug
224a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdon dang / de rnams gtso bor gyur pa stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cur gnas te/ na mkha' la rgyu ba'i dus su ni/ ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin no// sa stengs la rgyu ba'i nyi ma'i rta bdun bzhin du/ skad cig mas gling bzhi khyab pa'o// sa 'og tu
224a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzul ba ni byi ba bzhin du'o// de lta bu'i gdon sa bdag la sogs pa rgyu ba'i dus su sa bdag bzhin no// de bzhin du lha'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad sna tshogs kyi gzugs su bstan nas rgyu ba'o// yongs su skyobs shig ces bya ba
224b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang lha'i gdon la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / skyob par byed pa'o// gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyi gzi brjid 'phrog pa
224b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gdon gzhan yang 'od 'phrog snga ma la sogs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'o// zas su mnga' za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ser skya mo sta yau dgas so// de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su sha za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo pad+ma
224b3(rgyud 'grel): de la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su khrag 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za mo ma he mo la sogs pa te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas sa zhag za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo sdang mo dA mar gnas pa'o// zasu
224b4(rgyud 'grel): tshitshol za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo 'jigs can bye ba tsam du gnas pa'o// zas su rkang za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin me 'bar ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su btsas pa za ba dang / zhes bya ba ni sha za gtum mo bsam gyi mi khyab
224b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// srog 'phrog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ brjed byed ma bum pa can la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur gnas pa'o// zas su gtor ma za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin dri med la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su phreng ba za ba dang zhes
224b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ lha mo nag mo bye ba dung phyur tsam mo// zas su dri za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za mo nag mo seng ge la sogs pa bye ba 'bum phrag du ma gnas pa'o// zas su bdug pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo nag mo snang zhes bya ba ni
225a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su me tog za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bum phrag khri tsam gnas pa'o// zas su 'bras bu za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa bdag chu mo la
225a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su lo tog za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo stobs can mo la sogs pa'o// zos su bsregs bya za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za nag mo la sogs pa 'bum phrag khrir gnas pa'o// zas su
225a3(rgyud 'grel): rnag 'thung ba dang zhes bya bo ni/ sa srin mo glang tshan mo la sogs pa brgya stong tsam gnas pa'o// zas su phyi sa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin sra ba mo la sogs te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su gcin 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/
225a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po lag 'gro ma la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su mchil ma 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ro langs mo gtang gi la sogs pa brgyad khri 'bum du gnas pa'o// zas su ngar snabs za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ro
225a5(rgyud 'grel): langs chen mo dmar ser mo la sogs pa 'bum du gnas pa'o// zas su snabs za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum mo tshigs pa la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur gnas pa'o// zas su skyugs pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin mo
225a6(rgyud 'grel): gtun mo la sogs pa brgyad khrir gnas pa'o// zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ gnon po grul bum nag mo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// za ba de rnams kyang stong phrag brgyad cur gnas
225b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ chung ba ni yud tsam che ba ni dpag tshad lnga brgyar gzugs su sprul pa'o// de rnams kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o// srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus
225b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams mthu tshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro// sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong bzhin du shes par bya'o// gshed byed dang bsgyur ba'i las
225b3(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi dbugs dang bral bar byed pa ste/ de gshed 'phrog pa'i 'jigs pa'o// lus ngag yid kyi las bsgyur ba ste/ de las bsgyur ba'i 'jigs pa lus mi bde ba/ ngag mi bde ba/ yid mi bde bo// byang
225b4(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yengs byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi las dang da ltar byas pa ste/ las kyi dbang gis ma rig pa'i sems kyis byas pa'i byang ngo // de'i dbang gis 'dar bar byed pa'i nad kyang 'byung po rnams kyis btang ba'o zhes bya ba ni ma
225b5(rgyud 'grel): tshang ba dang / lhag pa dang / nor ba dang / 'joms pa dang / pho nya dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyi nus pas btang ba'o// 'joms pa ni de 'joms pa'o// ro longs dang sems bsgyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngags kyis nub pas
225b6(rgyud 'grel): ro langs par 'gyur ba ste/ de ma thul ba'o// rig pa'i sems ma rig pas bsgyur ba'o// sgong gtong dang / bza' nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ gshin rje 'am/ ma mo 'am/ 'jig rten gzhan yang brten byas nas dmod mo byas
226a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// skar ma 'am/ gza' 'am/ tshes grangs sam/ skad cig ma 'am/ ma 'thun pa dang / chu tshong dang / dbyug gu dang / thun tshod ma 'dzom pa'o// gza' rang la sogs pa sems mi mthun pa'o// skyug nyes dang / zhes
226a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ni bang kan dang mkhris pa dang / rlung gi dbang gi ma zhu ba dang ma mthun pa ste/ de skyug na nyes pa'o// yang na 'byung po'i dbang gis sman ma zhu zhing skyug par byed pa ste/ skyug pa ma thon pa dang / 'gags na skyug nyes pa'o// gnod sgrib
226a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / zhes bya ba ni de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis sgrib par 'gyur te/ grib ma de gnod pas gnod sgrib po// de'i sdig mi mthong bar byed pa sgrib pa'o// gnod ltas dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma smin pa la smin par byas nas blta ba ste/
226a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyen pa lta ba de gnod bltas so// bri nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sgra ma mthun pa nyes pa'o// bsgom nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes bzhag nas ma rig pa bsgoms te/ yang na log man du go nas ma tshang bar
226a5(rgyud 'grel): sgoms pa'o// smad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis zhe sdang gi dbang gis smad pa'o// skrag pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa sems bsgyur ba ste/ de yang g.yengs pa'o// rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/
226a6(rgyud 'grel): rang dbang med cing nor dang / zhing la sogs pa 'phrog pa'o// chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / glang po che'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nor dang grogs la 'jigs pa ste/ de bzhin du glang po che'i 'jigs pa'o// me'i 'jigs pa
226b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi khyim dang / gzhan rnams kyis 'ongs pa ste/ gru log pa dang / rab ma thar bar dang / de la sogs pa me dang chub 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis
226b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / zhes bya ba ni rgyal po 'am gzhan pha rol gyi dgra bos ste/ de rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang / de rnams kyi lo thog 'joms pa dang / char mi 'bab pa che bar 'bab pa dang / byi ba dang
226b3(rgyud 'grel): ne tso dang / bung ba dang / ri bong dang / mchil pa dang / ser ba dang / lhags pa'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba bcu drug go// seng ge dang /
226b4(rgyud 'grel): glang po che dang / rA can la sogs pa dang / mtshon dang / chu dang / me dang / rims dang / 'byung po dang / thog mtha' dang / thibs 'og dang / chom rkun dang / klu dang / brtson dang / dug dang / gza' dang / g.yengs pa'o// sa g.yo bas
226b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dus gcig tu sa g.yo ba ste/ de 'byung ba'i dbang gi sa g.yo bar byed pa'o// gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jig pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ seng ge dang /
226b6(rgyud 'grel): stag dang / dom dang / drong dang / chu srin la sogs pa'o// mi 'dza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ rogs shes dang / grogs dang / nye ba la sogs pa'o// 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ nad kyis thebs pa
227a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gshin rje'i thags pas bcings pa'i dus su'o// 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon dang /
227a2(rgyud 'grel): mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bsrung ba dang / skyob par 'gyur ro// shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me dpal dang / lhog pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/
227a3(rgyud 'grel): de de la sogs mdze rigs mi gcig pa bco brgyad de/ rlung dang bang kan dang / mkhris pa dang / chu se las byung ba'o// shu ba ni/ chu ser sha dang lpags pa la babs pa'o// ma dza dang rlung dang mkhris pa dang pad kan la babs pa'o// 'brum bu
227a4(rgyud 'grel): phra mo ni tshad pa nang du shor nas mkhris pa las 'byung ba'o// mtshams par rdol ba ni rlung dang chu ser las byung ba'o// phol mig ni grang ba bzhin du 'byung ste/ rlung dang chu ser mkhris pa las byung ba'o// g.yan pa ni/ bad kan dang
227a5(rgyud 'grel): rlung las byung ba'o// me dpal ni mkhris pa las byung ba'o// lhog pa ni khris pa dang chu ser dang rlung las byung ba'o// gzhan yang 'bras dang rmya chu dang sha bkra dang / sba ba la sogs pa yod do// mkhris pa dang / chu ser dang rlung
227a6(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'o// 'jigs pa las byung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid dang stobs kyis/ gnod sbyin gyis ded dpon de rnams las kyang / srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro// klad pa na ba
227b1(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ rlung bad kan mkhris pa gsum gyis na ba'o// mgo lji zhing nA ba ni rlung yin te/ yang zhing g.yo ba ni bad kan yin no// tsha zhing na ba ni mkhris pa'o// yang zhing stong sob pa ni rlung ngo // lci zhing 'grib pa ni bad kan no// tsha zhing sto ba
227b2(rgyud 'grel): ni mkhris pa'o// de bzhin du nang gzhan la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o// rims nad med par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ tshad pa las byung ba ste/ tshang pa de yang rlung las byung ba dang / bad kan las byung ba dang / mkhris pa las byung ba'o//
227b3(rgyud 'grel): nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zla ba gnyis pa dang / yud tsam pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pas/ rig
227b4(rgyud 'grel): skyugs de rnams kyi mi snang bar 'gyur te/ dang dpon de rnams kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro// rtag pa'i rims dang zhes bya ba ni/ bad kan dang rlung 'dom pa'o// rims ljang dub pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshad pa dang rlung shas che ba'o// 'byung
227b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i rims dang zhes bya ba ni/ tsha ba drag por byung zhing rtsa rtsub pa'o// rlung las gyur pA da / bad kan las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ rlung ni g.yo bar byung ba'o// bad kan ni lci bar byed pa'o// mkhris pa ni tsha bar
227b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// 'dus pa las gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de gsum 'dus pa'o// ldan pa ni gnyis gnyis ldan pas na ldan pa'o// rims thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshad pa'i rims mi gcig pa bcu gnyis so// nad ni nang rigs mi gcig pa
228a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'o// gdon thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o// dug thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nang gi dug gsum phyi'i dug gsum mo// sdig pa thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ las dang
228a2(rgyud 'grel): bag chags shes bya'i sgrib pa'o// sdug bsngal thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa'o// 'jigs pa thams cad bdag la med par gyis shig/ ces bya ba ni// rig sngags kyi
228a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / sangs rgyas kyis bstan po srung ba/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ bsrung ba sems can gyis don byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal
228a4(rgyud 'grel): mo rma bya chen mo'i gnod sbyin gyi drod dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi gnas te bcu pa'o// // kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa'o// shaH
228a5(rgyud 'grel): chen mo bcu gnyis po 'od dag ni zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams lnga dbang mdzad cing / mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa bsrung zhing rig sngags kyis bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// gang dag
228a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang bsrung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ ma chags pa chags par byed pa ste/ chags nas nyer nyer po'i dus su bsrung ba/ skyes ma thag tu yang bsrung ba'o//
228b1(rgyud 'grel): btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang bsrung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni/ ma skyes pa'i gong dang skyes ma thag tu yin te/ rig sngags kyis gzi brjid kyis sha za mo bcu gnyis kyis srung bar byed do// bcu gnyis ni gang zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi las kyis
228b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phros sha za mor skyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni sha za mo bcu gnyis lta ba'o// phreng ma dang / rnam par phreng ma dang / rab tu phreng ba dang / kun tu phreng ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / song ge'i rel pa dang / spre'u
228b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar dmar ser dang / nag mo dang / mi bzang ma dang / dung mgrin ma dang / bya dog mo dang / bum pa'i lto ste zhes bya ba ni/ de bcu gnyis po ni/ shin tu mthu che zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dkar mo dang /
228b4(rgyud 'grel): nag mo dang / ser mo dang / dmar mo dang / ljang gu dang / dkar sar dang / dmar ser dang / mthing kha dang / dmar nag dang / dkar mo dang / sngo bsangs dang / dmar ser ma'o// g.yas rnams na 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang /
228b5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang / me long dang / ut+pa la ser po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / dud dang / lhung bzed dang / bum pa bsnams pa'o// g.yon rnams na zhags pa dang / ba dan dang / thod pa dang / dril bu dang / rtse gsum dang / dgra sta dang / lcags
228b6(rgyud 'grel): kyu dang / thod pa dang / ral gri dang / mnga' gzhu dang / phreng ba dang / dbyug pa gsum bsnams pa'o// sha za chen mo 'di dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ stobs chen mo bcu gnyis ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla rnams rgyu ba ni/ skad cig mas
229a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ba'o// 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi 'od kyis rang gsal ba'o// kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang rang gi kha dog dkar po la sogs pa mdzes par ldan pa'o// grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
229a2(rgyud 'grel): na grags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul tsha zhes bya ba ni na mkha' la bya bzhin du rgyu te/ chu la nya bzhin te/ sa la byi ba bzhin du 'dzul ba'o// lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin 'thab rtsod la
229a3(rgyud 'grel): sde bo cher grags nas/ rang gi ngos nas grogs byas na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag 'di la gus par byed pa sha za chen mo bcu gnyis
229a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang srung bar byed pa dag go// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dkar mau/ g.yas mthing kha/ g.yon dmar ba/ spyan gsum pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu la 'khor los mtshon pa/ phyag g.yas
229a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams na gshol dang / sreg shang dang / 'khor lo'o// g.yon rma bya'i sgo dang / lhung bzed dang / zhags pa bsnams pa'o// rdo rje rigs ma/ de bzhin goshegs pa'i rigs ma'o// chos kyi ye shes kyi ye shes/ gzugs kyi phung po'o// zhabs
229a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa'o// zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid // sba ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyis glags tshol ba las sba ba'o// yongs su bskyab pa zhes bya
229b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni 'byung pos 'jigs pa rnams las bskyab pa'o// yongs su bzung ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyis bzung bar 'dod pa mi snang bar mdzad pa'o// yongs su brkyang ba dang / zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i phung po btags nas gzhan rnams
229b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis glags mi rnyed pa'o// zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po dang yi dgos rnams zhi bas dbang du bsdu ba'o// bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni bkra shis shing phun sum tshogs pa'o// chad pa spang ba dang / zhes bya ba
229b3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'byung po rnams kyi chang pa spang ba'o// mtshon cha spang ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ tshon sna tshogs kyi dbus nas kyang mi tshugs pa'o// dug bzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'od du ma bcug par sngar nas bkag pa'o// dug bsad pa dang zhes bya
229b4(rgyud 'grel): ni'akhor na yod pa nus pas bsang pa'o// mtshams bcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar man chod bcang pa'o// sa bcing ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'og tu rlung gri dkyil 'khor yan chang ngo // lo brgya 'cha bar gyur cig ces
229b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni na tsha dang bral zhing gzhon nu'i tshul du gnas pa'o// ston brgya mthong bar shog ces bya ba ni 'khor drang bu la sogs pa mang po mthong ba'o// de la sdigs tshig ni 'od rnams yin no// zhes bya ba ni sha za bcu gnyis kyi srog snying
229b6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i las kyi snying po'o// tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'og tu blta ba ste/ sngags ni/ ha re kha re la sogs pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa'o// sha za chen mo brgyad
230a1(rgyud 'grel): po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang / sems can rnams la phan par byed pa/ 'jig rten khams na grags pa'o// gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni//
230a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i gzhung gis srung bar byed na sha zo brgyad po bdag gis srung bar byed do// btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang srung ba dag go zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams bya ba'i gdon gyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis srung
230a3(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'o// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ brgyad po dag stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu tsha ba dang ldan pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni brgyad po dag 'og tu blta ba'o// rgyags pa dang rgyags byed ma dang rgyags ma'i shas chen ma dang / nye rgyags ma
230a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / yi dgas mo dang / gzi byin 'phrog ma dang / za ba mo dang / 'cha ba ba mo sta zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan po srung ba la gnas pa rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da'o// de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni ser mo dang dmar mo dang
230a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar ser dang / sngo bsangs dang / ljang ser dang / dkar mo dang / dmar mo dang / nag mo'o// g.yas rnams na me long dang / dri'i phor ba dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang / rnga rked nyag dang / rnga rings so//
230a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon rnams na lhung bzed bsnams pa'o// sha za mo brgyad po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'jig rten khams na rgyu ba'o// 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'od zer gyi snang ba ste/ 'od des gzhan
230b1(rgyud 'grel): yang khyab pa'o// kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi kha dog dang 'od ldan pa'o// grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum tsam yang grags pas khyab pa'o// rdzu 'phrul che ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla skad cig mas
230b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ba'o// lha dang lha ma yin gyis g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go// zhes bya ba ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris kyi 'thab rtsi da dang / grogs byed par snang ba'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags
230b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bsrung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni gang zag dag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la gus pas byas shing / rjes su yi rang te/ de'i yon tan gyis sha za chen mo brgyad po dag gis kyang bsrung bar bgyid pa'o// rig
230b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo ni/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog ser po// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan can spyan gsum pa dbu la rin po ches brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan po// g.yas pa gsum na/ rin
230b5(rgyud 'grel): po che dang / gtun shing dang / dgra sta bsnams pa'o// g.yon gsum na/ rma bya'i sgo/ rtsa gsum dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin tshor ba'i phung po rin po che'i rigs thabs shes rab ginyisu med pa
230b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa'o// zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang du bshad pa bzhin no// tad+ya thA/ zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ sha za mo brgyad po'i srog snying dang rig sngags las kyi snying po
231a1(rgyud 'grel): blta ba'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ ha re kha re la sogs pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni thugs rje chen pos kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o// sha za chen mo sha khrag za ba mi dga' la rnam par 'tshe
231a2(rgyud 'grel): ba bdun po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten khams rgyu zhing / skyes pa dang bud med la gnod pa skyel ba ste// 'thab rtsod la dga' bar byed pa ste// pho mo lceb pa'i sems su byed pa 'am byis pa rnams la gnod pa ste/ de bzhin
231a3(rgyud 'grel): du sems can rnams la glags tshol ba'o// de bzhin du glags tshol zhing khrag la dga' ba'o// gang dag byang chub sems dpa' me'i rum du zhugs pa na yang srung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i dbang gis 'dus pa ste/
231a4(rgyud 'grel): sha za bdun po de dag kyang de dag gi rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis srung bar byed pa'o// btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang srung bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yang dbang du mi 'gyur bar sha za mo de rnams kyis bsrung ba'o//
231a5(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang gang zhes bya ba ni sha za mo bdun pa mthu che zhes stobs dang ldan pa/ bzhin mi sdug pa khro mo nang thams cad gtong ba/ sems can rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni 'og tu blta'o// rab 'char ldan
231a6(rgyud 'grel): dang srung ba mo// sha za khra mo dang / gang ba bzang po dang / me srung ma dang / mdza' mo nag mo dang / drang srong srungs ma ste// zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan po bsrung ba dang / rig sngags kyi bka'
231b1(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'da' mi nus pa'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni dmar po dang / ljang nag dang / sngon mo dang / dmar nag dang / mthing nag dang / nag mo dang / thal ba'i mdog can no// g.yas rnams na gri gug dang / rtse
231b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / snying dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o// g.yon rnams na thod pa khrag gis gang bsnams pa'o// sha za chen mo bdun po 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes
231b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams gnod skyel pa'i phyir gzugs tsha bar bstan te/ ri rab tsam bstan no// chung ba ni ba spu'i rtse mo rtse ma bstan te/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o// 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ de 'od kyis sems can gyi
231b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mI nus pa'o// kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nI/ kha dog drag pos te/ me'i tshul du snang ba'o// grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin 'jig rten gyi khams su grags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas phyi'i rgya mtsho
231b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / ri rab kyi rtse mo la rgyu ba'o// lha dang lho ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go// zhes bya ba ni drag po'i tshul gyis lha dang lha ma yin la grogs byed pa dag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis//
231b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ ces bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus pa dang srung bar byed na/ de rnams kyi gnod mi nus pa glags tshol bar ma nus pa'o// rig sngags ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dmar mo cung zad khro ba/ g.yas
232a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar g.yon mthing kha dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can pad+mas dbu la mtshan pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes pad+ma'i rigs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od
232a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o// sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ gang blta zhe na/ sha za mo rnams kyi sog snying dang / rig sngags kyis las kyi
232a3(rgyud 'grel): snying po'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni ha re kha re la sogs pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa'o// srin po chen po sha dang khrag zab mi dag la rnam par 'tshe ba lnga po 'di dag ni zhes
232a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram du grong khyer lam ka na srin po lnga po stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu che ba skad cig mas gling bzhi rgyu ba skyes pa pho mo la gnod pa/ sha khrag la dga' ba/ sems can thams cad la gnod par byed pa'o// gang dag
232a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na yang bsrung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid dang / stobs dang mthu'i nus pas srin po de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' bar mi nus pa de'i nus pa dang
232a6(rgyud 'grel): po yang srung ba/ bar tu yang srung ba/ pha mar yang srung ba'o// btsa'i kha dang btsas pa na yang srung bar zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka'i nus pas skye ba la yang dag par srung ste/ skyes nas kyang tshem zad kyis bar du srung ba'o// lnga po de
232b1(rgyud 'grel): dngag kyang gang zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni gzugs che zhing bzhin mi sdug pa sems can la 'jigs pa dang / skrag par byed pa// rmi lam na yang sdig par rmi ba de dag lnga po'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni srin po lnga po lta ba'o// rtul po dang nges rtul ba
232b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / dga' bo dang / khyab 'jug len dang / ser skya bo ste zhes bya ba ni gsus pa che ba/ mig dmar ba/ skra gzing ba/ de rnams kyi kha dog deng phyag mtshan ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / sor po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o// g.yas rnams na
232b3(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / bdud kyi zhags pa dang / gri khyer ro// lcags kyu dang / ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon rnams na thod pa dang / mi mgo dang / thal ba'i snod dang / snying dang / mi'i lpags pa bsnams pa'o// srin pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul
232b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ zhes bya ba ni nye ba 'am bu 'am bu mo 'am/ gzugs su byas nas gnod pa skyel te la la bya'i gzugs sam/ rma bya dang khrung khrung gi gzugs su byas nas rdzu 'phrul du sprul pa'o// 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis kyang
232b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od drug po mthong ste/ 'od de yang me lce 'bar ba'i 'od dang 'dra ba'o// kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ so sor rang rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa'o// grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams grags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes
232b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gling la rgyu nus pas so// lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni drag po'i tshul gyis g.yul las bzlog te/ 'thab rtsod byed pa la rem pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
233a1(rgyud 'grel): rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gis 'di las gus par srung ba dang skyabs su gsol na/ srin po de dag gis kyang mi tshugs pa/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid thob pa'o// rig sngags kyi ngos
233a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhe na/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni/ sku mchog dang phyag mtshan bstan pa/ shes rab kyi ngo bo ni/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so// zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ljang gu'o// g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar
233a3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan can/ spyi bo gtsug na sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan pa/ las kyi rigs/ 'du byed kyi phung po'o// g.yas rnams na/ ral gri dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / gtun shing bsnams pa/ g.yon rnams na
233a4(rgyud 'grel): rma bya'i sgro dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa zla ba'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o// sba ba la sogs pa
233a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ da lta bu'i rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gyis/ srung ba dang skyob pa dang skyong ba la sogs pa byed pa'o// tad+ya thA/ 'di lta ste/ de rnams kyi srog snying dang / rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po blta ba'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/
233a6(rgyud 'grel): ha re kha re la sogs pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o// srin po chen po sha za dang khrag za ba/ mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba brgyad po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu zhing glags
233b1(rgyud 'grel): tshol ba ste/ smyo ba dang / lcebs pa dang / khro ba dang / gtun pa dang / 'bab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul du zhugs shing / mi rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa ste/ rims nang dang khrag nad gtong bar byed pa dag go// gang dag byang chub sems
233b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ma'i ru ma du zhugs pa na yang srung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi baN+Did kyis 'di la gus par byed pa tsam la/ gnod pa bcings pa ste/ gang zag gi thog ma dang tha ma bar du srung ba'o// btsal khA dang
233b3(rgyud 'grel): btsas pa na yang srung ba dag go// zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'i bar nas rgas pa'i bar du bsrung ste/ gro bur gyi rkyen yang mi gtong ba'o// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni gzugs che zhing bzhin mi sdug pa gsus pa che ba/ mgo che ga mig kyang
233b4(rgyud 'grel): glog dang 'dra ba/ smin ma khro gnyer can sgra kham nag gzings pa/ skad che ba sdom pa/ sems can rnams la 'jigs pa dang / skrag par byed pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa dang skrag par byed pa brgyad pa'o// blta ba'o// glen pa
233b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / mtshams bzang dang / kU sha lta bu'i mig can dang / sgra ba can dang / skam po 'dzin dang / rab mdzes dang / lag dmar pa dang / mig dmor po dang / mi bzang ba ste// zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che zhing stobs dang ldan pa ste/ mi rnams la
233b6(rgyud 'grel): ba la dga' ba'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni nag po dang / sngo bsangs dang ljang nag dang / mthing nag dang dmar nag dang / thal ba'i mdog can dang / sngo skya dang / ljang gu'o// g.yas rnams na mdung dang / 'phang mdung
234a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / rtse gcig dang / gtor ma dang / gtun shing dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' gzhu dang / rtse gsum rnams pa'o// g.yon rnams na zhags pa dang / sbrul dang / mi snying dang / mi mgo dang / mi'i pags pa dang / rgyu zhags dang /
234a2(rgyud 'grel): tho pa dang / mi ro bsnams pa'o// dri mi zhim pa sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o// gcer bur gnas pa/ mi'i zhing lpags pa gon pa'o// de dag ni sha dang khrag za ba zhes bya ba ni/ mdza' ba dang mi mdza' bar bya ste/ 'thab rtsod kyi sems
234a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnas/ mtshon gyis mtshon 'gyed par byed po/ nye ba dang rma 'khrug par byed pa la dga' ba'o// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo dag kyang 'phrog pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams dang phrad glags med pa/ gal te phrad par gyur
234a4(rgyud 'grel): na/ srog 'phrog pa grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ grong rdal lam/ phro brang dag la rgyu ba sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing / srog 'phrog pa/ khye'u bu mo mngal na yod pa yang 'phrog pa ste/ de sha khrag rnag la dga' ba'o//
234a5(rgyud 'grel): bar du zhugs pa'i khyim dag dang // lnga stong la brten pa zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu rang gis rig bsrung ba la ldang ba/ stong pa'i nang du gzugs mi snang bar 'dod pa/ yang na gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin te/ yid kyi rang bzhin du yod pa/ gzugs
234a6(rgyud 'grel): mi snang ba'o// mun po'i 'od 'gro ba rjes su 'gro ba/ sga 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod dam/ lam rgya gram mam/ sum mdo 'am/ pho brang ngam de rnams mun pa la rgyu zhing 'jigs pa dang / skrag par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du mi rnams la
234b1(rgyud 'grel): gnod par byed pa'o// mi 'di rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog par byed pa che ba'o// zhes bya ba ni/ mi rnams kyi gzi brjid 'phrog pa/ sems can la 'tshe bar grags pa/ shu ba dang / g.ya' dang / mdza dang / phol mig dang / sha bkra dang / 'bras dang /
234b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dang / rmu chu dang / de la sogs pa'i nad rnams gtong bar byed pa dag go// de dag d+hi lce dang lhag par byed pa/ zhes bya ba ni srin po brgyad po de dag kyang sems can rnams la rtag tu 'tshe ba ste/ shan pa bzhin du sems can la byas pa ste/
234b3(rgyud 'grel): sha khrag la de bzhin du dga' ba ste/ srin po de dag ni 'jigs par snang ngo // srin po chen po brgyad po de dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ tshan cig 'tshe ba'i dus su gzugs che bar bstan te/ tshan cig pa spu'i rtse mo nas bzung nas
234b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod par byed pa'o// 'od dang ldan pa zhes b+hA ba ni/ me dang du 'od zer dang ldan pa/ de dag gis 'od zer kha dog drug dang ldan pa'o// kha dog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ so sor rang rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa/ de'i kha dog gis mdzes par
234b5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'o// grags pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rlung na grugs pa'o// rdzu 'phrul che ba zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas gling bzhi rgyu ba'o// lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go// zhes bya ba
234b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de gnyis 'thab pa'i dus su yang de rnam kyi 'thab rtsod byed pa ste/ shin tu stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu che bar grags pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag pa srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang
235a1(rgyud 'grel): zag gis 'di la gus par byed pa'i sems can brgyad po// de dag gis srung bar byed de/ gnod pa drag pos gnod par mi nus pa/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' bar mi nus pa'o// rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni mtshon bya
235a2(rgyud 'grel): ni me long lta bu ya shes te/ shes rab lta bu'o// mtshon byed ni gzug brnyan lta bu ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bdag nyid do// de yang rdo rje'i rigs rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o// ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid zhal gsum phyag drug
235a3(rgyud 'grel): pa sku mdog mthing khar bzhugs pa'o// zhal gsum du snang ba ni sku gsum thugs kyi rnam par dag pa'o// sku mdog mthing khar snang ba ni/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// spyan gsum du snang ba ni ye shes gsum du rnam par dag pa'o//
235a4(rgyud 'grel): khro bor snang ba ni ma lus sems can yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bor nas ye shes lnga shar ba'o// dbu skra ser po gyen du 'byur ba ni/ theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o// dbu la rdo rje
235a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa ni/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnam par dag pa'o// khro gnyer du bstan pa ni/ theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'o// mche ba gtsigs pa ni/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'o// sbrul gyis yan lag brgyan pa ni/ nang gi dug dang
235a6(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i dug bcom pa'o// phyag drug dang ldan pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o// g.yas rgyang g.yon bskum pa ni/ mya ngan dang srid pas ma gos pa'o// zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ni/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i
235b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bstan pa'o// pad+ma brgyud pa'i gdan ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// de'i 'og rdo rje bsnams pa'o// ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin dag pa'o// tha ma
235b2(rgyud 'grel): gtun shing bsnams pa'o// theg pa du ma rnam par dag pa'o// g.yon rnaM bya'i sgo bsnams pa'o// dug gsum rnam par 'joms po'o// bar ma na zhags pa bsnams pa nI/ bdung bzhi bcings pa'o// the man rtse gsum bsnams pa
235b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ srid gsum rnam par 'joms pa'o// ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid du bstan pa'o// me long lta bu'i ye shes ni 'jig rten gyi khams me long lta bu ste/ sgyu ma lta bur snang
235b4(rgyud 'grel): ba rnam par dag pa'o// de lta bu'i rig sngags la gang zag dag gis mos par gyur na/ brgyad po de dag gis gnod par mi nus te/ de rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'os pa'o// sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i
235b5(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid kyis skye ba la sogs pa'o// tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ brgyad po'i srog snying dang rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni he ri kha re la sogs pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni go ta mas bka'
235b6(rgyud 'grel): stsal pa'o// srin mo chen mo bcu po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa na
236a1(rgyud 'grel): yang bsrung zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' bar byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu can sems can mi'i sa bon srung ba'o// btsa' kha dang btsas pa na yang bsrung bar dag go zhes bya ba ni// rgyu'i byang
236a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' phung po lnga'i rang bzhin rgyu'i sems dpas bsrung ba'o// de dag kyang gang zhe no zhes bya ba ni/ bcu po srin mo'i rang bzhin rnam par smin pa'i las byung ba sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni srin po
236a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu po blta ba'o// srin mo 'phrog ma dang / srin mo dga' mo dang / srin mo dmar seng mo dang / srin mo dung can ma dang / srin mo lus las byung ba ma dang / srin mo lha bshos mo dang / srin mo bum pa ma dang / srin mo me tog kun
236a4(rgyud 'grel): da'i mche ba can dang / srin mo me tog zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams ni stobs che zhing mthu che ba ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba ste/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ser mo dang / nag mo dang /
236a5(rgyud 'grel): mar ser ma dang / dkar mo dang / sngo skya dang / dmar mo dang / ljang gu dang / dkar ser dang / mthing kha dang / gser gyi mngag can ma'o// g.yas rnams na ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang /
236a6(rgyud 'grel): kun da dang / me tog sun d+ha dang pud+d+ho ro ka dang / ut+pa ser po bsnams pa'o// g.yon rnams lhung bzeng rnams pa'o// srin mo chen mo bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang nas gang du 'gro
