342b2(rgyud 'grel): dag las ni 'phags/ khyu mochog dang seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags// ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu gsal// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dpag tu med pa'i sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson
342b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang dka' ba spyad pas/ mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byang
342b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku mdzes shing / rin po che rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi
342b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan// zla ba nya gang ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni sdug par snang // dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyus shing chos ston te/ tshangs par
342b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po dang / tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dris pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yid dag par rab tu ston to// rig sngags kyi rgya
343a1(rgyud 'grel): mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i gnas dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i skabs de/ gnas skabs dang po'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan
343a2(rgyud 'grel): pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam cig ci yang ma smras par/ smin mtshams nas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'od zer gyi dra ba 'phros te/ de bzhin du yang nas yang du spros
343a3(rgyud 'grel): nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su khyab ste/ slar log nas 'od zer gyi dra ba de smeni mtshams dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad du thi mo de nas kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos
343a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal te/ skor ba lan gsum byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dra ba 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen ci lags/ don med par 'od zer
343a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi dru ba mi 'gyed na zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi nang na/ mA rungs par byed pa/ lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / na mkha' lding gi gdon dang / rlung
343a6(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gdon dang / ji za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon
343b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / rjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / de la sogs pa mkha' 'gro dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren pa dang ma rungs par byed pa gzhan gyi srog
343b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog par byed pa dang / gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / gzhan yang ma rungs par byed pa'i yi dgas dang / 'byung po rnams kyis kyang yul der phyin nas yams kyi nad dang / rims dang / tsha ba dang / 'dus
343b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rlung dang / bad kana? dang / mkhris pa dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / madz+ra dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / 'brum bu dang / sha bkra dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / de la sogs pa'i// nad thams cad 'byung ste/
343b4(rgyud 'grel): yul nger mu ge dang / klu'i tshad pas kyang mi tshugs te/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi chos thams cad dar zhing / chos kyi gzi brjid 'phrog cing chos kyi nus pa yang med par gyur to// de bzhin du ma nad dang / phyugs nang dang /
343b5(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer yangs pa can du ma rungs pa thams cad byung ste/ 'jig su rung ba byung nas sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byas so// de'i phyir nA 'od zer gyi rje ba 'gyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to zhes gsungs
343b6(rgyud 'grel): so// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o// yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der dong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer ni dpag
344a1(rgyud 'grel): tshang brgya lnga cu yod pa/ dbyibs legs pa/ lhalta na mdzes pa/ phyogs bzhi'i srang bar nas/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pas brgyan pa/ tshong dus mi gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad
344a2(rgyud 'grel): yod pa/ de bzhin du 'dod pa dang / 'did par byed po rnams kyi nyo ba dang / len pa dang / raM ba gcig gis bskor zhing / sman gyi shing dang / me tog gi shing sna tshogs kyis bskor zhing / de bzhin du skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing
344a3(rgyud 'grel): bu bsam gyi mi khyab pas bskor ba'o// rdzing bu dang / skyed mos tshal de dag la thang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog dang / tshogs dang / byi rigs mi gcig pa sna tshogs dang / ri dgos kyi tshogs rnams yod
344a4(rgyud 'grel): de/ de lta bu'i grong khyer gyi nang na 'gro ba sems can gyi don la bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal to// btsun pa de ltar bgyi zhes gsol nas zhes bya ba ni/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan
344a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la bka' stsal pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi don la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral
344a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ snying rje li gnas nas yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ma nor bar bskor ro// de'i phyir na kun dga' bos kyang legs par gsan pa'o// de nas zhes
344b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa de nas so// bcom ldan 'das yul pri dzir yul rgyu zhing gshegs zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su sems can thams cad 'dus pa'i sa/ de bzhin du 'byung po rnams kyang
344b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ju ba'i sa yin no// gser gyi sa gzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gdan/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung po thams cad 'dul
344b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sa yin no// yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / lha la sogs pa 'khor rnam bzhi dang bcas nas/ grong khyer yangs pa can du zhabs kyis bcug so// de nas
344b4(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma'i lha dang / tshangs pa la sogs po'i lha'i me tog bzang pos sil mar bkram ste/ spos dang / dri dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la dbul zhing / lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis
344b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod par byas so// bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i snga nas kyang lha'i dar la sogs pas gting nas/ lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po la sogs pa me tog gi char 'bebs so// de bzhin du grong khyer
344b6(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa can gyi sems can thams cad kyis kyang bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas so// yangs pa'i grong gyi a mra bsrung ba'i tshal ni bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni/ yangs pa can gyi dbus na sems can thams cad 'du ba'i gnas a
345a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras kyi shing gis bskor ba/ skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / wa chu 'dren pa'i sa dang / rdo rje'i khri 'am/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs so// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das a 'bra'i
345a2(rgyud 'grel): tshal na bzhug/ sa pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi sems can gyi don la gdon ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir na/
345a3(rgyud 'grel): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o// kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la// phyi nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhon te zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su yul lha'i thog tu dpa' bo'i dusau su rkang
345a4(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas par bzhag la/ seng ge'i sgra sgrags la/ khyu mchog dam bcas shing gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo yams kyi nad dang / gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir ro// gsang sngags tshigs su
345a5(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa smras pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i/ gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag dang / tshi gsu bcang pa 'di dag smos shig ces bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
345a6(rgyud 'grel): nang thams cad dang / gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa/ mtshon pa ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjesu 'dzin mo'o// rigs ni pad+ma'i rigs so// phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung
345b1(rgyud 'grel): bo// khams ni me'i khams/ skye mched ni ro'i skye mched ngo // rig sngags de'i sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhal gsum pa// phyag bcu gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar mo// g.yas ser ba/ g.yon dmar
345b2(rgyud 'grel): ba spyan gsum pa/ sangs rgyaso lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje'i skyil krung ngu bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa'o// phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi chos kyi
345b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// de'i 'og ma gnyis mnyam bzhag go/ g.yas pa'i gsum be na rol gri/ bzhi pa na rdo rje lnga pa na 'khor lo// drug pas mchod sbyin no// g.yon pa'i gsum pa na rin po che'i steng na rdo rje'o//
345b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa na pad+ma// lnga pa na bum pa'i steng na rdo rje/ drug pa na lcags kyu/ maM gri yig 'brus sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'o// rig lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis dbu la brgyan pa ni ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa'o//
345b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum sku gsung thug rnam par dag pa'o// zhal gsum ni ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par dag pa'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// phyag bcu gnyis ni rten 'bre
345b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa'o// rdo rje kyil drung du bzhugs pa ni mi shigs pa rdo rje'i gdan rnam par dag pa'o// zla ba dang nyi ma'i thod ni thabs shes rab bzung du 'brel pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad
346a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni sangs rgyas dang sems can med pa'o// mnyam bzhag ni/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'o// ral gri ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'o// rdo rje ni stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// 'khor
346a2(rgyud 'grel): lo ni 'khor ba bcang ba'o// mchod sbyin ni byin pa rnam par dag pa'o// rdo rje dang rin po che nI thebs shes rab rnam par dag pa'o// pad+ma ni rigs rnam par dag pa'o// bum pa dang rdo rje ni nang gi dug dang phyi'i dug rnar dag pa'o//
346a3(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu ni ma rig pa'i sems can rnams ya ra la 'dren pa'o// de lta bu'i rig sngags tshigasu bcas pa smras shing / ma rig pa thams cad bcom ste/ mun pa'i nags tshal gsal bar byed cing / rig sngags kyi tshigs su
346a4(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa smras pa'o// bi sa ra bi sa ra bi sa ra ta la sogs pa'o// sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse can gyis bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/ thugs rje che zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ges/ stong
346a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab cing / sems can gyi don la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa bka' stsal pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni/ bye ba khrag khrig brgyad
346a6(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa bzhis gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang rjes su yi rang ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bas de bzhin no// rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas
346b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / lhag mthong gis kyang / sku'i sgo nas chos bstan te/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa rang bzhin gyi ngo bor gnas pa'o// dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/
346b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten nas yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / lan cig phyir ldog pa rnams yin te/ de'i bsgoms pa ni dbugs 'byung ba dang / dbugs rngub pa rnams yin te/ sems
346b3(rgyud 'grel): dran pa med cing bum pa gang ba bzhin du 'gog pa'i rang bzhin gyis lus brem po'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin yin te/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma de'i ngo bo nyid
346b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang bsams pa'o// nyan thos thams cad kyis bsnam pa zhes bya ba ni/ ngag gi sgo nas bstan pa'i chos 'di rtags mngon du byas nas/ de bzhin du mi rtag pa bsgoms te/ lta ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa
346b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'dzin cing / de bzhin du ngo bo nyid 'dzin pas kyang / rig sngags kyi lam gyi ngo bo nyid yin no// bden pa'i tshigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
346b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams yin te de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing phyag 'tshal te/ phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ kun rdzob dang
347a1(rgyud 'grel): don dam pa gnyis yin te/ kun rdzob kyang log pa'i rgyu ma mi dmigs pa dang / yang dag pa'i sgyu ma'i don byed nus pa gnyis so// don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing dmigs pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa
347a2(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa dang / dge ba dang / bral ba yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin pa'i gnas yin no// tshangs pas bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa yin te/
347a3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid 'dzin cing lus bam por btang nas/ mi dmigs pa bsgom te/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi ngo bo yin no// tshangs par so sor bsams
347a4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i lha rnams yin te/ tshangs pa chen po'i tingange 'dzin ni/ sems bkag nas bem por gnas te/ mi dmigs
347a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin tu gnas so// de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gnas pa yin no// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsdam pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum tsam lo dbang mdzad tau/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas sems can
347a6(rgyud 'grel): la dbang mdzad de/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i lam gnas yin no// dbang pos bsam pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la dbang mdzad pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
347b1(rgyud 'grel): mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma ngo bo nyid kyis thob pa'o// lhas bsams pa zhes bya ba ni rigs bzhi dang / rigs bdun gyi rnams pa yin te/ 'dod pa thams cad la spyod cing bde bar gnas te/ de yang rig sngag
347b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bde bar gnas pa'o// lha ma yin gyi dbang bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ thag bzang yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad cing / byang chub kyi sems bskyed ste/ khams gsum tsam la dbang mdzad cing / lha
347b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang mi thub cing rig sngags grub pa'o// lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin rnams ni zhe sdang skyes shing / lha rnams kyi brtsod pa ni rig sngags kyi stobs kyi rtsodang pa'o//
347b4(rgyud 'grel): lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin sgra gcan 'dzin rnams yin to/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin nus shing / 'jig rten gyi bya ba la stobs dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pas thub pa tsam
347b5(rgyud 'grel): med de/ de yang rig sngags kyi stobs kyis byas pa'o// 'byung po thams cad kyi bsams pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dga' ba rnams yin te/ de'i stobs dang / gzi brjid dang
347b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa ni/ rig sngags kyi lam nas yin no// gzhan yang 'byung po rnams kyis rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' mi nus so// gal te bka' las 'da' bar gyur na/ mgo bo a dza ga bzhin du tshal pa tshal ba
348a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyar gas te/ lhog pa dang sha bkra dang / 'bras rnams kyi nad kyis btab cing / rig sngags kyi dmod mos sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags kyi tshig ni yang nas
348a2(rgyud 'grel): yang du klag cing / phyir chung par bya'o// de yang bi sa ra ta la sogs pa smras pa'o// sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyi bka' stsol ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhal nas sprul te/
348a3(rgyud 'grel): yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dmar mo// khro mo spyan gsum pa/ dbu bkra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ kha gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang ba/
348a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bskum pas/ klu gtum po'i rigs mnan pa/ phyag g.yos nA pad+ma dbyug tho can bsnams pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang sdisngags 'dzub rnams te/ bdug pa thams cad rlag par byed cing / so sor rtogs
348a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mtshun cing / mtshan byed ni rig sngags so// mI'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan zhing / dbang ni lce la byas pa'o// ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid dang ldan zhing / na mkha' bzhin du thams cad la khyab pa'o//
348a6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi tshig ni muM tsa ta la sogs pa'o// yams kyi nang phyir song zhig ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs par byed po'i gdon dang / 'byung po rnams dang / gong du bshad pa'i nad rnams phyir bskrad cing / rig
348b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi dmong mos 'dug par mi tshugs shing gnod byed rnams phyir 'byung ba'o// phyir bskrang pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni/ nirga ta la sogs pa'o// sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha lha'i bla ma gshegs shing zhes
348b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas lha chen ni shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma/ yams kyi nad dang / rims kyi nang la sogs pas mi tshugs te/ gzhan yang ma rungs
348b3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / 'tshe bar byed pa'i 'byung po dang / nang thams cad
348b4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms par byed pa'o// lha chen po'i tshogs ni 'byung po'i tshogs yin te/ de yang phan gnod byed pa'i phyir na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis phyin te/ gnod byed ni gang zhe na/ lha chen po'i 'khor
348b5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs rnams kyi bdag po 'byung po'i rgyal po dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa'o// skyer mi ster zhing ma'i mngal gnod par byed pa ni/ 'di rnams yin no// ri dgas rgyal dang skem byed dang / brjed byed dang
348b6(rgyud 'grel): ni khu tshur can/ nam gu srul po/ dza mi ka/ 'dod ba can dang mar dga' byed/ bzhin rgyal can dang gnya' lag can// bya gzugs mi 'chang 'joms pa mo// ma mo dang / de rnams 'byung po gnod byed pa// lo grang
349a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis bar du ni// byis pa rnams la 'jigs par byed// gzhan yang gang gis mi mthong ba// de rnams 'byung po sa la rgyu/ lha'i lha ni gnyis yod do// 'jig rten dang ni 'jig rten las
349a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten las 'odas pa ni yang dag par rdzogasangs rgyas so// 'jig rten pa ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin no// de yang shar gyi phyogs na gnas te/ phan pa dang / gnod pa byed cing gnas pa'o// gnod byed ni
349a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug chen po biSh+Nu dang / b+h+r-i gi ri ti dga' byed dbang / gzhon nu smin drug tshogs kyi bdag/ stobs dbyangs legs ldan de bzhin no// de rnams shar phyogs na phan par byed pa dang / 'tshe bar byed pa rnams yin no// lha'i
349a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma ni gnyis te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / dpa' ba bzang yin no// de yang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bla ma'o// gnod par byed po dang phan par byed po dang / lo legs par byed
349a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / lo nyes par byed pa rnams ni/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang / phur bu dang ni bya ba sangs/ spen pa dang ni lag dang ni/ sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'jug rings dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsi brgyad rnams kyi de bzhin du/ bzang ba dang / don
349a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / chos grangs 'dzin cing / bkra shis pa dang / mi shis par byed pa'o// dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi'i 'khor dang bcas pa yin te/ de yang shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs
349b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su khod cing gnod par byed pa rnams ni phyir khyed cig ces bya'o// rgyal po bzhi 'phags skyes po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po rnams yin te/ de'i
349b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nI/ dri zi nor bu bzang dang / dri za gang ba bzang dang / me tog dang / 'dor ru rnams yin te/ grul bum gtum mo dang / nyes gtum mo dang / grul bum rgan mo dang / khyab 'jug lan dang / gul bum zhe rgam mo
349b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams yin no// klu'i rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i bu dang / dug med dang / mtshon chen rnams so// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la ba dang / chu lha dang ni skye dgu'i bdag/ ba ra d+ha dza dbang ldan dang / tsan ngan 'dod pa'i gtso bo dang /
349b4(rgyud 'grel): mgrin ngan dang ni 'gul nyes dang / pa DaM dang ni nor bu spyod// gra rab nyer wA ra ri mnyam dang / gser can gang po sen te ba/ g.yon can nor 'dzin pa lang skyong / 'brog gnas ma yin rgyal po dang / rgyal ba khyu mchog
349b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs lnga sar/ mgrin bzang rin chen 'khor bcas dang / dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ 'bras bu gsum pa mgul gsum pa/ lcags mdung ring po ma ldan dang / gnod sbyin dang dpon de rnams kyis/ byung phyogs na ni gnas pa'o//
349b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan dang bcas pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ mi brjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs chen dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams yin te/ de dag kyang steng na gnas pa'o// dbang bdag dang
350a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yin te/ lha'i bu dpung ldan dang / dbang chen dang / dbang glags rnams yin te/ byang shashwar mtshams na gnas pa'o// skye dgu'i bdag po dang /
350a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba dang 'dug pa dang / byed pa'i bdag po yin te/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye dang / gaunang stin+d+ra dang / srin po dang / mi dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro ba
350a3(rgyud 'grel): mtho ris dang / dmyal ba dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa'i phyogs shes shing / khams gsum gyi bya ba shes pa'o// skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / a tr-i ya dang / me dang nyi ma dang / mi dang / bzang po la sogs pa yin te/ de
350a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag gis kyang mngon par shes pa'o// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni/ me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang / gshin rje dang / me'i 'khor rnams ni/ me zhi dang ni nag pa dang / yang dag shes dang mdun bladar
350a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / gya gyu gyur ming a gur dang / g.yo 'dod dang ni shar lho gnas/ laM ga mgrin bcu me dang / bum pa mgrin sna bum sna dang / gzigs shing gsod byed la sogs lho nub mtshams na gnas// sum rtse dang ni rab shim
350a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / lha mni ha ruM ke ru dang / kun tu sna tshogs la sogs nub byang mtshams na gnas rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang ni// nam gru dang ni nag po dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyod sogs dang / lho'i phyogs na gnas pa'o// lha 'bum phrag du ma
350b1(rgyud 'grel): ngag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyang 'ong zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha ris drugu dang / gzugs khams kyi lha ris bco brgyad kyang / dang pa skyes nas byung ste/
350b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin rnams song cig ces pa'o// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ngang pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag kyang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i
350b3(rgyud 'grel): lding nga // rlung lha dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po rnams dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang /
350b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi byed dang // grib gnon dang / gnod byed dang / gnon po rnams yin te/ gzhan yang mdangs 'phrog pa dang / lo thog za ba rnams yod de/ de la sogs pa 'byung po'i rigs mi cig pa stong phrag nyi shu yod de/
350b5(rgyud 'grel): nga rnams kyang dang pa skyes nas 'ong bar 'gyuraro// de drag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rigs kyis kyang gnod pa byas te/ des mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi
350b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig su bcang pa 'don par bya'o// rig sngags ni nirga ts+tsho ta la sogs pa'o// myur du byer zhig ces bya ba ni/ snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sna ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams so sor song zhig/ bzang ba dang /
351a1(rgyud 'grel): nga nA pa ma 'grogs shing / rig sngags kyi dmod mos dran byed rnams mgo tshul ba tshal parA 'gas shing / sems can dumyal bar 'gro'o// khyed cag la gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan
351a2(rgyud 'grel): pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ gzhan yang srog 'phrog par 'dod pa dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / drag shul byed 'dod pa ste/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i mtshan nyid/ dum bu dum bur brlag cing /
351a3(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi mes thal bar btang ba'o// gang dgra byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing // nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa du dag khyed cag ces bya ba ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang / chos skyong ba rnams
351a4(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang dpon chen po la sogs pas kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin mi'i gzi brjid dong / stobs kyis srung zhing skyob pa'o// lus la yang
351a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ sku dang gsungs dang / thugs rnams srung ste/ sku srung ba ni/ tshon skud sna tshogs la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad bor zhing lus la btags pa'o// yong na da rA ram/ shing
351a6(rgyud 'grel): shun nam/ gro ga la 'gi hang ngom/ gur kum la sogs pas bris na/ gzhan ngan byed thams cad dang / blo bur gyi sdig pas mi tshugs pa'o// sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyi bka' stsal
351b1(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i thugs kA nas sprul te/ gzi brjid dang ldan zhing / stobs che ba/ na mkhas khyab pa bzhin du// grangs pa yang de bzhin no// ye shes lnga'i rang
351b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can// cung zad khro bo/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog nag mo// spyan gsum pa/ zhabs phyed kIl du bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje/ g.yon sdigs 'dzub dang zhabs
351b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams pa'o// zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan+da pa/ sems can thams cad grol bar byed pa'i rig sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ su mu su mu la sogs
351b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ spyi bo gtsug nas sprul te/ rigs sngags sku'i rang bzhin zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis
351b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sku mdog dkar po/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pA/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas lngas dbu la brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas ni 'khor lo// g.yon pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o// zla ba'i gdan
351b6(rgyud 'grel): la zla ba'i 'ong dang bcas shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// sems can thams cad la phan par lhag pa/ dgongs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can li dgongs ste/ rig sngags
352a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i gzi brjid kyis/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa gsod pa dang / sreg pa dang / rdeg pa dang / dum bur gtub pa dang / tshig pa dang / rengs pa'i sdug bsngal las/ yongs su
352a2(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'o// dung 'gro'i sdug bsngal ni/ bya dang lce spyang la sogs pa rnams kyis gcig la gcig za'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis/ de lta bu'i 'gro ba las thar par byas shing / gcig la gcig za ba'i
352a3(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o// yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal ni btung ba dang bza' ba med pa'i sdug bsngal yin te/ mthong mA thag tu zhe sdang gis gcig la gcig phrag dog byed cing 'thab rtso du byed pa'o// de yang
352a4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid kyis btung ba drang bza' ba med pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa'o// lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal ni/ phrag dog gis spyod pa zhe sdang gi sems skyes ste/ ser sna'i rang bzhin
352a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'dod pa la ma mthun nas/ de yang g.yul 'gyed pa'i sdug bsngal lo// ngo'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i spung gis 'joms pa'o// lha'i sdug bsngal ni/ 'chi
352a6(rgyud 'grel): 'pho'i sdug bsngal yin te/ byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad pa dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang de'i 'chi 'pho pa tshor te/ dper na sngon gyi dus su lci'i bu dga' byed ces bya ba// sum cu rtsa gsum nas mar
352b1(rgyud 'grel): la ltung ba tshor te/ gar 'pho ba tshor zhe na yul ba ra Na ser phag pa'i phrug gur skye bar tshor ro// de tshor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi/ lha'i bu de yang ngu zhing / lha'i me tog gaM lha'i rdzas la sogs pa la lta zhing yang nas yang du
352b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal skye'o// lus las kyang dri ma 'byung ste/ me tog de kun yang skams so// lha'i grogs po rnams kyis bor te/ 'od kyang mang ngo // zhag bdun par du lho'i longs spyong bor nas/ mi gtsang ba za'o snyam nas
352b3(rgyud 'grel): yang du sdug bsngal dran zhing ngu'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skyed mos tshal du rtse mo la 'ongs pas/ skad mi snyan pa thos te/ de nas de'i rtsar phyin nas/ de ngag lha'i bu ngo la dris pa dang / lha'i bus smras pa/ lha'i
352b4(rgyud 'grel): lha zhag bdun pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su/ grong khyer bA ra NA si ro bdag zhag bdun na phag pa'i phrug gur skye'o zhes smras so// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dga' ba khyod kyis/ sangs rgyas dang // chos dang /
352b5(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro ba gyis shig/ des phan paur 'ong ste/ gzhan gyi thabs ni med do zhes gsungs so// lha'i bu des de'i glang mo ngag thos pa dung / skyabasu 'gro ba nyin mtshan med du byas pa dang / zhag bdun gyi
352b6(rgyud 'grel): nang par gnas gtsang ma'i lhar skyes so// lha'i longs spyod dang ldan zhing lha'i bu gsar 'od ces bya bar skyes so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin skyeng mos tshal du lha'i longs spong la 'ongs te/ lha'i bu de dran
353a1(rgyud 'grel): nas lha'i spyan gyis 'dzam bu'i gling du bltas pas/ der yang mthong ngo // dmyal pa dang / byol srong dang / yi dgas dang / gzhan yang mi'i yul shar lus 'phags po dang / ba lang spyod dang /
353a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra mi snyan du bltas pa dang / de rnams su yang ma mthong ngo // de nas rang gi yul dang / lha ma yon dang / rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha'i yul dang / ri bdun gyi lha la sogs pa rnam su bltas te/ de rnams na yang
353a3(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong ngo // de nas de rnams su yang nas yang du bltas kyang ma mthong ste/ de ngo mtshar che bas/ lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling gis dbus su// grong khyer mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
353a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge bzhugs te/ de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i spos dang / lha rdzas kyi mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa
353a5(rgyud 'grel): khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nAs/ bcom ldan 'das lA lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bla dga' ba zhes bya ba 'chi 'pho nas phag po'i phrug gur skyer 'gro
353a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus su/ ngas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin te/ de'i byin brlabs kyis gar skyes cha med pas/ bdag gis dbang tshad la bltos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis
353b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ khyod kyis longs spyod pa'i mtho ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gser 'od ces bya bar skyes so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rdzas kyi mchod pa yang nas yang du
353b2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ yid ches shing ngo mtshar che bar yang nas yang du skyabs su 'gro bar byas so// de bzhin du rig sngags kyis rgyal mos lha'i 'chi 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal yang 'joms pa'o// mi'i sdug bsngal ni/ skye ba dang /
353b3(rgyud 'grel): rgas pa dang / na pa dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yin te/ de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma'i gzi brjid dang / stobs kyis/ 'di 'chang ba tsam gyis sdug bsngal thams
353b4(rgyud 'grel): cad las bral bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can thams cad kyis sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir na/ thugs rjes bskyab pa zhes bya'o// byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa
353b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can la bu gcig pa lta bur byas nas/ de la bsnyen bkur byed cing / 'tshe ba'i sems mi skye zhing / khams gsum gyi sems can la de lta bu'i sems bzhag cing byams pa
353b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de bzhin du 'khor ba la gnas pa'i sems can la snying rjes khyab ste/ de 'dod pa'i sems nye bar bzhag pa snying rje'o// dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa'o// gshegs kyis zhes bya ba ni/ dge
354a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba la dga' ba ste/ 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can yar la thun pa dang / mun pa mun nag bcom pas dga' ste/ de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid dang / bsgom zhing sems can thams cad la khyab par med
354a2(rgyud 'grel): pas nas/ btang snyomaso// ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyi lha thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje lta bu yin te/ gang la yod ce na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
354a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi lta bu'o// de'i ye shes ni rig pa'i lha rnams yin te/ rig pa'i lha rnams ni gang zhe na/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang / rma bya chen mo dang / bsil ba'i tshal dang / so sor 'brang ma dang / gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin
354a4(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams yin no// mtshon pa ni ya shes rnams yin no// mtshon byed ni rigs pa'i lha mo rnams so// so so'i ya shes ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /
354a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang / so sor rtogs pa'i ya shes dang lnga'o// rigs ni rdo rje'i dang / rin po che dang / las dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / pad+ma'i rigs so// phung po'i rnam shes dang / tshor ba dang / 'du byed dang / gzug
354a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'du shes so// khams ni nam mkha' dang / chu dang / rlung dang / sa dang / me'o// skye mched ni/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lus dang / mig dang / lce'i rang bzhin te/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o// zhal gsum gsum/
354b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug drug/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i stan la nyi ma'i 'od zer
354b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'o// zhal rnams ni khro ba dang sgeg pa dang / 'dzum po dang / zhi ba dang / cung zad khro ba'o// sku mdog ni nag po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dang / dmar po'o// g.yas pa'i zhal rnams ni/ dkar po dang /
354b3(rgyud 'grel): mthing ka dang / dkar ba'o// g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ni/ dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sder po dang / dmar po dang / mthing ga'o// dang po'i phyag gnyis na/ rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pa na dril bu dkur brten pa'o// g.yas pa
354b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na ral gri ste/ gsum pa na mnga' bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis pa na sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste/ gsum pa nA gzhu bsnams pa'o// lha mo rnams ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du ldan pa ste/ chos nyid ni stong
354b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid ngo // lha mo ni dngos po'i rang bzhin thabs so// 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma
354b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag mo// gsang sngags kyi tshig gis khams gsum tsam yang 'dar bar byed de/ 'byung po rnams kyi mi tshug so// 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba grub ste/ gsang sngags kyi
355a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshig 'di grub na yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o// tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshe 'di la yang bkra shis te/ phyi ma yang de bzhin no// de bzhin gang bsgrub par 'dod pa yang 'grub ste/ rgyal ba
355a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis gsungs te the tshom med do// gang la ser sna rnams chags pa// rnam tsam dri ma sel mdzad cing zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal spangs shing 'tshe bar mi byed pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes shar nas dri mA de yang spong
355a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ gang yang grub ta the tshom med// thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' ste/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal spangs shing 'tshe bor mi byed pa ste/ de'i sems nye bar bzhag na/ rig sngags
355a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni 'grub ste/ gnyis pa'i sems med pas na/ phun sum tshogs shing bkra shis 'di 'grub po// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzung byed cing / zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa yang dag par bstan
355a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ mun pa mun nag la ye shes kyi mar me bstan pa'o// mtho ris thar pa'i lam 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa 'di la ser sna la sogs pa gang yang mdo// chos rnams cad ston pa ste/ khyed la bde leg
355a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di ni bstan pas na/ grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis pa'i sems spangs shing gzhi dad pa'i sems kyis 'dir ni bkra shis te/ the tshom me do// ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis bsten
355b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa skyes na/ byams pa dang / snying rje sems ni rtag tu bzhag pa ste/ rig sngags 'di la bzhi dad pa bskyed na/ 'khor ba'i dra ba gcod pa'o//
355b2(rgyud 'grel): gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'di por la dge ba'i sems ni yongasu bzung la/ bde ba yang ngag thob ste/ gnyis pa'i sems ni mi 'dzin pa//
355b3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis 'di ni yang dag par thob pa'o// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sems can la/ de'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ snying rjes ni thams cad la khyab ste//
355b4(rgyud 'grel): mun pa'i mun nag bcom pa'o// bu gcig bzhin du brtag bskyongs des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba ri sna drug ni mnyam par bzhag ste/ byams pa'i stobs kyi skyob pa'i sems bzhag
355b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ rtag tu sems can la snying rje'i sems dang ldan na/ tshe 'dro la bak+ku shisau par 'gyur ro// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yis/ sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba ni ma rig
355b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ 'khor bar byed pa ni gti mug gis 'khor te/ gti mug gi steng du ser snas bcings te/ ser sna'i stang du zhe sdang byung ngo // zhe sdang la 'dod chags 'khor ro// nga'i gting la ma rig pa'i snying rje skye ste/ nges
356a1(rgyud 'grel): na 'khor ba zhes btags pa'o// de rten pa gcod par byed pa ni/ rig pa ste/ rig pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so// ye shes de ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i ngo bo
356a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid yin te/ des 'khor ba rnams 'joms pa'o// gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa ste/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du de la mnyen zhing grub pa ste/ gzhan la snying rje yang dag pa skye
356a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ tshe 'di la bkra shis par 'gyur te/ yang dag par grub pa'o// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba 'di la/
356a4(rgyud 'grel): chos la the tshom mang de/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi the tshom med pa'i sems ni bzhag par gyur na// chos kyi rtsa ba yang dag par thob pa'o// gsum gtsang gtsang bar mdzad ba des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par
356a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ brdzun dang / phra ma dang / ngagra 'khyal pa dang / tshig rtsub pa dang / gzhan gyi rna bar mi snyan pa'i ngag mi smra ba'o// yang na ngag 'khyal pa spangs shing / gzhan la dga' ba'i gtam byin ta/ mi dge ba spungs
356a6(rgyud 'grel): shing dge ba 'di byas na/ tshe 'di la yang bkra shis par 'gyur/ dpa'i bo chen po gang skyes pas/ phun sum tshogs don 'byor 'gyur cing // zhes bya ba ni/ bdud dang / bdud kyis ris bcom pa l-i/ chos skyong ba la ni
356b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ba'i sems dang / brtson 'grus ni yang dag par skye te/ de bzhin du/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi phun sum tshogs pa'o// don grub tshogs kyang grub pa ste/ khyed la
356b2(rgyud 'grel): bad legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ de la de bzhin du byas par gyur no// rig pa 'di yang 'grub ste/ don 'grub cing 'di la the tshom med de/ gang yang bkra shis 'di las 'byung ngo // gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams
356b3(rgyud 'grel): ninags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i chos kyis nyams su myong ba thob pas na/ sa rnams thams cad g.yo zhing 'dradur te/ de'i gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur
356b4(rgyud 'grel): ro// sems can thams cad dga' ba ste/ khyed la bde logs mdzad par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'dzin ma 'di sgrubs na/ dga' ba smos ci dgos te/ yang dag pa'i byang chubo
356b5(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'o// bkra shis shing chos grub par 'gyur ba ste/ tshe 'di dang / phyi ma la yang de bzhin no// byang chub snying por gang dag gis/ sa ngagra rnam drug g.yos gyur cing zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
356b6(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi khams kyang 'dar ba ste/ de yang 'di grub pas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thos pas na/ sa ni de bzhin du g.yo ba'i phyir ro// bdud yid mi bder gyur po des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs
357a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi sa gzhi la bzhugs pa'i dus su// gti mug dang / 'khor bar 'khor ba rnams yid mi dga' ste/ de yang de'i nus pas/ mi dga' ba rnams gcod pa'o// rig sngags
357a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzi brjid kyi bkra shis shing bde bar gnas pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i bden pa bdar te/ chos kyi 'khor lo lan bdun bskor zhing /
357a3(rgyud 'grel): de yang gsum du 'dus te/ sku'i bden pa dang / gsung gi bden pa dang / thugs kyi bden pa dang / de bzhin du 'dul ba'i ngo bo la yin te/ de yod 'phags pa rnams kyi lam yin no// de yang bden pas nA bkra shis par 'gyur
357a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ the tshom med do// 'di la gang yang grub pa'o// thub pa'i mnyan pa gang byung des/ khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i chos yin te/ chos ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
357a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'di yis gzi brjid gang byed pa ni// bkra shis phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// yis 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // zhes bya ba ni/ lta ba mi cig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod de/ de rnams
357a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang / rtag par lta ba dang / chang par lta ba la bsdu'o// de rnams gang du yang mi gnas shing / chos kyi rang bzhin gsol la bzhag pa'o// de yis de 'dul bar byed pas na/ mu stegs kyi chos kyang pham par 'gyur ro// tshogs
357b1(rgyud 'grel): kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i nus pa dang / gzi brjid kyi chos kyi nyams myong yang dag par skyes te/ de yis de kun 'dul ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzi brjid kyis 'dir ni/
357b2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis shing phun sum tshogs pa'o// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can la/ 'khor ba'i
357b3(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal las thar bar byed pa'i bde ba chen po skye bor byed pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mar me phye zhing bkra shis par byed de// yang dag pa'i byang chub la dgod pa'o// de bzhin du lha'i sems can rnams
357b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang bkra shis par 'gyur to/ lha rnams kyis ltung ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o// 'byung po kun kyang bde legs ni/ khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ ltung ba med pas sems can la 'tshe ba med de/ 'di'i nus
357b5(rgyud 'grel): pas 'tshe bar mi byed cing / rtag tu gza' ba dang / btung ba rnyed par 'gyuraro// bza' ba la lcags kyi thu lum du mthong ba rnams dang / btung ba la zangs kyi khu bar mthong ba rnams dang / de dag gis kyang rtag tu mtshang
357b6(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis/ zhes bya ba ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye she kyi tshogs gnyis yin te/ bsod nams kyi tshogs ni
358a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu rgyu ban// rdzu spya Sh+Tab+h+ya sa g+sa b+hU nam bu/ nas rmugs rlung bya dUng thul dang / dmug d+ma ma pa// nas shAs / A/
358a2(rgyud 'grel): byed bye ba ste/ 'jig dang/ Sh+Tas pa nas sa bzhin no// rkye rnams 'di don gang yin+d+ha ga/ ni de phyi chub sbyin ce skye / na sngags po rdzul ma gang rdzogs
358a3(rgyud 'grel): ma 'jig sa byam mas cung thung hU~M/ ga dag+sa byu ba mapa rnams da oM dan s+yAng+ge de'i// d+d+he b+hU la gas shog/ rlung don/ da cag ngalegs shog b+h+rUM b+h+ya ba/
358a4(rgyud 'grel): hU~M rgyu dang gnyis la mi gas d+ha ste/ 'di na / nga smyig brtul Sh+Te byu // rang bzhin/ song gi rig las sbyar ba dang / po dgas 'a ba drung / spyarnams yin /
358a5(rgyud 'grel): gas kyi kau'i rdorjid kyim// nga bzhin du bkra shis pa'o// khyud drug lam 'gro de lags shig/ phyi 'ad dag kyang bde legs shog// ces bya ba ni/ gang yang lU dang mi dang / 'byung ba la sogs pa 'gro de'i dus su yang
358a6(rgyud 'grel): kra shis te/ phyir ldog pa'i dus su yang bkra shis pa'i phyir ro// nyin mo bang legs mtshan pod legs/ nyi ma'i gung la ba legs shogo ces bya ba ni/ nang rnams me cing sdug bsngal dang bral ba ste/ rmi la mo nga
358b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang rnams mi mthong zhing / srog dang mi 'bral bar bde zhing bkra shis te/ tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no// khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ ces bya ba ni stong gsum gyi
358b2(rgyud 'grel): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyang bkru shis shing bde ba ste/ rig sngags 'di yang grub pa'o// sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing / sngon gyis dus dang / da ltar dang / shes pa dang / mi
358b3(rgyud 'grel): shes pa 'joms pa'o// sems can kun dang srog chags kun ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dang / srog chags bde bar 'gyur zhing / yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa ste/
358b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi sems can yang de bzhin no// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po ni sngon gyi las kyis badre ba cung zad kyang med pa dang / bde ba
358b5(rgyud 'grel): bgra tsam yod pa dang / mchod par 'os pa ste/ de bzhin du khyed cag kun kyang / sems can mi gtogs te/ de bzhin du rab 'bring tha ma gsum gnas te/ de kun kyang bkra shis shing blud par gnas te/ yang dag
358b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bde ba thob pa'o// thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ ces bya ba ni/ 'di la nad rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ nad rnams thams cad bcom zhing / bde ba 'ba' zhig la
359a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ yang na bde ba yang dang yang du thob pa'o// gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ ces bya ba ni/ sngon du byas pa dang / da ltar byas pa'i sdig pa ci byas kyang / 'dir ni mthol lo bshagaso//
359a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhag gyur cing / sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos 'di l-i yang byon zhing / sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed do// de bzhin
359a3(rgyud 'grel): du gang dang gang la gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ byams po dang / snying rje dang /
359a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la dgod pa ste/ gzhan dang byang chub kyi snying po dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du/ shel bzhin du gsal pa ste/ bag chags dang // sa bya'i dri mas ma smos pa/

359b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan dang po'i lha rnams dang bcas pa rnams byung ste/ tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs la nye phan dang / tshangs pa chen po dang bzhi'o// de ni bsam gtan dang
359b2(rgyud 'grel): po'o// bsam gtan gnyis pa'i lha rnams byung ste/ 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang gsum mo// de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang byung ste/ dge chung
359b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshad med dag dang / dge rgyas so// de ni bsam gtan gsum pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyang gnas te/ sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba'o// de gsum ni bsam
359b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan bzhi pa'o// nga yang de'i gnas su 'du shes med pa'i lha gnas so// gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyang byung ste/ de yang mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og
359b5(rgyud 'grel): min dang lnga'o// de yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la gtogs te/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bskor ba la ni gsum byas te/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshang

360a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dbang byed dang / sumA cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa dang thabs gcig tu'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang

360a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi deng dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po dang / zla ba dang / chu la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu'o// 'phrog ma bu dang bcas g.yog 'khor
360a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcos pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga lwa ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ zhes bya ba ni/ rnga rtson dang / 'phrog mo'i bu dga' byed la sogs pa brgya dang ngo // 'phrog ma'i mtha' rtag dbang phyug la sogs pa

360b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ phyogs gcig tu skad cig tu tshangs pas smras pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / bgegs kyi bdag po rnams yin te/ de bzhin bdag
361a1(rgyud 'grel): cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis so zhes pa'o// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi pa stong / bsam btan gsum pa ste/ bsam gtan gnyis pa stong / bsam gtan dang po
361a2(rgyud 'grel): stong de bzhin du so sor bsgreng ba stong stong po rtsi ste/ de ni gzugs kyi khams kyi rtsi lugaso// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong / 'thab bral stong / sum cu rtsa gsum stong / rgyal chen rigs bzhi stong / rim pa bzhin du lha'i ris drug ni 'dod
361a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khams la de bzhin du stong stong brtsi bar bya'o// de bzhin du ri rab kyang yin te/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar pa la sogs pa'o// shar kyi lus 'phags stong / lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong / nub kyi ba lang spyod stong / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong / de
361a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du tsha ba'i dmyal ba dang / grang ba'i dmyal ba dang / dung 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams yin te/ de ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi stong rtsi lugs so// gzugs med pa'i khams kyang de bzhin du yi no// dbang phyug chen po la dbang bgyid pa lags
361a5(rgyud 'grel): te zhes bya ba ni/ stong spyi phud kyi khams la dbang mdzad pa'o// yang nA de ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yin te/ mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dbang sdud mdzad pa'o// btsun pa bac+doMs bdag ni 'tshal na/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi
361a6(rgyud 'grel): khams rnamasu srung bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ tshangs pas dbu mdzad cing lha dang / 'byung po rnams kyis kyang phan par byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa'i nges tshigs bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig zhus pa'o// srung bar bgyid ces pa ni/
361b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// yongasu bskyob par bgyid/ yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyid lagaso zhes bya ba ni/ bkris shing / sems can thaMd la bde bar gnas par byas pa'o// btsun pa zhe bya ba ni/
361b2(rgyud 'grel): 'a'adod pa'i yon lnga spangs shing / tshul khrims la sogs pa srungs te/ sems can tha~Md kyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag ces bya ba ni/ bag chags kyi sgrib pas ma gos te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis
361b3(rgyud 'grel): mi gos shing / lus dang ngag dang / yid bde ba ste/ de bzhin du gti mug dang / zhe sdang dang / 'dod chags dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog rnams kyis mi tshugs shing bde bar gshegs te/ lus pa med pas na bde bar gshegs pa ste/ chos rang bzhin ni dngos po
361b4(rgyud 'grel): med cing rnyog pa med pa ste/ rang bzhin med cing / rtag chad gnyis dang bral te/ brjod pas kyang mi khyab pa ste/ nam mkha' bzhin du sems can thams cad la khyab pas na/ dbang phyug ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
361b5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi kham rnamasu dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom bskal dang ldan pa ste/ ri rab la sogs 'jig rten gyi khams 'di stong stong brtsi ste/ da ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yin no// de bzhin du nyis 'gyur du rtsis
361b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni stong par ma'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ de de'i sum 'gyur du brtsis pa ni stong gsum mo// chen po ni sems can thams cad bsam gyi mi khyab pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ mnyam por gzigs shing
362a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam por brtan te/ dge sdig la sogs pa gnas shing sems can gnas pa'o// de la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ sems can ris mi gcig pa'i phyir na rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa'o// yang na sems
362a2(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don la der dbang mdzad de/ theg pa sna tshogs bstan cing dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam bstan pa'o// de ni tshangs pa'i tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na/ zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
362a3(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms bsgom zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams zhes bya ba ni/ sprul pa'i skas kyang skad cig thang cing yung tsam gyis kyang / sems can gyi don mdzad
362a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bar mdzad pa legs na zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu la yang 'gro ba yang srung ste/ mtho ris kyi lam bstan pa'o// 'khor
362a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jig rten dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyis 'tshe ba dang / ngan song gsum las thon par byed pa'o// mi dge ba bcu la 'gro ba yang bzung ste/ de las bzlog nas dge ba bcu las 'jug pa'o// dper na shing
362a6(rgyud 'grel): skam po 'gugs te/ khengs pa'i rang bzhin thabs kyis 'gugs pa bzhin du// khengs pa khro bo'i rigs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid kyis kyang 'dul bar byed pa'o// yang na zhi ba ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas da
362b1(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun gyi byin brlabs kyis zhi bar byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang bral zhing / bde ba la bkod de/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o// yang na 'jig rten gyi khams lus dang / ngag dang / yid bde zhing phun sum tshogs te/
362b2(rgyud 'grel): yi dgas rnams kyis kyang 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// mdzad lags na zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas yang nas yang du zhus pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ lan gcig sngon du zhugs te/ lan gnyis pa
362b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ da ltar zhus ste/ phyi ma yang zhus pa'o// lan gcig lan gnyis lan gsum du/ tshangs pa rnams kyi yang dang yang du zhus pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi mdzod kyi dag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo zhes bya
362b4(rgyud 'grel): bab ni/ de nas ni tshangs pas smras pa'i de nas so// sems can rnams la dmigs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma zhal nas byung ste/ maM gi yi ge'i rang bzhin las na mkha' bzhin du khyab
362b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'phres pas// 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang 'bral ba dang / stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs dang shes rab gnyisu med pa/ ngo bo dang bral zhing gang gis brjod
362b6(rgyud 'grel): du med pa de ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas byung ngo // zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyang pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ gzhon nu'i cha byad can/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang bcas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi
363a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ zhal g.yas dkar po/ g.yon mthing ka/ rgyab ser po'o// phyag dang po'i g.yas g.yon gnyis na chos kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de'i 'og ma gnyis kyi byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de'i
363a2(rgyud 'grel): 'og ma gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa'i tha mas mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yon pas skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// zhabs pad+ma dkyil krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ shes
363a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thabs kyi ngo bo yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o// 'du shes kyi phung po pad+ma gsungs gi rigs me'i khams ro'i skye mched ngo // pad+ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs nyi ma'i 'od zer dang
363a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor dang bcas shing / rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal mong khang dang bcas nas byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung zhing sems can gyi don la tshangs
363a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pas zhus pa la ting 'dzin gnang ba'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gnang ba de nas so// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung pas gnas
363a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rig nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni/ stong spyi phung kyi rgyal po tshangs pas mngon par shes pas ting 'dzin gyis gnang bar shes so// de nas zhes bya ba ni tshangs pas mngon par shes pa'i de naso// bac+doMs
363b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / gzhan yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / de la
363b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mi dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / 'byung po mang po 'dul ba'i 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng+ges bka' stsal to// dge slong dag stong spyi phud kyi rgyal po tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes
363b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams kyi lha gnas rigs bcu bdun dang ngo // lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams sum cu rtsa gsum nas yar la bsgrangs
363b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang bcas pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi pa'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas mar la skrangs pa dang lha ma yin dang / gsar gyi ri bdun phrang thogs kyi lha rnams
363b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu rnams dang thabs gcig go// rgyal po bzhi ni ri rab kyi lcog la gnas pa'o// gnod sbyin gyi dad dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang
363b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyi rigs nyi shu rtsa drug dpon re re dang bcas pa stong phrag brgyad cu lha'i gdon la sogs pa re re yang stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu'o// de rnams dang thabs gcig tu'o// nga ga la
364a1(rgyud 'grel): ba der 'ongs nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag pos nga la 'di skad ces smra so// zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags kyi tshig smraso zhes pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan zhes bya ba ni/ mi mdzes kyi bdag po tshangs
364a2(rgyud 'grel): pas bcom ldan 'das la lan gcig lan gnyis/ lan gsum zhus pa'i lan bco ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bshad pa'o// mnga' mdzad pa lags te zhes bya ba ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong gsum gyi stong
364a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed nas bya ba ni/ tshangs pas yang nas yang du zhus pa'i tshigs dge slong rnams la smras pa/ lan gsum zhus pa'o zhes
364a4(rgyud 'grel): smras pa'o// bde lagasu gyur par mdzad du gsolo// zhes gsol to// zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don la sprul pa dang / bde legasu gyur cig ces pa'o// dge slong dag ngas kyang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la
364a5(rgyud 'grel): tsacang mi gsub pas gnang ngo zhes bya ba ni/ sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi sems cani don la/ skad cig ma'i ting 'dzin gyi rig sngags 'phros pas 'gro ba rigs drug gi don mdzad pa'o// de nas
364a6(rgyud 'grel): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas cad mi gsung bas gnang bar rigs nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i de nas te/ de mngon par shes nas tshangs pa la sogs/
364b1(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang / de rig par shes par bya'o// dge slong dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi tshig smras te/ rigs ni shes rab ste/ sngags ni thabs
364b2(rgyud 'grel): so// rgyal mo ni bdud rnams kyis mi tshugs te// 'khor ba rnams 'joms pa'o gsang ba ni stong pa nyid yin te/ khyab che ba mi dmigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang gis kyang smra bar mi nus te/ ngo bo rnam par dag
364b3(rgyud 'grel): pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yis mi dmigs pa ste gsang ba'o// sngags ni skyob pa/ srung ba/ ma man+ta'i rang bzhin/ sgyu ma lta bu/ chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o// bcom ldan 'dra
364b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ gzugs dang // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams
364b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang rmi lam lta bu'o// sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes gsungs// yang sngags ni thams cad la khyab ste sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi sems can rnams kyi don
364b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o// rjesu 'dzin pa ni rig sngags rgyas btab ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa dang / lha dang / mi la sogs pa rje su 'dzin te/ ngo'i ye shes kyi lam gyis/ thun mong dang / thun
365a1(rgyud 'grel): mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'o// rig sngags 'di ni yang dag pa'i ye shes yin no// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
365a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ gaM gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mar me mdzad la sogs pas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'o// rje su yi rang te 'di'i lam
365a3(rgyud 'grel): nas sangs rgyas pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ ma 'ongs pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das
365a4(rgyud 'grel): byams pa la sogs pa yin te/ de bzhin du de'i lam nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o// da ltar byung na yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir nga
365a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar nga nyid kyis bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'di'i tshe 'di lta sems can gyi don la/ shAkya sang gis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ste/ 'di'i lam yang dag por rdzogs
365a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjesu 'dzin pa'i tshangs pa la sogs pas rig sngags zhu ba'i gnas skabs te gsum pa'o// rig sngags kyi nges tshig gi rtags
365b1(rgyud 'grel): dang po rdzogs so// // de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar bzhugs pas gsungs pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
365b2(rgyud 'grel): stsal pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di zung zhig ces gsungs nas/ kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gtang ba'o// kun dga' bo khyod kyi rig sngags rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su
365b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa 'di zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ sku gsum gyi rang bzhin la sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig gis// ma rig pa'i mun pa gsal te/ srid pa gsum yang 'joms pa/ sku
365b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyis gzung nas/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad do zhes pa'o// rmongs shig/ lhogs shig/ shod cig/ kun chub par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ nga'i bka' las 'das par byas
365b5(rgyud 'grel): shing / sems can gyi don la da mya ngan las 'das nas kyang // gsungs shig/ rjes su yi rang zhing sems can thams cad la ston cig ces bya ba'o// yang na nga ltar khyod kyis de ltar gzung nas sems
365b6(rgyud 'grel): can gyi don la tshig bzung bar gyis shig ces pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du gsung ba'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/
366a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ ngan song gsum 'joms pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa/ 'khor ba nas log pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o// 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi
366a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar reg par gnas par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba ni/ med pa yod par byed de/ yod pa rnams kyang mad par byed pa'o// bkra mi shes pa bkris par ste/ brjed ba rnams kyang dran pa rnyed/
366a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab chung ba rnams kyang shes rab dang ldan pa/ 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma 'jigs pa'o// cha thung ba rnams kyang tshe ring bar byed de/ nang thams cad 'joms shing / mi bde ba yang bde bar byed de/ ma rungs pa'i gdon
366a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis/ dge ba dang / chos byed du mi gtor ba'i gdon rnams 'joms shing / tshig tu brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / lha dang / lho khang dang / khyim dang / po ti dang / glegs bam dang / lugs sku la sogs pa rab tu gnas par
366a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// yang na 'khor bzhi la sogs pa la bar chod med cing bde bar bgyid// rig sngags 'di'i tshig ni/ pad+ma'i rigs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te/ mtshon pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yi so// mtshon byed ni rig
366a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rje su 'dzin pa'o// phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po'o// sa'i khams ni mig gi skye mched/ ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum/ sku mdog dkar po/ zhal gsum
366b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yas mthing kA/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas pa gsum na/ ral gri dang / be con dang / 'khor lo rnam so// g.yon pa gsum rin po che dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu rnamaso//
366b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pas pad+ma'i steng na/ zla ba'i mtshan nyid/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ste/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi tshig 'di lta ste/ u bu d+he/ ni bu d+d+he zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// kun dga' bo
366b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal to// yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad lnga brgyar gnas pas kyang / 'di nas bsrung
366b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyuraro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du yang dag par gsung bar bya'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
366b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tur can dang / kun skyob dang / log par dang sel dang / gser thob dang / 'od srungs rnams yin te/ de la sogs pa bye bre khrag khrig
366b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya stong brgya phrag gi gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni/ rin chen zla
367a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / kun tu bzang po dang / chos 'byung ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / zhal rnam par gzigs pa'i ut+pal dang de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la sogs pas dbu mdzad pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa
367a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas ste/ de rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba na yang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir da ltar nga nyid kyi bshad zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba ris drug gi don la sprul skus khyab ste/
367a3(rgyud 'grel): mi bde bde bar byed pa'i phyir da ltar byang chub sgrub pa'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyi mi khyab pa gsungs pa'o// ngas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can rnams bsrung bar byas pa'o// rig sngags kyi
367a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// sems can thams cad dang / bdag ces bya ba srung bar byed// rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing gus par byed pa gang yin pa la/ tshe 'di la yang srung ste/
367a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang yino// mtshams gcad zhes bya ba ni/ mi nang dang / phrugs nang dang / ma rung ba'i nang byung na/ yul 'khor mtshams gcad par bya ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi phur pa la bris nas/ phyogs mtshams
367a6(rgyud 'grel): btags te/ dbus su gcig gdab po// tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bskor zhing / rgyal bas gsungs pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang dag par bzhes te/ de phyogs mtshamasu gang ba'i bum pa bzhag nas/ chu de yang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/
367b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas gtor bar bya'o// de bzhin du byas nas/ phyugs nad dang / mi nad dang / ma rungs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// sngon du byung ba rnams kyang phyir 'byung ste/ phyi nas 'ong ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so// shar
367b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogasu rgyang grags gcig tshun cad mtshams gcad zhes bya ba ni/ ring na rgyang grags gcig tshun chad du mtshams gtsang // gal te phyed tshun cha // tha ma la rang gi yul 'khor tsam mo// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi
367b3(rgyud 'grel): bar du yang rgyang gcig mtshams gcado zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa'i rdzas dang / sngags kyis kyang mtshams gcad par bya ste/ de bzhin du phyogs dang mtshams kyang shes par bya'o// de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ yul de bkra shis pa
367b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ nad rnams kyis mi tshugs shing / lo legs te se rA ba la stsogs pas kyang mi tshug so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa pad+ma'i rigs kyi rin po che'i rigs ma/ mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
367b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o// phung po ni tshor ba'i phung po// chu'i khams sna'i skye mched do// ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ zhal gsum phyag drug gzhal g.yas
367b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po g.yon dmar po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mnga' gzhu 'gengs pa/ bar ma na rin po che/ tha ma na bi con no// g.yon pa'i bar ma na/ dgra sta/ ba ma na zhags pa'o// zhabs
368a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/ gzhon nu'i cha byad can la/ sgeg mo'i tshul dang ldan pa'o// rigs sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ sa mu tsa/ bi mu tsa la sogs
368a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o// yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs dang / mthu rtsa la dang ldan pa 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'khor mtshams gcod
368a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / nang rnams bcom pa dang / 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar du yang / yongs su kya pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'di 'dzin pa gang yang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma
368a4(rgyud 'grel): yang bde ba thob cing yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs
368a5(rgyud 'grel): pas bstan pa nyi ma phyag mtshan dang / tshe dpag med dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya'i gaM gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang rjes
368a6(rgyud 'grel): su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
368b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o// da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad do// zhes
368b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing yang dag par gsungs pa'o// mi mjed kyi bdag
368b3(rgyud 'grel): po tshangs pas kyang bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i lam nas tshangs pa'i ngo bo thob cing / gus pas mchod par bya ste// tshangs pas kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs
368b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// kun dga' bo/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'di bzung
368b5(rgyud 'grel): nas zhes bya ba ni/ rags sngags 'da' lam nas tshangs pa'i ngo bo thob cing / gus pas mchong par bya ste/ tshangs pas kyang rje su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o// kun dga' bo/ dge slong
368b6(rgyud 'grel): ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ rig sngags 'di bzung na ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang /
369a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha ro la phyin pa ste/ de bzhin du 'di yi lam nas sa bcu'i byang chub thob pa'o// ji ltar bstan pa dang ji ltar kun chub
369a2(rgyud 'grel): par byas pa bzhin du shes sam/ zhes bya ba ni/ mi 'gyur ba rdo rje bzhin du bstan hA/ bsam gyis mi bab cing / mnyam nyid kyi ye shes bzhin du sems can la khyab pa'o// nam mkha' bzhin du kun
369a3(rgyud 'grel): la khyob ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la yang me lus par chos kyi khyab pa'o// ye shes kyi spyan gyi rnam par gzigs te/ de ltas pa'i phyir na shes par grags pa'o// mthong ngam
369a4(rgyud 'grel): las byed pa'i de la ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar// srung ba dang / yongs bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes med par
369a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shos thob cing / dper na mun pa'i rlung mi mar btang ba bzhin du bstan te/ yang dag pa ye shes thob cing 'jig rten 'di la yong bsrung zhing stob ste/ shing ljon pa la nyi ma shar ba'i dus su snyan
369a6(rgyud 'grel): der song ba rnams bsil bar byed/ ji srid ma shi'i bar du/ nang dang 'bral zhing dpal dang ldan te/ mya ngan la sogs pa bar zhing bde ba la gnas po'o// de bzhin du phyi ma la yang chos 'di dran zhing
369b1(rgyud 'grel): bde bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka'
369b2(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ mar me mdzod dang / se pa dang / shAkya thub pa la stsogs pas kyang gsungs te/ rje su yi rang zhing rig sngags kyis rgyas btab pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
369b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags chen mo rdza su 'dzin ma 'dis zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o// zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag dang / sems can thams cad dang / 'di 'dzin par byed pa gang yang rung ba la/ srung zhing yongs
369b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyab pa dang / yong su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bong legasu 'gyuraro// shi 'phos nas yang de bzhin te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyuraro// yongasu bsgrub pa dang / zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa bzhin
369b5(rgyud 'grel): du zhi ba dang / bde legs yin te/ sems can de yang ma shi ba'i bar du bde zhing / tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no// mtshams gau tsa do zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams yi ge la bris la mnan par bya ste/ de'i steng
369b6(rgyud 'grel): du yang rig sngag kyi rgyal mo'i gzuT 'di bris la bum pa chen po byas te/ rab tu gnas pa byas nas/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags bris nas/ mchod rten gyi rtse mo btaDa te/ de mthong ba tsam gyi kyang godon gdug pa
370a1(rgyud 'grel): can rnams kyis 'ong mi nus so// ring na rgyang grags gcig ste/ bar ma la rgyung grags phyed/ thung ba la yul 'khor tsam mo// shar phyogs mtshams gcad do// zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/
370a2(rgyud 'grel): du bshad pa bzhin du phyogs mtshams la rig skugs bris pa mchong rten gyi rtse mor gdags par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan
370a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das shAkya thub pas yang nas yang du bka' stsal ba'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi lam dang / lam ma yin pa na gnas po bzhi yod do zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi'i lam ni yul 'khor srung gis lamo nas gnas pa dang /
370a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags skye bo'i lam nas gnas pa dang / spyan mi bzang gi lam nas gnas pa dang / lus ngan po'i lam nas gnas pa dang / de bzhi yang / sku mdog dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu ste/ de bzhin
370a5(rgyud 'grel): du phyag mtshon ni/ 'khor lo dang / dbyug thod dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / ral gri ste/ de yang phyag g.yas pa rnams na rim pa bzhin du'o// pi wang dang rin po che ste/ pad ma dang / bum pa rnams ni/ phyag g.yon pa
370a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams na bsnams pa'o// glang po che dang / rus sbal dang / chu srin dang / seng ge rnams yin te/ de rnams kyi don zhes bya'o// yang na rgyal po bzhi'i lam ni/ rgyal po bzhi po rnams kyis srung ba'i// lam ma yin pa ni/ rgyal
370b1(rgyud 'grel): chechen po rnam kyi bu yin te/ de bzhis kyang rgyal bran dang / 'khor ba la sogs pa bskul zhing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas so// de dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang rnams gnod
370b2(rgyud 'grel): ba skyel te/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu yang de bzhi la 'dus pa'o// de ni 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ldan dang / kun shes dang / gang po dang / dga' ba'i dpal rnams te zhes bya ba ni/ nag po dang / ljang nag dang /
370b3(rgyud 'grel): dmor nag dang / thal ba'i mdog rnams yin te/ de'i gzugs kyang rim pa bzhin du bshad de/ seng ge dang / stag dang / spre'u dang / byi la'o// phyag mtshan yang / gtun shing dang / dbyug tho dang / mdung dang / ral
370b4(rgyud 'grel): gri'o// de ni g.yas pa rnams yin te/ g.yon pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o// gzhon pa de yang gzugs ji bzhin du zhon pa yang de bzhin no// gang de dag gi mi shes pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
370b5(rgyud 'grel): mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i sngags 'don cing / de ngo bos 'dzin par sheswA nA/ rgyal po rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi'i 'khor gyis nad
370b6(rgyud 'grel): btab pa bzhin du/ de rnams kyis kyang nad pa la nad kyis btab pa'o// rgyal po bzhi'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi 'khor dang / g.yog rnams kyis kyang mi nus pa'o// chom
371a1(rgyud 'grel): rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi chom rkun rnams kyang mi 'byung ste/ gal te 'ong bar gyur na/ nor mi rnyed cing long bar 'gyur ro// me'i 'dzugs pa dang zhes
371a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bsrung ba'i gzi brjid kyis grong tsam la yang mi tshugs so// chu'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i nang na rdzings chen po la yod par gyur na/ gar btang na yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro// mi'i
371a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang / mi rgod la sogs pa yin te/ de'i nyes pas kyang 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ste/ mi rgod kyi nang du 'gro yang mi choms so// yang na de kun dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro// mi ma
371a4(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i 'jigs bri mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni lha'i gdon rnams yin te/ de la sogs pa gdon phran tshegs ngan byed la sogs pa yang de/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ba'o// kun
371a5(rgyud 'grel): dgra' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis yang dang yang du gsungs pa'o// lag na rdo rje'i bu pho lag myur zhes bya ba/ grong khyer khor yug tu ces bya ba na gnas pa yod de zhes bya ba ni/ stobs che zhing gzi
371a6(rgyud 'grel): brjid che ba/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi ded dpon/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa/ sku mdog mthing nag/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa ste/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje becon 'dzin cing / g.yon
371b1(rgyud 'grel): pa na sdigs mdzub dang / zhags pa bsnams pa'o// de bzhin du grong khyer yang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa/ gnod sbyin pho mo mang po 'du zhing des sde dpon mdzad pa'o// gang de'i ming shes pa dang / rus shes
371b2(rgyud 'grel): pa de le ni zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ gnod sbyin de rnams 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams kyis kyang de la bsrung bar byas so// de srung bar byed ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags dang / rdo
371b3(rgyud 'grel): rje slob dpon la sogs pa'i dam las ma 'das na/ grogs byed cing / dpal dang ldan par bye'o// yongasu skyob par byed/ yongasu 'dzin par byed/ chad pa bzlog par byed/ zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed ces bya ba ni/
371b4(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs par byed de/ de'i byin brlabs kyis/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa'i las thob cing / nad thams cad las thar zhing / bkra shis par gnas pa'o// ming 'di zhes bya ba'i phyir/ lhag na rdo rje'i bu pho
371b5(rgyud 'grel): lhag myur las lo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du byas te/ bu de yang gnod sbyin la bcol bar gyur na/ byis pa'i gdon rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs te/ gzhan rnams kyis ci smos te/ tshe ring
371b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing nad med pa dang / dus ma yin pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / 'jig rten po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// gsol ba 'debs so// zhes bya ba ni/ rjes su mthun pa'i gtor ma dang / spos
372a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / zhal zas la sogs pa/ mngar gsum dkar gsum la sogs pa byin nas gsol ba yang nas yang du gsol lo// de bzhin byas nas mngon sum du skad cig mas 'khod par
372a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bkas/ gang ming 'di zhes bya ba skabs tshol ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa rnams ni sangs rgyas mar me
