401b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshogs su bcad pa ni 'phags
401b6(rgyud 'grel): khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
402a1(rgyud 'grel): gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad
402a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan par mdzes shing / rin po che rdo rje chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal po bsil ba'i tshal gyis gnas dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas skabs te dang
402a3(rgyud 'grel): po'o// // de'i tshe na zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs pa'i tshe'o// tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzhon nu la rab tu byung ba/ 'dul ba'i bya ba mang po mi shes pa/
402a4(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal gyi khengs shing sangs rgyas kyi sras yin sems nas chos la ma chud do// rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i nags na zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshod brgya yod pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ ro dang / ro langs dang / ce spyang dang /
402a5(rgyud 'grel): stag dang / sbrul dang / seng ge dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / 'byung po rnams kyis ro la ma mthun zhing / phar bgrang tshur bgrad byas shing skad rnam pa sna tshogs 'don pa dang / lce spyang rnams 'thab pa'i skad 'jigs su rung ba
402a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / keng rus dang / mgo dang / lpags pa dang / lag pa'i sor mo dang / rkang pa'i dum bu dang / ro'i dum bu dang / gsal shing la bkyon pa dang / shing la btags nas mgo 'jug bslog pa'i ro dang / man 'gal lcags kyus
402b1(rgyud 'grel): phig nas shing la bkal ba'i ro dang / mtshon gyis dum bur byas shing / kha yo ba dang / mig yar la bltas shing shi ba dang / ro mi gcig pa sna tshogs kyis khengs te/ dur khrod shar na pa tra'i nags tshal yod de/ nags
402b2(rgyud 'grel): tshal gyi nang nas lha'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad gnas pa'o// lho phyogs na dkar rany+dza ka'i nags tshal yod de/ gshin rje dang grul bu ma dang / mkha' 'gro gnas te/ nub phyogs na la da'i nags tshal yin te/ 'dab
402b3(rgyud 'grel): chags bya dang / na mkha' lding dang / klu'i gdon gnas pa'o// byang phyogs na brang ki Ti'i nags tshal yod de/ nags tshal de'i nang na/ gnod sbyin dang / sha za dang / gdon ma rungs po thams cad gnas pa'o// shar lho mtshams
402b4(rgyud 'grel): na tsu ta'i nags tshal yod de/ me lha dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed la sogs pa'i gdon rnams gnas pa'o// lho nub mtshams na u dum ba ro'i nags tshal yod de/ de'i nang na srin po'i gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon la sogs
402b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// nub byang gi mtshams na naM gro d+ha'i nags tshal la rlung gi gdon dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa gnas pa'o// byang shar gyi mtshams na ta la'i nags tshal yod de/ de'i nang na dbang ldan gyi gdon dang / 'byung po thams
402b6(rgyud 'grel): cad gnas pa'o// de bzhin du de dag la sogs pa shing sna tshogs kyis khengs shing 'byung po dang / sha za dang / ro langs dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / khrung khrung dang / de bzhin du
403a1(rgyud 'grel): ka ran+da la sogs pa yung / rtag tu 'gyur zhing ka ro la rgod ste/ gzhan yang bya la stsogs pa skad sna tshogs 'dron pas 'jigs su rung ste/ sa srin dang / sa bdag la sogs pa yang de bzhin te/ dngos grub thob pa dang /
403a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs med po dang / ro'i rgod zhing za 'dod pa'i tshogs dang / dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom pa yang sha stag go// yi dgas dang / sha za dang / bya dang / rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs kyis hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing / hI hi dang /
403a3(rgyud 'grel): hahaM dang / kI li kI li'i sgra sgrogs shing / 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na 'byung po rnams gnas so// de nas dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshul gyi shar phyogs na/ de nas dpag tshad ldan/ na lin+d+ra'i grong khyer chen po'i//
403a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i lho phyogs dpag tshad gnyis na/ grong khyer yangs pa can gnas pa'o// de'i nub phyogs dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis nu ka ling ka'i grong khyer gnas pa'o// de'i byang phyogs nA/ dpag tshad gcig la bya rgod kyi phung po dang / rgyal po'i khab
403a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// bya rgod phung po dang / rgyal po'o khab kyi bar na rgyung grags gcig go/ de bzhin du grong dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / ljong so dang / gzhan yang mang po'o// bud shing chen po su'i phyogs ni 'dug go zhes bya ba ni/ nga rgyal che zhing
403a6(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos tsam lo 'gran te/ nga yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sras yin sems nas/ thos pa mi byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba mi 'bul zhing / rang mthong gi nga rgyal gyis/ ngas ni dgra bcom pa grub par bya yi snyam
403b1(rgyud 'grel): nas dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du phyin to// der 'di lta ste zhes pa ni/ bsgom mo snyam nas bsdad pa dang / ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis mtshe bar byas so// lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang
403b2(rgyud 'grel): drang srong gang gnas pa// de dag thams cad mi bzad cing // 'jigs pa'i sems kyis nyan byed pa// bye ba stong gi lha dag dang // bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang // lha'i bu mo bskal chen dang / sa sa nga b+ha gca de/ lag s+t+wa da / lha min bye
403b3(rgyud 'grel): ba khrag brgyad dang // de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul la// de bzhin skad kyang sna tshogs 'don// gzhon nu sgra zin rtsar bsdang nas// 'tshe bar byas te sdig pa rnams// lha'i gdon rnams dang lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams/
403b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang / 'dus tu mi ster zhing drags shul bstan no// klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnas na rgya mtsho dang / klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros dang / dga' bo nye dga' gnyis po dang
403b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje blo gros pak+Shu dang / gaM gA 'ga' bo sin+d+hu mtsho// bya yi rgyal po 'dab bzangs dang // rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug byed dang // rigs ni klu ni klu bzhi dang // sa srin sa bdag za byed dang // ma rungs byed cing khro ba dang // dug pa byed cing 'tshe byed dang // stong
403b6(rgyud 'grel): phrag bye ba'i klu yi gdon// bye ba brgya'i klu dag dang // de yi bu mo bskal chen rnams// rtag tu sems can gnod par byed// gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa// snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba// gsus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/
404a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che la sgra yang che// mag+nin bcu po la mig stong po// gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams// 'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste// lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs// sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang // lag
404a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs// lag na mtshon dang mi lpags thogs// rdo rje bdud rtsi lag na thogs// rab tu grags pa'i gtan brgal nas// phyogs kun tu ni grags par byed// de yi gnas na 'khod pa yi// za ba po ni rtag tu bskyangs// mi
404a3(rgyud 'grel): yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu// skyes pa bud med rnams kyang 'dzin// sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la// rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs// gnod sbyin de dag ma rungs pa// sems can rnams la 'tsho bar byed// gzhon nu sgra zin
404a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa la// drags shul gyis ni gnod pa byas// klu'i gdon dang gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis bsgom par mi ster zhing drags shul gyis 'tshe bar byas so zhes bya ba'o// srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba
404a5(rgyud 'grel): nI/ mi 'am tsaM dang srin po dang // rnam pa sna tshogos gzugs bstan pa// kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe// lus dang 'brel ba dag tu snang // rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos// rgyu ma'i 'phreng bas kun tu bkra shis// rtse gsum mdung
404a6(rgyud 'grel): gis rab 'debs shing // srog chags rnams la gnod par byed// mi bzad pa yi dbugs 'byin cing // skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed// srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed pa// sna tshogs kyis ni gzugs su snang // kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs
404b1(rgyud 'grel): la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs// bgegs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te// dbyugs pas bsdigs shing kha drag po// mig byung ba la bzhin mi sdug/ srin po so ni rno ba dang // sna dang rna ba bcas pa dang // lde gtsang gdon ni gnyer ma
404b2(rgyud 'grel): can// rkang lag dag ni 'khums pa dang // mgo bo gcad pa'i sbyin po rnams// skabs ni rab tu 'chol bar byed// sdig pa can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog/ mi dag gi ni lus rnams la// rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang // spu yi bar
404b3(rgyud 'grel): dang gnad rnams dang // de bzhin ma yi kha rnams zlum// srin po 'a mi ci'i gdon rnams kyis// 'tshe ba bar du byas pa'o// srin po dang mi 'am ci'i gdon gyis// gzhon nu sgra gucan zin la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan
404b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing // gnod pa skyel ba'o// lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto 'phye dri za'i gdon rnams kyis// snying rje can cing 'tsho byed pa// rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin na// gzhon nu de la 'tshe bar byed//
404b5(rgyud 'grel): rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su// la las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs// byi wang gling bu 'khor rnga dang // lto 'phye rnams ni sgra 'byin te// rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang // glu dang gar rnams byas nas su// gzhon nu dA la 'tshe bar byed// lha
404b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phye'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams kyis kyang / gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la sgra sna tshogs kyi skad kyis 'chi bar byed pa'o// mau ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yi mngon na
405a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa yi// mi ma yin dang rlung lha'i gdon// lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa// rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa// rkang pa bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis// rkang pa bsgreng la spyi gtsug dang // lus myangs mgo bo gcig pa
405a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang // mig mangs po la lus phyed dang // mig gcig lto ba bcu gnyis dang // bong pu rnga mo glang chen mgo/ lag pa sgreng lnga mgo btud dang // mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag/ mtshon
405a3(rgyud 'grel): cha'i rkang pa mi ma yin// zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyis so// zangs kyi migau dang zangs kyi lag/ zangs kyi sna dang lcags kyi kha// rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang // mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams// sgur zhar lag pa gsum yod pa//
405a4(rgyud 'grel): mig mi sdug la kha glal ba// chu srin dag gi gzugs dang ni// gzugs mi sdug la kha ral po// mchu 'chings po dang so yon po// rab tu sdug pa khro gnyer can// gsus po che dang bum sna po// rnam 'phyangs pa dang rna ba med// lag ring
405a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni rna ba ring // sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring // lus bskams lus ni ring ba dang // skra rings rab tu brgyan pa dang // rkang pa mying pa phra ba dang // dri nga ba dang bum lto bo// yanu lag chu srin 'dri ba dang // mau ma yin dang rlung lha de// mdun
405a6(rgyud 'grel): la rgyu zhing lus ngan bstan// sems can thams cad 'tshe byed pa// gzhon nu'i lus la 'tshe bar byed// mi ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams kyis kyang // sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan cing gzhon nu'i lus la 'tshe bar
405b1(rgyud 'grel): byas so// yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ yi dgas 'byung po'i gdon rnams kyis// phyogs bzhi la ni gdon byed pa// mig sdug gzugs ni bstan nas su// drag po'i tshul gyis
405b2(rgyud 'grel): sgra yang 'byin// shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshul bstan nas// gtun shing tho ba 'dro ba'i lho// rnam lto ba la rna bo che// gyen du brdzes sgra rab tu dmar// mgo che la mjug rings po// skem po sgur po bum lto ba// ri rab rtse ma 'gul
405b3(rgyud 'grel): nas su// me 'dag gi ni char pa 'bebs// ljon shing ri rab rdo pa dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba// dung dang rnga tshan rtswa rnga dang // 'byung po yi dgas rnams kyis rdung // shin tu mi srun thal mdog 'dra// mgul ba
405b4(rgyud 'grel): chu la bcug pa'i mdog/ khrag la dga' zhing shaM la dga'// bzhin mi sdug cing gzugs che ba// kengs rus gzugs ni sgra rings po// mig yo kha yo mgo gnyis pa// skyes pa bud med gnod byas nas// gzi brjid 'phrog
405b5(rgyud 'grel): cing srog kyang 'phrog/ phyogs bzhi dag nas gnod pa po// gzhon nu sgra zin 'tshe bar byas// yi dgas kyi gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams kyis gzhon nu sgra zin la phyogs bzhi nas byas so// sha za'i gdon rnams
405b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za grul bum gdon rnams ni// stobs dang ldan zhing lus ngan po// gsus po che la mgo bo che// mig zlum sna ni sbrul 'dra ba// li la chu srin sna 'dra ste// skad
406a1(rgyud 'grel): cig tsam gyis gang yang khyab// sa g.yo byed cing ri rab bskul// ma rungs pa ni 'bebs byed pa// ke ba che la sgra yang 'byin// la la mi lpags thogs nas su// sems can rnams la 'tshe bar
406a2(rgyud 'grel): byed// mi yi gzugs la zhugs nas su// mdze yi nang rnams gtong ba'i bdag/ de bzhin phran tshegs nod gtong ba// sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed// mi yI gzugs la zhugs nas su// mdze yi nung
406a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams gtong ba'i bdag/ de bzhin phran tshegs nad gtong ba// sems can rnams la gnod par byed// grul bum rnga bram rnams kyi sgra// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin// ming po che la bong bu'i sgra// nag po sngon
406a4(rgyud 'grel): po ser po dang // dmar ser me ltar dmar ser dang // khyab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i skra// dmar po khrig gi bskus pa rnams// mi ro dag ni khyer nas su// za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug/ so gnon lag pa dmar po dang
406a5(rgyud 'grel): mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang // lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang // mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis// snyim pa shin tu gang ba dang // byin pa dag ni za bzhin du// mer mer po dang srog chags kyis// rkang lag rnams
406a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi stobs kyang 'phrog/ keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su// skye bo mang po skrag par byed// khrag gis rab tu gang ba yis// mi yi lpags pa thogs nas su// mi zad dug gis kun bskus te// phyogs phyogs dag tu
406b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyug/ grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang // khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed// sha za grul bum gdon rnams ni// gzhon
406b2(rgyud 'grel): nu de la gnod par byed// sha zla grul bum gdon rnams kyis// rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nad btab la// rnam par 'tshe bar byas so// gzigs rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur dang
406b3(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par 'khrul zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs// seng ge dang ni stag dang rta// ma ha ba lang bong bu dang // glang po che'i gzugs 'dra dang // dom dang gzig dang spyad ku dang // khyi dang
406b4(rgyud 'grel): we dang ra dag dang // byi la byi ba spre'u gzugs// bas dang phag dang dred mo dang // nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs// kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs// khra dang 'ug pa khu yug dang // bya rog khra dang nya ming can
406b5(rgyud 'grel): rma bya ngang pa thi ba dang // khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang // kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su// gdon rnams la ni mi yis mthong // 'dab bzang bya yi tshul gyis kyang // skye bo mang po skyug por byed// kha cig mi
406b6(rgyud 'grel): yi mgo can la// lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra// kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tsho// lus dang bral ba dag tu snang // sa dang bar snang phyogs dag tu// khongs nas sems can byung ba ste// gzhon nus lus la rnam par za//
407a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdad ba gang dang gang rnams su// sems can rnams kyis 'dug mi sbyar// bar snang tshogs nas byung nas su// gzhon nu'i lus la 'tshe bar byas// gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la dur khrod bsil ba'i
407a2(rgyud 'grel): tshal du 'dug mi ster zhing / lus la 'tshe bar byed pa'o// gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin gyi sems cani rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ zhags pa ral gri 'dzin rnams dang // mnga' gzhu mdung rnams thogs nas su// sku 'dzings/
407a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdud spyi gtsug tu// khro bo'i tshul du bstan pa ste// zhi ba'i tshul du mi ston to// mi rgod mang po der byung nas// bsdigs shing tshogs par byed pa ste// khrid pa'i tshul ni bstan nas su// mtshon gyi gdengs zhing bsdigs par/
407a4(rgyud 'grel): byed// sems can thams cad gnod byed pa// mi rgod de rnams sdig pa can// lha dang klu dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin// nya ni gsum pa'i smyo byad dang // de bzhin du ni ri dgas dang // 'jig rten 'tshe ba/
407a5(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa// gnod sbyin srin po ma 'angos rnams// 'dir ni 'khod de gzhon nu la// drag shul gyis ni gnod byed do// gzhan yang bya rog 'ug pa dang // bya gago bya la sogs pa yi// bar snang dag la 'tshe bar byas// gnod
407a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin srin po ma rungs rnams// 'dir ni 'khod de gzhon nu la// drag shul gyis ni gnod byed do// gzhan yang bya rig 'ug pa dang // bya gag bya la sogs pa yis// bar snang dag la 'tshe bar byed// gdon rnams de rnams dag
407b1(rgyud 'grel): gis ni// log par bstan nus 'tshe byed pa// bud med dag dang skyes pa dang // de bzhin bu pho bu mo dang // mngal na gnas pa'ang 'jigs par byed// dud 'gro'i skyes gnas gtogs pa'ang 'tshe// skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang //
407b2(rgyud 'grel): gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid// lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang // me tog sman dang zas skom dang // mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing // mthon po rnams ni dma' bar byed// 'jig rten dag na rmongs pa'i rnams// dmag
407b3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'thab mo sha gnyer dang // tshig gam gzhig gam gsad bya ba// de kun 'byung po'i rnam par bsgyur// sbed cing gtong bar byed pa dang // log par byed cing dgod par bgyed// 'jigs par byed cing lta bar bgyis// dgrar 'gyur ba
407b4(rgyud 'grel): yang ston par bgyid// sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid// nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid// sgo nas se gol sgra phyung zhing // mi snyan brjod de za bar bgyid// mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu// dga' zhing bka' mchid smra
407b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyid// bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu// 'dod par spyod par dga' bar bgyid// nyi ma skar mo'i gzugs dang ni// zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid// rlung dang skar mnga' lce gzugs su// de la gnod par byed par gda'//
407b6(rgyud 'grel): skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag/ 'jigs par bgyid pa wa dong khyir// rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang // mchod rten dag gi gnas na gda'// skyes pa gzhon nu gzugs mdzes pas// 'bar zhing shing rta sgra yang 'byin// gnang
408a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang ni shul dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston// grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyis// sgo yang gdon chen de dag 'byed// srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyid cing // lam ngan kun tu bskor bar bgyid//
408a2(rgyud 'grel): ma pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams// lus la na bar gnas par ston// nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid// ji snyed 'jig
408a3(rgyud 'grel): nga bzhin dag/ thams cad log par de dge ston// de bzhin log par bstan byed pa// 'jig rten la ni 'jigs par byed// 'tshe ba sgra zin gzhon nu la// phyin ci log cing gnod par byed// gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la gnod pa
408a4(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyis/ zhe sdang byas shing 'tshe bar byas so// tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin lo ni shin tu gces so// zhes bya ba ni/ dug lnga khong du shar bas zhe sdang byas shing nga rgyal che ba dang / ma shes par shes par smra ba/ ma mnyan pa mnyan/
408a5(rgyud 'grel): par smra ba/ rang gi rigs pas smra zhing gzhan la bston pa/ bla ma la mi zhu zhing / rang rig gis bstan pa dang / bla ma'i rig pa bzhag cing / rang rag smra ba dang / lung dang bka' la mi ston cing / rang gi nga rgyal gyis rang bzo byas pa dang /
408a6(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma la mnar med du skye ste/ tshe 'di la yang gdon de rnams kyis 'tshe bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa'o// de bzhin du gzhon nu sgra gcan zin yang / skad sna tshogs 'byin cing gzugs sna tshogs ston cing gdon rnams kyis phar then tshur
408b1(rgyud 'grel): then byas shing / rang gi lus la rang dbyung med do// gzhon nu sgra gcan zin de 'jig par byed cing 'dar te/ lus la yang na tshas thebs te/ bcom ldan 'das dran zhing skad sna tshogs 'byin zhing kyi hud kyi hud zer
408b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol lo// chos la skyabs su gsol lo// dge 'dun la skyabs su gsol lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / gdon rnams kyi len cig bzhag go/ bzhag ma thag tu bsil ba'i tshal nas bros
408b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ bros ma thag tu gdon rnams kyis ded pa dang / gzhon nu sgra gcan zin mdog shor zhing / ba spu yang gyen la log ste/ hAg zad cing 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo // rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshul
408b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gdon gyis zin pa'i gnas skabs te/ gnyis pa'o// // de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyi zin pa'i de nas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom
408b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhes bya ba ni/ gdon thams cad kyis 'tshe bar byas pas/ 'jigs shing mdog kyang shor ste/ ba spu rnams gyen du log cing / g.yengs twe phar lta tshur lta byas shing / gdon
408b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang phyir 'brang ngo // sems so// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bag chags dang shes bya'i dri ma thams cad 'joms pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad
409a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de kho na nyid kyi ye shes khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ces pa rdo rje'i seng ge pad+ma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs te/ bya rgod phung po'i ri gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin gyi gzhi la/
409a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang mi dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i spyan sngar 'jigs shing / lus po thams cad bdar ba dang kha nas dbugs
409a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'thon to// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhes bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gdon gyis btab pa'i 'jigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la gus par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus
409a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ mchi ma blugs so zhes bya ba ni/ gdon gyis btab po'i yul gyis/ kyi hud kyi hud zer zhing dbyar gyi char bzhin du gdong gi mchi ma mi thub bo// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhon nu sgra gau can zin yul che ba de nas so// bcom
409a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi bya ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi lo rgyus thugs kyis mkhyen nas/
409a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi don la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa'i/ zhes sgra gcan 'dzin khyod ci'i phyir nga'i mdun du 'dug nas mchi ma klog ces bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams
409b1(rgyud 'grel): cad skad cig mas thugs su chud nas/ des tshig gi gtam dris pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la smras pa'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
409b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nges tshig gi gautam smras shing zhus pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal nags na zhes
409b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / bsil ba'i tshal gyi bar na dpag tshad gcig yod de/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i lho phyogs na ro thams cad bskyal ba'i sa/ rnam rtog gsum bcom pa'i bsil
409b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul lo// rnam rtog gsum dang / bsil ba'i tshal ni nges tshig gang gi phyir zhe na/ bsil ba'i tshal de yang / 'jigs pa'i sgra'i rnam par rtog pa byung ste/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgom zhing / byams
409b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs kyis 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o// rnam par rtog pa de spangs pas 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin de mi 'byung ngo // ngo tsha'i rnam par rtog pa ni yi dgas dang / ro yang gcer bur gnas te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten
409b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams kyi sems can yang mi rtag ste/ de'i ngo bor bzhag nas 'jig rten gyi khaMs sgyu ma lta bu yin te/ de'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bo tsha ba'i rnam rtog dang 'bral ba'o// skyug bro ba'i rnam rtog ni dur khrod bsil ba'i
410a1(rgyud 'grel): tshal de la yang 'byung ste/ ro'i rnam pa mi gcig pa dang / sha dang khrag dang klad pa la sogs pas khengs pa'i sa gzhi yin te/ de bzhin du rang gi lus la rnag dang mchil ma dang rgyu ma dang gci ba
410a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yang 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mi rtag cing rnam par rtog pa med do// bsil ba'i tshal ni rnam par rtog pa gsum dang bral zhing / yang dag pa'i ye shes de nas de byung ste/ dngos grub thams cad kyis gzhi byang
410a3(rgyud 'grel): chub thob pa'i lam/ sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa/ sems can thams cad dug gsum gyi rang bzhin gyis rnam par rtog pa dang 'bral bar byed pas na bsil ba'i tshal yin te/ de bzhin du lus
410a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid zhi bar byed pas na/ bsil ba'i tshal yin zhes/ yang na bsil ba'i tshel ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang 'bral ba'i phyir ro// bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis na zhes bya ba ni/ dug lnga'i rang bzhin gyis nga
410a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dang zhe sdang byos te/ de bzhin du gti mug kyang shas che zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mi zhu zhing bdag dgra bcom pa thob par bya snyam nas bsil ba'i tshal du mtshos so// zhes smras so// der zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil
410a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshal gyis dbus su bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad myong ba zhes pa'o// lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi gdon yang gzugs sna tshogs ston cing / lha'i
410b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor pho dang / lha'i 'khor mo sna tshogs pa bye ba stong gi lha dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang / de bzhin du lha ma yin gyis kyang 'tshe bar byas so// zhes pa'o// klu'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon
410b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i nad thams cad gtong zhing / gnod sbyin gyi gzugs sna tshogs bstan te/ de bzhin du bye ba stong gi klu dang / bye ba stong gi gnod sbyin dang / bye ba phrag brgya'i klu'i
410b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yog dang thabs gcig tu 'tshe bar byas so// srin po'i gdon rnams dang mi 'am ci'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha khrag la dga' zhing / gdon de gnyis ni dpon g.yog dang bcas shing / bye ba stong dang / bye ba phrag
410b4(rgyud 'grel): brgya'i gdon rnams kyis kyang bdag la 'tshe bar byas so zhes pa'o// dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ glu len zhing bro rdung zhing sgra sna tshogs ston tu/ gdon de gnyis ni
410b5(rgyud 'grel): bye bo phrag brgya 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa byung ste/ de bzhin du bdag la gnod pa bskyal zhes bya ba'o// mi'i gdan rnams dang / rlung lho'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang na/ gzu
410b6(rgyud 'grel): dang sgra sna tshogs byas shing byung ba ste/ de bzhin du g.yog dang 'khor mang po 'dus shing sgom du mau ster ba'o// yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de gnyis kyang mi sdug
411a1(rgyud 'grel): cing / mdun du ltar byung ste/ gzugs sna tshogs ston cing sgra sna tshogs ston pa'o// sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gsus pa tshal mgo che ba mang
411a2(rgyud 'grel): po 'dus nas byung ste/ gdon de rnams kyis kyang phyogs bzhi nas 'tshe bar byas pa'i// gzig rnams dang bya rog rnams dang / 'ag pa rnams dang / grog blar rnams dang / sdig sgrol rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa dang bar
411a3(rgyud 'grel): snang la rgyu ba'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang lus la 'tshe bar byas shing / bdag la na tsha byung ngo zhes pa'o// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis/ bdag shin tu gtses pa lags mod kyi zhes bya ba ni/ mi
411a4(rgyud 'grel): rmid mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa dang / gzhan yang bgegs ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang / gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la sdug bsngal thams cad myong zhing 'tshe bar byas so zhes pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan zin
411a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis smras pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don dmigs la 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i nang du khyu mchog dang seng ge'i
411a6(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs pa'o// sgra gcan zin khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni/ gti mug gi rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal dang / phrog dog byas te da yang khyod kyis ma byed cig ces rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal be con chen po zhes bya
411b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ rig sngags ni chos sku ste/ bsil ba'i tshal ni longs sku'o// tshal ni sprul sku ste/ be con ni chad pa thams cad dang 'bral bar byed pa'o// de bzhin ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa stong pa ste/ ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing brjod
411b2(rgyud 'grel): du med pa'o// sngags ni ma man+ta ste skyob pa dang bsrung ba'o// de yang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// bsil ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin te/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin/ yod pa yang min pa yang min/ gnyis ka yang ma
411b3(rgyud 'grel): yin no// tshal nI sbrul sku ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la dus cig tu na mkha' khyab pa bzhin du khyab bya'o// be con gyi lha'i gdon rnams kyi chad pa dang 'jig rten 'di'i rgyal po dang / rkun mo dang chu dang
411b4(rgyud 'grel): me la sogs pa'i tshod pa dang / gzhan yang gshin rje dang 'khor ba nas 'bral te/ de sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bas no be con zhes bya ba'o// yang na bsil ba'i tshal ni lus ngag yid zhi bar byas te/ 'khor ba'i sngags sngal
411b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang 'bral bar byed pa'o// gzungs kyi rig sngags zhes bya ba ni/ gzungs ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gzungs te/ de yang dag par bzung zhing / stong pa nyid la sems bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad l-i byams
411b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang snying rjes khyab pa'o// 'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i sar 'khor ba'o// dge slong rnams dang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'o// dge slong ma
412a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dgra gcan zin gyi ma dang / dge slong ma lnga brgya la sogs pa'o// dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po men po ma skyes dgra dang / btsun mo la
412a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o// bsrung ba dang / bskyob pa dang / sba ba dang / yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang bar gyur na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral zhing bang
412a3(rgyud 'grel): ba thob pa'o// lha dang mis kyang de bzhin zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ gzugs khams kyi lha dang / 'dod khams kyi lha dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la gus par byed pa'i mi rnams kyis/ rig sngags 'di zung zhig ces
412a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid gang zhe na/ shes rab dang thabs yin te/ 'dir ni shes rab kyi ngo bo las/ thabs kyi ngo bor mi snang ngo zhes pa'o// slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa ni/ mtshon pa dag ni ye shes te/ mtshon byed
412a5(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags rgyal mo la// phyag mtshan sku mdog bstan pa de// thabs kyi ngo bo de bzhin no// de bzhin du bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mtshon pa ni shes rab bo// rig sngags nyid bsgom pa ni/ thabs kyi ngo bo nyid yin te/ de yang mtshon
412a6(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'o// de'i phyir na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o// de'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni gang zhe na/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa sku mdog ljang gu sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan can/ spyan gsum pa zhal g.yas
412b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po/ g.yon dmar ba lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa phyag g.yas pa'i gsum na/ rul gri dang / skyabs sbyin dang rin po che sted na rdo rje'o// g.yon pa gsum na/ bum+b+ha pa'i steng na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang lcags
412b2(rgyud 'grel): kyu'o// zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o// rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid las kyi rigs rlung gi khams/ lus kyi skye mched traM gi yig 'bru
412b3(rgyud 'grel): las ye shes lnga 'phros sems can thams cad kyi don byas so// rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshig ni las kyi snying po ste/ 'di lta ste/ aM gA baM gA baM la sogs pa'o// rgyal po dbang po dang zhes bya ba ni
412b4(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin yin te/ zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog ser po/ spyan gsum pa la dpral ba'i mig phreng las yod pa/ lha'i dbu rgyan la sogs pas brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang mnga'o// g.yon pa gnyis
412b5(rgyud 'grel): na gdugs dang gzhu bsnams pa'o// glang po che la zhon pa'o// rgyal po gshin rje dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog nag po khro bo'i tshul du bstan po dbu la sgra thor tshugs can g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang
412b6(rgyud 'grel): be con 'dzin pa/ g.yo ni gnyis na zhags pa dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// ma he la zhon pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ste/ sku mdog dkar po go cha gyon pa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ g.yas
413a1(rgyud 'grel): pa na ral gri g.yon pa na ri bong gi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// rnga mo dkar po'i shing rta la zhon pa'o// rgyal po chu lha dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dkar po sbrul gyi gdengs ka
413a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i dang po na pad+ma dmar po ste/ 'og ma rin po che'o// g.yon pa dang po na sbrul gyi zhugs pa 'og ma na bum pa bsnoms pa ste/ chu srin lo zhon pa'o// rgyal po dang nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal
413a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig sku mdog dmar po/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa/ g.yas na ral gri g.yon pa na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// shing rta dang bcas shing nA mkha' la rgyu ba'o// rgyal po rlung lho dang bcas
413a4(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog sngo skya phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ba dan dang lcags kyu bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis ni rlung 'khyil pa dang bum pa bsnams shing shA ba l-i zhon pa'o// rgyal po gzi can
413a5(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste/ sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas na sbrul zhags 'dzin cing / g.yon na a 'bras 'dzin cing ku bai ra la zhon pa'o// rgyal po sems shing bya ba ni/ dpa' ba sangs yin te/ zhal
413a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yas na bum pa spyi blugs g.yon pa phreng ba bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po gshin rje'i dbyug to can zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog
413b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar nag phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ ral gri dang tho ba bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na/ zhags pa dang sdig mdzub mdzad cing / ro langs la zhon pa'o// rgyal po me'i dbyug tho can zhes bya ba ni/ me lha'i dbang po yin te/
413b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rtse gcig dang bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa me 'bar ba dang phreng ba bsnams pa skyes pa zhon pa'o// rgyal po dbyug tho can dang zhes
413b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni mig dmar yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po khro bo/ g.yas na da byug to mig can 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa na mi mgo sdigs mdzub bsnams pa'o// ra dmar po la zhon pa'o// rgyal po rgyal
413b4(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba ni spen pa yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas nA pe ti bsnams pa/ g.yon bum pa bsnams pa/ brag gi gud nA la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba ni/ phur
413b5(rgyud 'grel): bu yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku maudog mthing nag phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda'i gzhu bsnams shing glang po li zhon pa'o// rgyal po 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ lag pa yin te/ zhal gcig phyag
413b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang nag phyag g.yas na ral gri g.yon no sdig 'dzub rus sbal la zhon pa/ rgyal po rnam par gzigs dang zhes bya ba ni/ rA hU la yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog nag po ro smad
414a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na zla ba dang nyi ma bsnams pa/ sprin gyi gdun la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po 'byung po zhes bya ba ni/ dbang ldan yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ thal ba'i mdog
414a2(rgyud 'grel): can spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rtse gsum dang bum pa spyi blugis bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na phreng ba dang / a 'bras bsnams pa/ glang la zhon pa'o// rgyal po yul 'khor srung bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po
414a3(rgyud 'grel): yin to// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas gau yon gnyis na 'khor lo'i dang mchod rten bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gad ni la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum
414a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog mthing ka/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ dbyug tho dang tho ba bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis na rin po che dang rtse gsum bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o//
414a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma/ gnyis pa dgra sta g.yon dang po na sbrul gyi zhags pa gnyis pa dung bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan
414a6(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po lus ngan po zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog ljang gu/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri/ 'og ma na dbyug to/ g.yon pa ni ne le/ 'og ma na bum
414b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog ser po/ spyan gsum pa phyag g.yas na dbyug tho gsum/ 'og ma mchod sbyin/ g.yon
414b2(rgyud 'grel): dang po na 'phreng ba/ 'og ma na bum pa spyi blugs/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rje/ chos kyi rgyal po 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
414b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rnams yin te/ de yang chos sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku yin te/ 'dir yang sbrul sku'i rang bzhin ni thugs rje che zhing sems can gyi don la bshad de/ zhal gcig phyag
414b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ sku mdog 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ sa gnon gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rab tu byung ba'i cha byang du bzhugs pa/ dus gcig tu sems can gyi don la snying rjes
414b5(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'o// bdag dang sems can thams cad la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa 'chang ba gang yin pa de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang srung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang
414b6(rgyud 'grel): bral te/ bla na med pa yang dag pa'i bde ba thob pa'o// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin no// yongs su bskyal ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur pa dang / chad pa spang ba
415a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / mtshon cha sbyang ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / drug gzhil ba dang / mtshams gcang pa dang sa bcing ba mdzad du gsol/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la gus par byas
415a2(rgyud 'grel): na'achang ba dang / klog pa dang sbrum pa la sogs pa byas te/ de bzhin du de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bar bya'o zhes pa'o// rig sngags ni gang zhe na/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa ste/ mtshon pa ni bya ba na
415a3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bdag nyid do// de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam par dag pa'o// gzhi bstan pa ni rnam par thar pa'i ye shes lnga dang ldan pa ste/ mtshon pa ni bya ba
415a4(rgyud 'grel): nan tan gyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi bdag nyid do// de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa/ zhal bzhi bstan pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i dag pa'o// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan ni/ gau ti
415a5(rgyud 'grel): mug la sogs pa dug lnga bcom nas/ ye shes lnga shar ba'i rnam par dag pa'o// spyan gsum dang ldan pa ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis mun pa mun nag bcom nas 'khor ba thams cad las thar par byed pa'o// zhal nag po dang
415a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po bstan pa ni/ mngon spyod dang / zhi ba dang dbang dang rgyas pa'i las bzhi bstan pa'o// khro bo dang / zhi khro ba dang / zhi ba dang / skegs pa dang / rgod pa ni sems can mi gcig pa'i theg pa sna
415b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bstan pa'o// sku mdog nag po ni byams pa chen po ldan pa'i rnam par dag pa'o// rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag par dag pa ni/ phyag brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rnam par dag
415b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// g.yas dang po na ral gri ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin blo deman pa rnams la blo 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'og ma na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa ni/ sems can ma rig pa'i las las thar bar byed pa'o// de'i 'og ma na dgu sta bsnam/
415b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ 'khor ba rnams la gcod par byed pa'o// tha ma na mda' bsnams pa ni/ thabs kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'o// g.yon pa'i dang po na 'gas pa bsnams pa ni/ 'khor ba na gnas pa'i sems can 'dren pa'o// de'i 'og mas
415b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bsnams pa ni/ gti mug lo sogs pa'i dug lnga gcod pa'o// de'i 'og ma na rtse gsum bsnams pa ni/ srid pa gsum 'joms par byed pa'o// tha ma na gzhu bsnams pa nI/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o//
415b5(rgyud 'grel): zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa ni/ bdud bzhi rnam par bcom pa'i brda'o// pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni// chos nga'i nyams myong 'khor ba thams cad las thar ba'o// nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ni/ rig sngags kyi bya ba
415b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan nas/ khro bo'i tshul du sems can ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'o// rig sngags kyi snying po gang na na/ 'di lta ste/ pA la bA ti tsar ma ti la sogs pa'o// sgra gcan be con chen po'i gzugs kyi rig sngags zhes bya ba/
416a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa/ chad pa thams cad 'joms pa/ las thams cad las kyang thar pa ste/ rig sngags 'di ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba/ mthu che zhing dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad
416a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rig pa'i phyag rgya'o// rig sngags 'di bzung na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par byed pa'o// brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di skud pa las btags sam zhes bya ba ni/ skud pa sngon po bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje rigs la sogs
416a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bu mo lo brgyad nas bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar gyis gos gtsang ma gon zhing khrus legs par byas te/ kha zas dkar po la brten cing kha lho phyogs su bstan pa la bkal bar bya'o// rig sngags re re la mdud pa re re byor te/
416a4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags dang mdud pa ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o// de bzhin du byas na/ gdon thams cad las thar pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// mgul lam lus som lag pa la brtag na zhes bya ba ni/ glo ga 'am
416a5(rgyud 'grel): shing shun nam/ ras sam/ dar la sogs pa la bris nas mgul du btags te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'am/ mchod rten gyi rtse mo 'am/ rnga la sogs pa la btags pas kyang / thos pa tsam gyis kyang srung por 'gyur te/ mthong
416a6(rgyud 'grel): pab tsam yang bsrung ngo // kun nas dpag tshad brgya kho ra yug tu zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi yul du 'gro na yang rang gi yul gyi srung ba byas pas kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rig sngags 'di mthu che zhing gzi brjid tsha ba
416b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o// dr-i 'am me tog rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung bzhin du mchod par byas te cho gar byas te/ bzung bar byas te/ 'a
416b2(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa gus par byas na/ de 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya rnams kyis de srung bar byas par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang / tshe 'di dang phyi
416b3(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams la yang srung bar byed de/ 'di'i lam las yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o// de lo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di 'chang ba ste/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob cing / da ltar yang chad pa la sogs pa thams cad dang
416b4(rgyud 'grel): 'brel ba'o// mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni/ mi ni rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / mi rgod dang gnyen bshos la sogs pas lta phye ba'i chad pa dang / gzhan yang 'jigs pa thams cad dang
416b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bral ba'o// mi ma yin pa rnams ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa ma rungs pa rnams yin te/ chu dang me'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o// mtshon dang dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ g.yul 'gyed pa dang / glo bur du 'thab
416b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ des mi tshugs shing dug rnam pa gsum gyis kyang mi tshugs so// nad dang rims rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdze las gyur pa la sogs pa dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rlung dang ldan pa dang / 'dus pa
417a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i nang ngo // rims drug po dang / zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi 'dus pa yin te/ de bzhin du rlung shas che zhing gzhu bzhin du gug ste/ mnga' btang ba bzhin du rengs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags
417a2(rgyud 'grel): dang gsang sngags dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi stong gtong btang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi rigs pa sprad pa dang / de bzhin du gsang sngags gshin rje dang / ma mo dang / 'jig rten gyi ngan sngags kyis kyang myi tshugs pa'o// ro lang sde dang /
417a3(rgyud 'grel): khyo dug dang zhes bya ba nI/ rigs pa mkhan pos ro langs bsgrubs nus btang ngo / de yang de'i khro dug gis kyang mi tshugs so// me dang chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams yin te/
417a4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i 'jigs pas kyang mi tshugs so// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sbyor bas legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyi ma grub rnams grub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ bri nyes dang / smra nyes dang
417a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom nyes pa dang gtam nyes pa dang / tshul nyes pa dang / de la sogs pa nyes pa thams cad ni/ rig sngags 'di'i gsang sngags kyis nyes pa thams cad kyang gso bar byas pa'o// rlig sngags 'di'i gsang sngags kyi tshig
417a6(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis bar chod byed pa'o// gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa'o// ma grub pa rnams grub par byed/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed do// gzhan yang dngos grub nyams por gyur na/ rig sngags 'dis 'grub par 'gyur te//
417b1(rgyud 'grel): thob pa rnams gzhan la ma btang de/ glo bur gyi bar chod kyis mi tshugs pa'o// pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o// zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang 'jig rten gyi skyon rnams yin te/ de'i 'jigs pas kyang tshugs pa'o// pha rol gyis
417b2(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis sbyor ba'i sngags btang ste/ des kyang mi tshugs shing bor chod dang 'bral ba'o// nad dang mya ngan dang bgags rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi
417b3(rgyud 'grel): brgya brgyad cu'i nAd rnams dang mya ngan gyis mi phog cing / bgegs kyi rigs stong phrag bcu las thar pa'o// 'thab pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// zhes bya ba ni phra ma dang / bcugs dang 'thab rtsod kyi rgyud rnams rna bas mi thos shing /
417b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba dang dge ba'i gtam thos te/ 'thab rtsod dang nyag nyog gi sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o// gdon thams cad bzlog par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ sgom pa la sgom du mi ster ba dge bya dang dge ba byed pa de rnams kyang bgegs rigs
417b5(rgyud 'grel): ta/ de rnams kyis mi tshugs shing / rigs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mi tshugs pa'o// gdon gang gis mi gtong ba de'i mgo oM dza ka'i dog po bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'ges pa'o// zhes bya bo ni/ rig sngags kyis srung ba dang /
417b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba dang sgom pa dang / kha don byed pa la sogs pa la gnod par byed na/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos/ mgo tshal pa tshal par 'gyur ro// sreg dang bral zhing dmyal ba mnar med du skye'o// gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po lag
418a1(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba mye lce gcig tu gyur pa/ daSh+Ti mgo a dza ka'i dog pa bzhin du chal pa bdun du 'gas so// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das
418a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rig sngags 'di 'chang ba la bar chod byed pa dang / gzhan yang 'di'i sgo nas dge bA las bar tshad byed na/ phyag na rdo rje gzi ba kyis dumA bar dris shing / dngos po mo snang bar byed pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhis
418a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang lcags kyi 'khor los spu gri'i so lta ba mtshon gyis phung bar byed do// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dom las 'ongs shing / gdon rnams kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byas te/ de'i rog sngags kyi dmang mes rluH
418a4(rgyud 'grel): po bzhi rnams kyis kyang lcags kyi 'khor lo me lce 'bar bas dum bu dum bur byas shing / chad pa gcod par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nus shi 'phos nas/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nga gnas pa mi
418a5(rgyud 'grel): thob bo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i gdon de shi ba ni rgyal po bzhi'i chad pas shi ste/ gal te 'byung po'i tshogs su skyes na lcang lo can gyi pho brang du mi chung ngo // sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni/ bcom
418a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu la bka' stsal pa'o// rgyal po dang mi rgod dang / me dang chu dang mtshon dang 'brog dang dgon pa dang / mya ngan du song ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis chad pa thams cad gca
418b1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa ste/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis kyang bsgoms shig yid la zung zhig/ mchod par gyis shig/ kha ton du bya zhing sems can thams cad la phan par gyis shig ces bya'o// de bzhin du byas
418b2(rgyud 'grel): nade dang de'i 'jigs pa dang 'bral ba'o// yang na bdud bzhis mi tshugs te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'o// gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig pa 'di ldan gcig brjod no// sdig
418b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni da ltar byas pa ni yang 'dag ste/ sngon du byas pa yang 'dag pa'o// de bzhin du mthu che zhing gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang 'bral
418b4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'o// sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan zin gyi rkyen gyis sems can gyi don la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o// be con chen po'i gzugs kyi rig sngags 'di/ sangs
418b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa rig sngags kyi rgyas mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis/ chang pa thams cad 'joms pa/ byang
418b6(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kha mos bsam gyis mi khyab cing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// gsung ba gsungs par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'o// mo'o/
419a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis kyang gsung ste/ de bzhin du nga ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'o// phyag 'tshal rjes su yi rang 'di'i lam gyi 'bras bu grub pa'o// grub mchog tu grub pa gzhan gyis
419a2(rgyud 'grel): mi thub pa zhes bya ba ni/ thun mong ge ma byung ba bye ba ni/ thun mong gi dngos kyu rgya 'grub ste/ khru mo ma yin pa yang de bzhin no// thun mong gi dngos grub ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i sa la spyod pa dang / na mkha' la spyod pa dang / sa'i 'og nas spyod pa'o//
419a3(rgyud 'grel): de la sogs pa phra mo'i dngos grub kyang yod de/ de yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang / dbang dang mngon spyod la sogs pa'o// thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub ni/ sa lo spyod pa la stsogs pa ni mgo mnyam ste/ na mkha' 'jig rten
419a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams la khyab pa bzhin du 'khor ba bor zhing srid pa ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin te/ da lhor yod pa yang ma yin no// de'i dngos grub thob pa'i phyir na mchog tu grub pa'o// gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug
419a5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gyis mi thub ste/ de bzhin du gdon la sogs pas kyang mi thub pa'o// lha dang klu dang dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye la sogs pas bstod pas zhes bya ba ni
419a6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags 'di la rtag tu rjes su yi rang ste/ mchod par byas shing rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bka' las mi 'da'o// 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa skyel ba'i sems
419b1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa rnams kyang rig sngags kyi srung ba yod par gyur nas/ gzhan yang de'i rtsar bsdang nas/ de rnams kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal zhing rjes su yi rang ba'o// bdag dang sems can thams
419b2(rgyud 'grel): cad gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis kyang / rig sngags 'di lus la btags par byas so// yid la bzung zhing kha ton du byas so// bsgoms
419b3(rgyud 'grel): par byas so// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig sngags kyi go cha gon nas gti mug la sogs pa dug lnga bor te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sgrub par dur khrod bsol ba'i tshal 'jigs su rung ba'i nang du song ngo // sems can
419b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba'o// nAd med pa dang 'jigs pa med par gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon
419b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yo dgas kyi
419b6(rgyud 'grel): gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang /
420a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin gyi sems can rnams kyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la gus par byas te/ phyag 'tshal lo// mchod par byas so// tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu sgra gcan zin
420a2(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag pa thob cing / zag pa zad pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ cho 'phrul ston nus pa'o// bkra shis te/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi lam du 'jug pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'a @
420a3(rgyud 'grel): tshal gyi/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin gyis gdon 'dul po'i gnas skabs te gsum pa'o// // rig sngags kyi snying po rtag pa dang po rdzogs so// // de nas rgyal po chen po lus ngan po dang / yul 'khor srung dang
420a4(rgyud 'grel): mig mi bzang dang / 'phags skyes po bu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po stong phyag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / dri za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / grul bum gyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad
420a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pa/ de bzhin du bu dang yang bcos pa'o// blon po dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas/ mngag gzhug pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas
420a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / klu stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang thabs gcig tu ste/ de bzhin du chung ma dang / bu dang bu me dang / tsha bo dang yang tsha bo la sogs pa dang thabs gcig tu'o// kha
420b1(rgyud 'grel): dog 'phags pa dag nam phyed na lhags nas/ gros mthun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du dong ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri nas/ sems can gyi don la 'khor bzhi po dag dang
420b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas shing 'jigs su rung ba bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang du phyin nas bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyang so so rang rang gi gzi brjid dang / mthu dang kha dog dang stobs dang /
420b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul dang bcas shing dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal la kha bltas pa'o// rang bzhin gyi kha dog dang mthus 'od chen po snang bar byas na swA zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyi kha dog ma yin te/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang /
420b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i gzi brjid kyi so so rang rang gi rang bzhin mthu'i kha dog ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ga la po der song ste phyen nas zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dang / nyan thos dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / da
420b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang mi dang / 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar te/
420b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor de dag rnams dang / bcas shing bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas so so rang rang gi me tog dang spos la sogs pas mchod par byas so// bcom ldan 'das 'ab
421a1(rgyud 'grel): zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gtsug tu 'khod do zhes bya ba nAM/ bcom ldan 'das la lus ngag yang gsum gyis gus par byas nas/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing / de rnams kyang
421a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs gcig tu 'khod pa'o// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang dbyings cig skad cig tu byas nas bco
421a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das la gus par byas pa'o// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa/ ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i chos sku dang sgyu ma lta bu'i
421a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang ba/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang ldan po dang ngo // mtshan bzang po su mo cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan zhing / sems can gyi don lnga stong
421a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams li sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o// sprul pa'i sku de yang dpa' ba drang zhing bdud bzhi bcom pa la stobs dang ldan te/ bag tshugs dang shes bya'i sgrib pas ma gos shing /
421a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa lnga bcom zhing 'khor ba'i ming yang med do// de bzhin nyid du ldan pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud pa'o// gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ de ni lha rnams ma 'otshal to zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi
421b1(rgyud 'grel): phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong sems can gyi don la thug la bzung ba/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la skad cig mas khyab pa/ sems can lta ba mi gcig pa rnams la so so rang rang gi chos
421b2(rgyud 'grel): ston pa ste/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la 'jig rten ngag gis mi 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa zhes bya ba ni/
421b3(rgyud 'grel): lan dang po 'bul ba ni/ chos sku'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i sku ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la 'bul ba'o// lan gnyis pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te/ bcom
421b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi gsung la 'bul ba'o// sems can don la rdzu 'phrul dung cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang ldan te/ stong gsum lnga skad cig mo sa sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la bstod pa'o// 'jig
421b5(rgyud 'grel): rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer ser nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs rim pa bdun gyi bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo
421b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phar lcags las byas shing / sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te sgo phye na de'i sgras dpog tshad gcig khor yug tu grags par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma yod de/ byang
422a1(rgyud 'grel): // chub sems dpa' dga' ldan nas rgyu ma chen po'i mngal du zhugs te de skyes nas rab tu byung nas ma ga d+ha'i dbus su rdo rje gdan la yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bdud la sogs pa bcom
422a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing / de rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang brel te/ de lta bu'i rang bzhin du shAkya'i bu sangs rgyas te/ gau ta ma'i rigs su skyes pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge la phyag 'tshal bstod cing 'dud do zhes
422a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'o// gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas mkhyen pa/ lha rnams kyis ci smos zhes te/ rgya mtsho'i nang na nor yod pa bzhin
422a4(rgyud 'grel): du'o// rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhis bstod pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/
422a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhu ba 'bul ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul dong spro lags sam/ 'tsho ba dang ldan lags sam zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang bde bar gnas sam
422a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bde legs sam/ snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ nyam nga ba ma mchis sam zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi po rnams kyis bar du mchod dam/ 'jig rten gyi dug gsum po ma shor
422b1(rgyud 'grel): ram zhes bya ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la/ gnod ma mnga' legs sam zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa bdud bzhi'i rigs kyis 'byung po rnams kyi chos la bar chod ma byas sam zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
422b2(rgyud 'grel): la gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ chos la bAr chod byed cing / sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa rnams yin te/ yid mi bde bar byed pa yang de rnams yin te/ lus la ni tshe drag pos thebs par
422b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yang de yin no// sems can mngal na 'tshe ba ni/ mi'i khong du zhugs nas mer mer po dang / nur nur po rnams kyang 'chags su mi ster te/ gal te chags nas kyang ma la na tsha drag pos thebs nas 'chi ba dang /
422b4(rgyud 'grel): shi ro dang / skyes nas shrI ba dang / der ma nus na glags gar rnyed pa'i dus su gnod pa skyel ba'o// mngal du zhugs pa'i dus su yang gzi brjid 'phrog cing / skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs kyang 'jigs par byang
422b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// chung po la 'ju ba ni/ ba spu'i rtse mo brgya stong tsam gnas zhes bya ba'o// che ba ni ri rab pas kyang che ste/ stobs btang na ri rab kyang 'gul lo// rgyu ba'i dus khams gsum skad cig mas rgyu'o// de lta bu'i 'byung po rnams
422b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis gnod par ma byas sam zhes bya ba'o// rims drag po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nad bzhi brgya brgyad cu de las 'du ba yin te/ nad de rnams kyis kyang mi mnga' 'am zhes pa'o// mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang
423a1(rgyud 'grel): bar sems pa dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rkun mo dang / mi rgod dang rgyal po la sogs pa yin te/ mi dang mi ma yin pa ni ma rungs pa'i sdig can gyi rigs sems cad la 'tsha bar byed pa rnams so// de
423a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang gnod pa ma byas sam zhes bya ba'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bzhis spyan gsol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces bka' stsal
423a3(rgyud 'grel): to zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi las snyun gsol ba ni lan bka' stsal pa'o// kye rgyal po chen po dag pa la ni thams cad yod de/ zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ de'i nang du ran de che sna chags
423a4(rgyud 'grel): zang mi shes pa yod pa bzhin du nga la yang de bzhin no// yul dang yang spyod 'tsho ba dang yang ldan/ lus kyang bde nad kyang med nyam du ba yang med do zhes bya ba ni/ mngon sum du 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yid de bzhin
423a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ dang po phung po'i bdud bcom pa ste/ gnyis pa nyon mongs pa'o// de bzhin du gsum pa 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa ste/ bzhi pa lha'i bu'i bdud bcom pa'o// de bas nyam mi nga zhes bya ba'o// kye rgyal po chen
423a6(rgyud 'grel): po dag nga'i lus la ni gnod pa yang med do// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phung po'i rang bzhin gyi sku la smos ci dgos te/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa la yang mi tshugs so// kye rgyal po chen po dag ngas ni 'jig
423b1(rgyud 'grel): rten lha dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas rnams la gnod pa skyel bar 'dod pas kyang gnod pa skyel ba'i skabs ma rnyed cing / gnod pa rnams kyang mi snang ba'o// gal te gzhan gyi sems la dad pa skyes
423b2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur na/ 'jig rten 'od la sdug bsngal drag pos thabs cing shi nas kyang mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du dmyal bar 'gro'o// dmyal ba nas kyang ngan song nas ngan song du mi thar te/ thar pa'i dus kyang mi 'ong ngo // de
423b3(rgyud 'grel): bsta na/ bde bar gshegs pa bla ma dang / nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang / pha ma la sogs pa la yang gnod par mi bya'o// de'i phyir na gnod par byed par sems dpa' yang dag par ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba'o// kye rgyal
423b4(rgyud 'grel): po chen po dag de lta mod kyi khyed kyis 'khor rnams nga'i 'khor la gnod par byed par sems so zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par bltas pas ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis gnod par
423b5(rgyud 'grel): bya bar sems so// de sems ma thag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas smra ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
423b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bi zhes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhu bo 'bul ba'o// btsun pa bcom
424a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das bdag cag gsol pa mchis te zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sems bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas srung ba dang sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs
424a2(rgyud 'grel): kyatshig ni bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis
424a3(rgyud 'grel): pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa'i sems ni ci mchis te/ zhes bya ba dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'khor rnams kyang bsrung bar 'dod cing / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis grags pa thos pa dang / srung ba dang
424a4(rgyud 'grel): bde bar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das nyid la gus par byas shing / zhu ba dbul ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / rig sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad
424a5(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gnas shing nAd med de/ ma rangs pa'i gdon thams cad bcom zhing yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi lam lo 'jug pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgon pa dang bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag na/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs
424a6(rgyud 'grel): su rung ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na ro langs dang / ro dang lce spyang la sogs pa dang / bya'i tshogs mang po 'dus pa'i sa/ khyi dang lce spyang 'thab pa'i sgras 'jigs su rung ste/ de bzhin du ro langs dang yi dgos kyang skad 'don
424b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'jigs su rung ste/ de bas na mtha'i gnas lam zhes btags pa'o// shin tu snang ba gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sa bzhi der gnas pa'i gdon rnams ni shin tu mi srun zhing ro la dga' ste/ gson pa'i
424b2(rgyud 'grel): sha khrag la dga' zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed de/ gzugs sna tshogs ston cing gzi brjod 'phrog po dang skad sna tshogs 'don zhing skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs la 'jigs par byed pa dang / gdon rigs mi gcig
424b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas shing 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can la gdon pa'o// rims dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi de rims de dag la 'dus te/ nang ngo rnams kyang ma rungs pa'i 'byung
424b4(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyis btang zhing sems can rnams la/ gnod pa skyel ba'o// mi dang mi ma lags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sa gzhi der mi rgod la sogs pa rgyu ba ste/ gzhan yang rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang
424b5(rgyud 'grel): mi dang mi ma yin pa rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ma nus pa'o zhes bya ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag kyang de la gnas
424b6(rgyud 'grel): lags te zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshol la sbyor zhing de la gnas pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni/ srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal
425a1(rgyud 'grel): bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas so// zhes bya ba ni de ltar bar chod kyi rkyen bzlog pa dang / tshe phyi ma'i don la byang chub kyi lam bsgom pa dang / de ltar mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin bsgom ste/ nyan thos de rnams
425a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang rig sngags ying lo byed pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar gdo dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dang ba'i sems dang ldan zhing cung zad cig mchis
425a3(rgyud 'grel): par byas so zhes bya ba ni gzhan yang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ma thag tu dge ba'i sems la brtson zhing sems can gzhan rnams la yang sdang ba dang sdig pa'i sems
425a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mi ldan zhing byamos pa dang snying rje la brtson zhing chos kyi sems dang ldan te/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// de'i yon tan gyis ni cung zad cig mchis pas so zhes bya ba'o// gang dag bcom ldan 'das
425a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bstan pa 'di la pha ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ ches mang legs te zhes bya ba ni/ gang dang gang dag sems can rnams ni dge ba las mi brtson zhing sdig la brtson par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i sems dang
425a6(rgyud 'grel): sdang ba'i sems dang / gcig gis gcig la 'tshe bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan po'o// byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan zhing chos la rtsom pa nyung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa
425b1(rgyud 'grel): phal tu skye ste/ phal cher sems can de rnams ni mtho ris su 'gro ba nyung zhing ngan song gsum du skye ba'o// de bas na 'byung po yi dgas kyi lus thob nas kyang gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan par
425b2(rgyud 'grel): skye ba'o// de dag ni zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gdon dang 'byung po rnams glags btsal zhing / dge ba dang bsgom pa la sogs pa la bar chod byas nas mtho ris thob tu mi ster ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi
425b3(rgyud 'grel): nyon thos srong dang tho rangs la mi nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa/ rnams la gnod par byed par sems lags te zhes bya ba ni phung po la gnod par byas nas rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang 'dus
425b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nad btang zhing dge ba'i sbyor bya de yang mi nus par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po 'dus pa'o// sems la gnod par byed cing mi dga' bar byed pa ste/ bsgom snying mi 'dod cing logs par byed pa'i sems
425b5(rgyud 'grel): can dang ldan pa mang po yod pa'o// bsgom pa'i dus su srog la zhugs shing 'chi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po sho stag yod pa'o// bsgom pa'i dus su ltas ngan pa dang / rmi lam ngon pa bstan cing
425b6(rgyud 'grel): phal cher dngos por 'byung zhing bsgom du mi ster ba ste/ bsgom pa'i gang zag la 'jigs par byas shing / nem sgom pa'i dus su bar chod byed cing sgom du mi ster ba'o// de bas na gdon de dag gis gnod par bgyid
426a1(rgyud 'grel): pa lags te zhes bya ba'o// rig sngags kyi rgyul mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po la/ gdon gyis glags btsal ba'i gnas skabs te bzhi pa'o// // de dgag pa'i
426a2(rgyud 'grel): slad du zhes bya ba ni gdon ma rungs pa rnams dang sdig can bdud kyi rigs dang sa dang bar snang dang sa 'og la rgyu bya'i 'byung po rnams stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ de phrag nyi shu rtsa drug go/ de bzhin du g.yog dang / chung ma dang bu dang bu mo
426a3(rgyud 'grel): la yang yin no// gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhini du ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams mi dad de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyis byin gyi brlabs kyis dad par byed pa'o// dad pa rnam
426a4(rgyud 'grel): slar zhing dad par bgyi ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ phyi bzhin nus yod pa'i sems ni yang nas yang du dad pa skyes pa ste/ de 'ong bar mi byed pa'i sems ni brtan par mi byed pa'o// 'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang zhes bya ba ni/
426a5(rgyud 'grel): sngar gnod par byed 'dod pa'i sems dang / sdang bar 'dod pa'i sems de rnams ni dad pa'i sems dang ljon par gyur na/ 'khor bzhi po de dag dang sems can thams cad bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas par bgyi
426a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsgom pa dang nyan pa la yang bar chod med cing de bzhin du spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba la bar chod med cing de rnams la bde bar bgyi bas na bde ba'o// ma lus par shin tu mnyam par bzhag par
426b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma lus par 'joms te/ de 'joms na/ de bar du gcod pa'i bgegs kyang smos ci dgos te/ shes bya dang bag chags kyi dri mas mi gos pa'o// bsil ba tshal gyi mdo chen
426b2(rgyud 'grel): po 'di bshad par 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med de/ de'i chos kyis nyams myong gis/ zla ba sems can
426b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bsil bar byed pa bzhin du des kyang sems can rnams la bde bar byas pa'o// rig sngags des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams la na mkhas khyab pa bzhin du khyab pa'o// mi ma yin pa sdang sems can/ rgyal ba'i bstan
426b4(rgyud 'grel): la ma dad pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can rnams la phan par bgyid pas mi ma yin gyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon la sogs pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis byin
426b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs kyis sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang sdig pa'i sems med cing srog gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang srog mi gcod cing / bstan pa yang bsrung bar byed pa'o// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya// rgyal
426b6(rgyud 'grel): chen rnams ni bdag le nyon/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis mi dad pa dad par byas pa ste/ dad pa rnams kyang spong bar mi byed pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa
427a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang sems la zung zhig ces bya'o// mdo chen 'di ni thos nas kyang // mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed/ ces bya ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad rlag par byed pas na mdo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dod pas na
427a2(rgyud 'grel): mdo'o// yang na sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang chos kyi nges tshig dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad de nas byung zhing bshad de de gsal bar bshad pas mdo zhes bya'o// chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / ye shes bsam
427a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi don thob pas na thob pa ste/ de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis don gyis 'jigs pa med cing gnod pa yang mi mnga' ste/ sems can rnams la phan par byed pa'o// gnod sbyin pa klu rnams dang /
427a4(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa/ zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa thams cad de rnams kyis byed de/ sdig pa yang de rnams kyis byed pa/ sems can la gnod par byed cing za ba dang 'thung ba tshol ba'o// phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung // de
427a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag thams cad bzlog par bya/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi de mo mas/ mA lus pa thams cad brlag par byed cing thal bar btang ste/ ma dad pa rnams kyang snang bar mi byed do// lha dang lha min rlung lha dang
427a6(rgyud 'grel): ma mo'i tshogs kyis gang po yis/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa dang / dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams yin te/ de yang ye shes pa dang
427b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi lha mo rnams so// gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni// me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing / zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal yas khang la gnas te/ ye shes pa yang de bzhin yin te/ so so rang
427b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi 'od zer gyi snang bas nA mkha' la mdzes par snang ba'o// nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra bar// rin chen las byas shin tu snang / zhes bya ba ni/ mun pa mun nag gi nad na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches mi snang ste/ de bzhin du nyi ma zla
427b3(rgyud 'grel): bas gsal bar byis shing rin po che mthong ngo // de bzhin du glo bur gyi skyon nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bkag cing bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdam ngag bstan pas ye shes de snang ba'o// bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang // rab snang gdas
427b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnam par spongs/ zhes bya ba ni de bzhin de'i dge ba byas pa'i bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gnod par byed pa dang / sdig pa bsags pa thams cad des de'i 'joms par byed pa'o// mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i// 'byung/
427b5(rgyud 'grel): pi grul bum srin po dang / zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum tsom yang skad cig gis khyab ste/ la la bza' rgyu yod cing mchod par 'os te/ la la sems can rnams kyis kyang sdang zhing dmod mos dmod pa'o// de 'byung po rnams kyis kyang mi
427b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can la gnod par byed pa'o// yi dgas srul po de dag gis// rmad byung de dag mi mthong ste// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi ye shes sdig can de dag gis mi mthong ste/ zhing de dag rnams kyang bde bar
428a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par mi 'gyur ro// gzi brjid ldan pa'i gdon lha rnams kyis/ grong khyer du yang mi 'gro'o// zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams te/ sems can la gnod par mi byed cing //
428a2(rgyud 'grel): byams pa dang snying rjes 'tshe ba'o// de rnams kyis gzi brjid kyis ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyang rtsar 'gro bar mi nus shing / gnas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po chen po 'du ba na/ der yang de dag 'dur mi 'bang / zhes
428a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod par byed pa 'byung po de kun yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang ci smos te/ de'i ra ba'i phyi rol yang mi thob cing / rig sngags kyi nga mong mos bde bar mi gnas pa'o// stan nam yang na chu yang rung // zas dang skom
428a4(rgyud 'grel): yang mi dbang ngo // zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin de la dam las 'das pa rnams 'thung ba dang za ba ci smos te/ 'thung po'i skom yang zangs kyi chur mthong ngo // bza' ba'i zas kyang lcags kyi tho lum 'bar bar mthong / lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du// nam
428a5(rgyud 'grel): yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lcang lo can gyi pho brang du sdig can 'byung po gnod byed rnams dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams kyis srung zhing pho brang nang du gtam yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po tshan
428a6(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyi tshig/ 'byung po gang zhig mi nyan po// zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis smras pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po ni/ yul 'khor bsrung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / spyan mi bzang dang / lus ngan po rnams yin
428b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ de'i rig sngags kyi dmod mo dang rgyal po bzhi'i chad pas/ 'byung po de rnams bde bar mi 'gyur ro// de kha nas khrag dron dag/ myur du rab tu 'bab par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po de rnams rgyal po chen po
428b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i chad pas myur du nad kyi thebs te/ kha nas khrag dron skyug cing srog gi dus la bab ste/ mnga' 'phangs pa bzhin du myur du dmyal bar skyes so// de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas// phol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te/ zhes bya ba
428b3(rgyud 'grel): nini/ 'byung po de rnams kyi brla g.yas rol nas ma rungs pa'i nad 'byung po/ de ci'i phyir 'byung zhe na/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa dang / sems can la gnod par byas pa'i phyir ro// de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing / gnod sbyin
428b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni/ nad de rnams kyi btab na 'chi ste/ tshe phyi ma ngan song gsum du skye zhing / 'byung po'i lus blangs par gyur kyang / gzhan rnams kyis bsnyen du mi btub cing de bas kyang sdug bsngal
428b5(rgyud 'grel): ba par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten skyong gis bshad pa yi// mdo las gang zhig 'gal byed pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po ste/ brgya byin dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / me lha dang / srin po
428b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / rlung lha dang / dbang ldan dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / tshangs pa dang / sa bdag dang ngo // de rnams kyis kyang chad par gsungs so// yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba ni/ thabs la mkhas pa/ sems
429a1(rgyud 'grel): can+da la snying rje che ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de rnams kyis kyang bden pa'i bka' gsungs pa'o// 'jigs pa thams cad de la'o// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas zhes bya ba ni/ sa g.yo ba'i
429a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa dang / me'i char 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin 'byung po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / za ba dang / skom med cing rig sngags kyang dmod mos 'chi ba'i dus su mgo tshal par gas nas 'chi'o// rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/ gnod
429a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gang dag ma nyan pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pas gsungs te/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bka' ma nyan par gyur na/ de rnams kyis sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o//
429a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po skyin po gang yod pa/ ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams ni gcig la gcig gis/ phrag dog gis ngan sems skye ste/ de'i ngan pa kyang yang nas yang du ngan pa'o// lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo
429a5(rgyud 'grel): yi// mtshon cha spu gri so 'dra bas/ zhes bya ba ni/ de yis de ngan pa rnams ni rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das te/ mtshon cha lta bu'i las kyi spu gris yang nas yang du gcod cing sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o// gnod sbyin de dag brlag par
429a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das pa dang / rig sngags kyi bka'i dmong mos brlag par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang /
429b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang ldan pa ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba ste/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing sems can gyi don byed pa'o// go cha sra zhing mtshon rno ba// stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag/ ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags
