429b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bka' las 'das pa la ni/ de dag dang 'khod par byas nas/ mtshon che sna tsho Da thog nas phyogs phyogs su bsdad pa'o// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor bsrung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal
429b3(rgyud 'grel): po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du grul bum gyi rgyal po 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa'o// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag
429b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang yin no// go cha gon zhing mtshon sna tshogs pa stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/ de dag ngan 'khod pa yi// gnyen bskor gnod sbyin 'dri
429b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams gnas/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bzhi nas bu dang 'khor g.yog dang / chung ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang phyogs phyogs nas srung zhing gnas pa'o// seng ge'i gzugs dang stag gi gzugs// mi sdug pa dang 'gro zhing
429b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang 'dul bar byed pa'i rgyal po rnams ni seng ge dang stag gi mgo can du gnos pa'o// skad cig mas stong rgyu zhing 'khor bar gnas pa'o// glang chen gzugs dang rta'i gzugs// kha cig
430a1(rgyud 'grel): ma he'i gzugs can te/ zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste/ skad cig mas ri rab rtse mo dang / bar snang dang / sa steng dang sa 'og tu dus gcig tu rgyu ba'o// dred mo dang ni ba yi gzugs// lugs
430a2(rgyud 'grel): dang sbyang ku phag rgod rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul zhing sems can rnams la bstan pa'o// sna ba 'phyang dang rna bo che// rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ glang po che bzhin du
430a3(rgyud 'grel): rna ba 'phyang ba ste/ rna ba gcig pus gos byas shing // lus po thams cad khebs pa ste/ de bzhin du gzugs bstan zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o// skad cher 'byin cing 'jigs byed pa/ sa gzhi rab tu g.yo
430a4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed/ ces bya ba ni/ bum pa'i nang du skrod smras pa bzhin du sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas shing 'jigs par byed de/ bar chod byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa'i dus sa g.yo zhing skad sna tshogs 'dod par byed pa'o// bong
430a5(rgyud 'grel): bu dang ni rnga mo che// cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod/ ces bya ba ni/ mi'i lus la rnga mo bong bu'i mgo bo dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi gzugs su sprul nas gzugs dngos su bsten pa dang / rmi lamo du bstan pa'o//
430a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po stobs po che// de dag phan tshun 'du ba ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du stobs dang ldan pas 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang / rgyal po chen po rnams kyi 'dul zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o// lha'i
430b1(rgyud 'grel): shing rta bcas pa yis// na mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed/ ces bya ba ni/ sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha thogs shing spu dang bcas shing 'gro ba ste/ de bzhin du bar snang dang / sa 'og dang sa steng la rgyu ba'o// gnod
430b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dag gi bdag po yang // mi rnams la ni bde legs byed/ ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / gnod sbyin 'khor g.yog stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bdag pa ste/
430b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam thos kyi bu de yang sems can gnod par mi byed cing / snying rje la gnas pa'o// de bzhin du rig sngags la mchod par byed cing / gus par byed pa'o// rog sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs las/
430b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs ma yin te/ mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o// ye shes lnga'i bdog nyid can/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku
430b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang gu'o// zhal mthing ka/ g.yon dmar ba ste/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ ral gri dang rdo rje rgya gram mo// g.yon pa gnyis na/ skyabs sbyin dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// phyag 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gyis mda'
430b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhu 'gengs pa ste/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'o// zhabs g.yas bskum/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing bzhid pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang
431a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ b+ha ga hu mu le b+ha ga hu mu le zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos pu// mi la zhon pa sde bcas pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal
431a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos pa tsam gyis lus 'dar zhing 'jigs par gnas te/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyang de bzhin no// 'di smras nas ni chub ma langs// de bzhin ri yang g.yos par 'gyur//
431a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di'i gzi brjid dang stobs kyis rlung tshub sna tshogs 'byung ste/ sa ni lan drug tu g.yos shing / dril bu'i skad bzhin du rings par snang ngo // rgyal po chen po rnam thos
431a4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i// rin chen shing rta bcas pa na zhes bya bya ste/ byang ngos kyi rgyalnga pa rnam thos kyi bu de yang gzugs sna tshogs bstan cing / rin po che'i gdan la zhugs nas/ sna tshogs smra bya'o// lha dang myi yau sgra skad skrag/ rgyal po
431a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po mchis pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi'i gzugs su sprul zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan te/ skyang sna tshogs kyang de bzhin du smras pa'o// dngos po rnams kyang 'i bar 'gyur ro// srin po 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs//
431a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gsang sngags kyi dmong mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi rgyal po'i bu'i stobs kyis kyang / ma rungs pa'i srin po 'byung po rnams kyang dngos po rnams ni skrag par 'gyur
431b1(rgyud 'grel): ro// de'i mdun nu rgyug par bgyid// mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid de mthong zhing 'jigs par byed cing phyir 'gro ba'o// 'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par bgyid// cho zhing gtum la mi bzang
431b2(rgyud 'grel): pa// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing / rmi lam nyams pa la yang gzugs bstan cing / 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs te rtag tu sems can la gnod par byed pa'o// drag cing mthon
431b3(rgyud 'grel): na mi bsdug la// spu yang ring la sen mo ring / zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug cing lus dang gdong pa khra bor gnas te/ khab dang 'dra ba'i spus ni lus la khengs shing de bzhin du sder mo yang mtshon dang 'dra ba'o// lag na ral gri tho ba
431b4(rgyud 'grel): thogs// so ni zangs can 'jigs par bgyid/ ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams ni khrag khrug la dga' zhing / phra mo byed pa la dga' ba ste/ de bzhin du khrag khrug byed pa'i shi khrag la dga' zhing / 'jigs pa'i ral gri dang 'jig
431b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zangs kyi so rnams kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'o// sna che rnga mo stag gi 'dra// drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po 'di rnams kyis kyang / sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan cing / mi'i lus la mgo
431b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa bstan cing bud med kyi mngal khrag la dga' zhing byis pa rnams la gnod par byed pa'o// yan lag ma tshang phyed tshal lus// mig ser lus kyang shin tu ser/ zhes bya ba ni/ la la mgo bo med cing brang la gdong pa
432a1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa ste/ la la lag pa gcig med cing mgo la gnas pa'o// tshan gcig la yang rkang pa gcig med cing / lte ba nas res snang res mi snang bar byed de/ la la phyed gzugs su snang zhing sems can rnams
432a2(rgyud 'grel): skrag par byed pa'o// dri ma can la lus skem pa/ skra rdzes lcags kyi mchu can la/ zhes bya ba ni keng rus la lpags pas g.yog pa dang 'dra ba yod de/ de la dregs pa tshogs shing bzhin mi sdug pa ste/ khab kyi rtse mo tsam gyi mchu
432a3(rgyud 'grel): la gsus pa yang ri tsam mo// de lta bu'i lus la skra bzang brdzes pa'o// mtshon cha tshabs tshor 'debs par bgyid// rna ba gzhu 'dra stobs po che/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'thab mo la sbyor te/ gcig la gcig 'dzugs shing / 'khrug pa du
432a4(rgyud 'grel): dpung dang bcas pa byas te/ de la mtshan cha tsha ba che bar 'bebs pas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'o// rna ba gzhu 'dra ba yod cing / bzhin mi sdug pa yin te/ de lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la drag por gnod pa'o// /
432a5(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyi gzugs can be'u'i gzugs// phag gi gzugs can lto bo che// zhes bya ba ni/ maM'i lus la mgo brnyan mi gcig pa ste/ rtag tu ltas dang rmi lam la yang de'i gzugs bstan pa/ rnam par rtog pa skyes par byed pa'o//
432a6(rgyud 'grel): de skyes pa dang nang drag pos tshugs te/ nad kyis srog dang 'bral byed pa'o// mgo bo che la lag ring pa// rna 'phyang po la nu ma 'phyang / zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan gcig 'dre mo'i gzugs yod de/ dpag tshad brgya'i bar nas kyang 'tshe
432b1(rgyud 'grel): bar byas shing shwa khrag len nus te/ bzhin mi sdug cing lag pa ring ba'i rbar mos 'debs pa'o// de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yis// g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni rgyal po rnam thos
432b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bu'i 'khor yin te/ stobs che zhing mi srun te/ khams gsum tsam la 'gyur zhing dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na gnas pa'o// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dag ma ni lam log cen/ zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni byang
432b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs na gnas pa ste/ byang gi phyogs nas 'ongs nas/ tshan cig phan bya dang gnod bya gnyis byed par 'ongs pa ste/ tshan cig snying rje med cing sems can la 'tshe ba/ tshan cig snying rje dang ldan zhing sems can la grogs byed
432b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu// bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ de dag lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu 'khod cing gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o// gau ta ma
432b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchos/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed do// chos dang ldan zhing snying rje skye ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ 'tshe bar mi nus pa'o// drag
432b6(rgyud 'grel): cing rgod la gtum pa dang // lto bo che la sgra ring ba/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de lta bu'i tshan cig byung ste/ sdig la mi 'dzem zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa drag po'i tshul bstan nas/ phyogs bzhi mtshams
433a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir 'gyur ba'o// mi rnams dang ni ri dgas dang / bya rnams gzi brjid 'phrog par bgyid// ces bya ba ni/ tshan cig grong ngam grong khyer du phyin cing mi rnams kyi lus la zhugs nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa
433a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ tshan cig ni ri dgas la sogs pa'i sems can rnams la ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung po'o// me 'bar zo dang mang du za// mig cig pa dang mig ser dang / zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug cing gzugs sna tshogs bstan
433a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing ma'i mngal nas zhugs nas/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams so// sna dang rna ba bcas pa dang / chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ tshan cig kyang sna dang rno ba bcas pa'i
433a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su byas nas/ sems can 'tshe bar byas te/ de rnams kyis kyang mi rnams kyi lus la zhugs nas mi rungs pa thams cad byed pa'o// gzhan rnams kyis kyang de'i 'bras bu sna dang rna ba dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa
433a5(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa'i chod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de yang 'byung po rnams kyis skyon byas pa yin no// mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad dang // lus kyang sgur la gnyer ma gdong / zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams tshan cig gis kyang sems can rnam
433a6(rgyud 'grel): la rmi lam dang / ltos dang / dngos por mthong bar byas te/ de'i rtogs pos nad sna tshogs btang zhing sems can gyi srog 'phrog pa'o// de rnams ni lhas ngan gyi 'byung po rnams yin no// mig la me 'bar rkang phyed pa// mi rnam
433b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ nags tshal lam/ dur khrod dam/ ri dang / lung stong la gnas pa ste/ sems can mi rnams kyis mthong bar gyur na ngo sbed pa ste/ 'byung po des sems can mthong na nyin mo gnod
433b2(rgyud 'grel): mi nus shing / mtshan mo'i rigs l-i cis kyang phan pa med cing srog 'phrog pa'o// phel ka che la rgod bag can// de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid/ ces bya ba ni/ phel ka che zhing mtshan rnams rgyu ba ste/ pho mo nyal ba'i dus su
433b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyan nas glags rnyed par gyur na lus la 'jug ste/ bdud kyi rigs su skyes nas pha ma rnams skrag par byed pa'o// de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das
433b4(rgyud 'grel): ga la ba der 'byung po rnams kyis bskor te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar bsdad pa'o// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dag ma ni skul ma lags/ zhes bya ba ni/ de dag kun kyang dur khrod chen
433b5(rgyud 'grel): popo bsil ba'i tshal na gnas shing / rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor yin te/ de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis 'khod pa'o// g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu// bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ zhes bya
433b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ dpon g.yog de rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas phyag 'tshal ba'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni//
434a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi spyan sngar sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje dang ldan te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi dmod mos 'tshe bar mi nus pa'o// bdag cag gis ni gnas
434a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni/ shing rta zhes bgyi srin po mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ lho nub kyi mtshams na laM kA ni gnas pas srin po'i tshogs mang po 'byung ste/ de rnams kyis krung sems can rnams la gnod par byed cing 'bru gu'i nad rnams gtong
434a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// de la bu mo stobs ldan pa/ stong phrag bcu yi grangs snyed mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo'i tshogs kyang de rnams byung ste/ stobs dang ldan zhing rang gi kha dog tu snang ba de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'kho
434a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de dag bdag gi g.yog lagas+ya te// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yog du ma dang bcas nasi mchis te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la
434a5(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi'o// zhes bya ba'o// gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun por lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten blo ma'i spyan snga ru// sems can rnams la snying rje dang ldan zhing 'tshe bar mi byed de/ rig sngags
434a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis sems can rnams la 'tsho bar mi byed pa'o// bdag cag gis ni gnas rnams na/ mgrin rings shes bya'i srin pa mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ laM ka mgron bcu'i rigs mgo bocu gcig yod pa
434b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba rnams 'byung ba'o// sbyin mo shin tu gnas pa dag/ srin mo nag mo zhes bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba nI/ dpal lha mo dang / 'khor g.yog yin te/ sbyin mo ral pa gcig pa rnams/ 'khor g.yog dum
434b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa byung ste/ de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ru'o// srin mo rab gnag rnams mchis te/ de dag gau ta ma mthun par lta/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram na zang gling zhes bya ba ni/ yul na gnas
434b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ de bas kyang gnag pa lnga brgya yod do// de rnams kyis kyang sems can la 'tshe bar byas shing / bud med du brdzus nas gnod pa skyel ba'o// sa yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid che// de dag sa steng gnas pa lha/ zhes bya ba
434b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nor rgyun ma'i 'khor g.yog yin te/ de yang ljang ma mo dang / kun tu bzang mo dang / 'od ldan ma la sogs pa yin te/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing / phan pa sha stag ste/ sa la
434b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing sa la bdag byed pa'o// g.yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis ni/ yongs su bskor te 'dir mchis lags/ zhes bya ba ni/ srin po dang / srin mo dang / sa bdag mo la sogs pa 'khor g.yog du ma dang
434b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro// de dag kun dang lhan cig tu// bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags dang / sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi'o// sems can
435a1(rgyud 'grel): la gnod par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig tu 'khod pa'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong
435a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug la bdag cag/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing spyan sngar mchis pa'o// bdag gi mdun na rgyug pa yi// yi dgas gnod sbyin srin po rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngan
435a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i spyan sngar rgyug pa'i ma rungs pa 'byed pa la dga' ba'i 'khor tshan cig yad de/ sdig la dga' zhing snying la mi sdug pa sha stag go/ lus chen shugs kyang drag pa ste// so yang tsho la lto bo che/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten g.yo
435a4(rgyud 'grel): bar nus shing yud tsam gyis gang la yang khyab ste/ gzi brjid che zhing rbad pa la dga' ste/ de'i gzugs kyis sems can la gnod par byed pa'o// rna 'phyang 'jigs pa chen po ste/ slo ma sna la rab tu 'phyong / zhes bya ba ni/ glaT
435a5(rgyud 'grel): btsal te dam tshig nyams pa la smad cing gnod pa che bar byas pa ste/ de rnams kyis kyang chad pa gcod cing dwags shul bstan pa'o// yan lag drug pa sau brtan pa// gur kum mdog can thi ba 'dra/ zhes bya ba ni/ mgo bo drug
435a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug/ rkang pa drug de bzhin du sprul pa ste/ mdog mdzes pa ste/ mche ba gtsigs shing so gtsigs shing sems can rnams la ston par byed pa'o// so yang rtsub cing rno ba dang // mdung thung gsal zhing 'jigs par bgyi
435b1(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod pa byed pa'i dus su ni mtshon cha sna tshogs bstan te/ so rno zhing sems can smad pa la dga' ba'o// glang chen mgo dang bum rna can// mgo bo seng ge stag dang 'dra/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshog
435b2(rgyud 'grel): par sprul zhing sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ste/ de rnams mi sran zhing gnod par byed pa la dga' ba'i// ljags kyi so can lpags kyi sgra// gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa// zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon gyi so dang khab kyi
435b3(rgyud 'grel): ska ste/ de bzhin du lus po'i ba spu rnams kyang yin na// nang la nang thab 'dad cang sems can gyi lus la zhugs nas kyang de bzhin no// lag na lcags kyi gtum bu thags// lag na lcags kyi tha ba thags// zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyang /
435b4(rgyud 'grel): 'thab pa'i dus su de bzhin te/ de'i tshul gyis bstan cing sems can la 'thab rtsod rjod par byed pa'o// so rnon lag pa ring ba ste// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can lcags kyi mchu/ zhes bya ba ni/ za ba'i dus su sau rno ba/ gnod par byed pa
435b5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa ring ba/ yang na lag pa ring ba ni phyogs gcig nas bsdang nas dpag tshad brgyar bslabs pa'o// drag po'i tshul du bstan cing mtshon gyis mchu dang ldan pa'o// mgo bo tsha la sgro g.yengs pa/ nag cing mig ser sna zhon po/ zhes
435b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ yan lag phra zhing bong thung ba ste/ mgo bo che la bzhin mi sdug ste/ sol ba'i mdog la mig la me 'bar pa ste/ sna med cing sug sug byed pa de'i gzugs kyis gnod par byed pa'o// bum pa'i mgrin dang mig dmar ba// mig
436a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa dang lto po che/ zhes bya ba ni/ bum pa 'dra ba'i lba ba gsum yod pa ste/ de'i lus la mig dmar ba'o// mig gci la sbrul gyi stobs dang ldan zhing sa bdag gis gzugs su gnas ma
436a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang po dang lag gcig pa// rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa// zhes bya ba ni/ chu srin gyi mchu dang ldan pa/ lus la lag pa gcig med gas ba ste/ la la yang rkang pa re re yod cing gnyis gnyis 'dro
436a3(rgyud 'grel): nas 'gro ba'o// gzhan yang khro bo'i tshul du yod pa la rkang pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o// khwa med kha gnyis drag po ste/ mi rnams rab tu 'jigs pa bgyid / ces pa ba ni/ khab kyi kha la gsus po che ste/ kha yA kha ltag khung na yang
436a4(rgyud 'grel): kha yod pas kha gnyis yod pa ste/ de bzhin du mi rnams la yang gnod pa ste/ drag po'i tshul gyis gnod par byed pa'o// lag na khar ba dbyug pa thogs// mdung rtse gsum pa drag cing 'jigs/ zhes bya ba ni/ gdon ma rungs pa
436a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la ni/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing mi rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ste/ de bzhin du 'tshe ba drag po byed pa'o// skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste/ don rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ drag po'i tshul gyis
436a6(rgyud 'grel): gnod par byed de/ de bzhin du gdon sna tshogs kyis nad sna tshogs btang nos 'tsho bar byed pa'o// skrag par bgyid cing smra bar bgyid// sems kyang 'khrul par byed pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ nad kyis thebs shing lab lob slar
436b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa ste/ yang na sems can de smyos par byas nas sems gtong zhing kha'i kha bden smra ba'o// smyo bar bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid// de nas gzi brjid 'phrog par bgyid/ ces bya ba ni/ gdon gyis btab pa de ni 'bog ste/ sems/
436b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang gtong de bzhin du ngag kyang med do// lus de yang nyen mongs shing dpal dang mi ldan te/ de bzhin du go nod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa'o// de dag 'jig rten 'jigs pa ste// stobs po che la brten par dka'/ zhes bya ba ni/ de
436b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad la sems can gyis sems can la gnod par byas te/ 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa'i phyir na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal la brten pa'o// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi
436b4(rgyud 'grel): po// rgyal po chen po'i mdun na rgyug/ ces bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lus ngan po'i mdun du rgyug ste/ de dag 'jigs nas skyobs gsol ba'o// de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yis// g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor//
436b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngan po dang thabs gcig tu// sangs rgyas ga la der 'khod de/ gus pas bskyed nas thabs gcig tu'o// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phyug rnams// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/
436b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor g.yog bdag cag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis te/ gus por byas nas rig sngags la phyag 'tshal ba'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod lo ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis//
437a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom pa la dpa' bo ste/ de bzhin du mun pa mun nag bsal te/ 'jig rten las 'das nas sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste/ bdag cag gis sems can rnams la
437a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe bar mi byed de/ rig sngags bdag gis gzung bar bya// sa ga lnga rtsen zla ba dang // seng ge sde dang rab gnon dang / zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gnod sbyin sde dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin te/ de rnams kyi ming grangs ni gsang
437a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags la po chen dang la sogs pa'o// rig pa stobs tshon nor bu dang / zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags chen dang / ba la la sogs pa'i bar nas 'di dag yin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis de yang stobs dang ldan
437a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing gzi brjid che ste/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha mo yin gyi rtsod pa las rtsod par nus te/ gnod sbyin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrong zhing / rig sngags la rjes su yi rung ba'o// 'jog po
437a5(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po dang / la ba can dang rje'u gnyis// zhes bya ba na/ klu'i rgyal po klu rigs bzhi yin te/ de dag kyang sa dang chu la gonas shing bstan pa bsrung ba'o// klu yi rgyal po sa srung bu// yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ zhes
437a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing kha dog dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing 'jigs pa med cing / gnod par mi byed pa'o// nam mkha' lding ni shugs tshan ldan// 'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ zhes bya ba ni
437b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can yin te/ 'dab chags bya la gzugs che zhing / stobs dang ldan pa'o// bya yi shugs kyis mchi bgyid cing // rgya mtsho kun tu 'khrug par bgyid/ ces bya ba ni/ sems can
437b2(rgyud 'grel): des klu'i sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed de/ de yang de dag rnams kyis kyang / 'tsha bar byed pa'i rgyu la gnas pa'o// lha dang lha min dri za rnams/ 'jigs par bgyid pa dang / dge ba'ang rung / zhes bya ba
437b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ phan byed dang gnod byed gnyis nus te/ 'di rnams kyis kyang / phan par byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa la gnas pa'o// ma dang pha dang dad pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'dir mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni//
437b4(rgyud 'grel): chos la gnas pa dang mi gnas pa gnyis/ sdig la 'dzam pa dang mi 'dzem pa gnyis yin te/ de dag rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis so// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun
437b5(rgyud 'grel): par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa la stsogs pa bcom pa la dpa' ba/ nyon mongs pas mi tshugs shing thugs rje dang ldan pa ste/ gdon de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi mthus chos dang ldan par
437b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// 'phrog ma zhes bya ba gnod sbyin no// 'jigs par bgyid pa stobs chen mo// zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi bu tsha ni snying du sdug ste/ gzhan gyi bu tsha rnams 'jigs par byed cing / gnod byed
438a1(rgyud 'grel): nus pa ste/ des kyang byis pa rnams la 'jigs par byed cing srog 'phrog pa'o// de yi bu ni lnga brgya rnams// 'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu rtsal can/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'phrog ma'i bu ste/ de rnams
438a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang sems can la gnod par byed cing mngal nas rlag par byed de/ ma dang bu rnams kyang sreg 'phrog pa'o// bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te/ de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga/
438a3(rgyud 'grel): brgya dang / 'phrog ma dang bcas pa 'khor g.yog du ma gnas te/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyogs gcig tu gnas
438a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams bcom zhing / de bzhin du de bcom pa la dpa' bo zhes bya ste/ sdig dang / dge ba dang 'byal zhing sangs rgyas
438a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bdag cag gis kyang chos dang mthun par dge ba la gnas te/ sems canau la snying rje bya zhing spyan sder mchis pa'o// ma ga d+ha na thams cad mthong // ka shi na ni pad+ma 'chang / zhes bya ba ni/ mngon sum du 'jig
438a6(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum la rdzu 'phrul gyis mthong ste/ stobs de dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin ni rgya gar gyi dbus su'o// yul go shi ka nas pad+ma 'chang nas te/ pad+ma bzhin du spyan yod pa'i phyir na pad+ma 'chang ba'o// yangs pa can na rgyal
438b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog gnas// gyad yul na ni grags 'dzin gnas/ zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+ha na gnod sbyin rgyal mchog gnas de/ de bzhin du gyung yul na yang de dang 'dra bar gnas pa ste/ stobs che zhing gzi brjid dang ldan pa'o//
438b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i khab na kun b+hi ra// ser skya'i gnas na drag po ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ ri bo rgyal po'i khab kyi deng dpon ni gnod sbyin chen po kuM b+hi ra la sogs pa'o// de bzhin du ser skya'i yul na grags pa dang ldan pa grags pa'o//
438b3(rgyud 'grel): ta mya la ni 'byor pa gnas// mi tha~M la dang kun tu rgyal/ zhes bya ba ni/ mi thi la dong tA ma la gnyis ni ma ga d+ha'i lho phyogs yin te/ gnod sbyin chen po kuM b+hi dang kun tu rgyal gnas pa'o// mu mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni/
438b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod rnams kyi sde dpon mchog/ ces bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo brgyad yin te/ de yang 'di dag gis ming ni 'joms pa'i dngos grub dang / keng rus can dang / tshangs chen ma dang / nag mo chen mo dang / gzhon nu
438b5(rgyud 'grel): mo dang / rnam rgyal mo dang / drag mo dang / khyab 'jug mo dang brgyad do// de rnams ni 'jig rten gyi mar gyur cing mi sran gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag mo'o// rdzu 'phrul chen mo skal ba che// stobs chen de dgra thams cad ni/
438b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas 'jig rten khams la 'gyu ste/ kha dog ldan zhing gtor ma rnams len par byed pa'o// gzhan rnams kyis kyang mchod par 'os shing gtor ma len du gtad pa'o// yid dge dang pa'i sems dang
439a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan// rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs mchis pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi dad pa ma yin pa lnga nas kyang dad pa dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing rig sngags kyi chos la gus par
439a2(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la rjes su yi rang zhing skyabs su 'gro ba'o// de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang / rgyal po chen po stobs chen gyis/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yang stobs
439a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan te/ de dag kyang dbang du 'dra zhing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// yang dag rdzogs sang sA rgyas bstan la// mi rnams la ni sgying brtse slang / ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid la brten nas
439a4(rgyud 'grel): rig stegs kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams la 'jigs par mi byed cing / snying rje skye ba'o// gnod sbyin 'byung po yi dgas dang // sdong pa'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ sdig
439a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdon rnams bzlog par byed cing / de rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs pa'o// mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa
439a6(rgyud 'grel): yi// srung ba 'di ni legs par bgyid/ zhes bya ba ni/ srung ba'i dam pa rbod gtong dang / rig pa dang sngags dang / de rnams bzlog pa ste/ de bzhin du 'byung po dang / yi dgas la sogs pa bzlog par byed pa'o// de nas
439b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rnam thos bu// thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos bus// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar nas
439b2(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa'o// kho na dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa// rnam grol zag pa mi mnga' ba/ zhes bya ba ni/ shes bya'i dri ma dang / bag chags kyi dri ma mi gnas shing / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcom ste/ 'jigs pa thams
439b3(rgyud 'grel): cad dang bral bar byed pa dam pa'i dam pa'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams la dbang mdzad cing / bgeg thams cad bcom pa ste/ de bcom pas
439b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ dpa' bo zhes bya ba'o// gau ta ma la phyag 'tshal skyabs su 'gro ba'o// khyod la lha dang / grul bum dang / bram ze thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rten
439b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stong spyi phud kyi bdag po yin te/ yong na bram ze phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs par spyod pa'i dbang po de la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi zhes bya ba'o// gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang // bzhi stong dag kyang lhags nus
439b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs bstan pa/ sna tshogs kyi lta ba yod pa/ gnod byed dang phan byed gnyis yod pa/ sdig pa dang / dge ba byed pa sho stag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mang por 'dus pa'o// kho ra khor
440a1(rgyud 'grel): yug yongs bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi sa gzhi la/ gnod sbyin po rnams pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
440a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyan sngar phyogs phyogs nas bskor zhing thal mo sbyar ba'o// bdag ni rgyal po rnam thos bu// byang phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus kyang gnod sbyin chen po 'khor g.yog dang bcas shing byang
440a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs na bsrung bar bgyid pa'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye bskor du// gnod sbyin rgyu ba smyo byed dang // zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das gau la ba der gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / bcas shing bzhin sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams kyis
440a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor te/ 'byung po mang po spyan sder 'dus pa'o// brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci// skems byed pa ni rims drag dang / zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur du nad gtong ba dang / glo bur du bar chong byed pa 'di rnams yin te/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa 'di
440a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gnas pa'o// de bzhin rim rnaMs zhag bzhi pa/ de dag bdag gi bzlog par bgyi/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid
440a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ rims nad la sogs pa na rigs mi cig pa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzlog par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi/ 'byung po mang po rigs brtag pa'i gnas skabs te/ drug pa'o// // ba
440b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshal gyi rig sngags zhes bya ba 'di ni/ gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni/ mtshon pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so// mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i
440b2(rgyud 'grel): tshal lo// gzugs kyi phung po ste/ khams ni sa'i khams so// skye mched ni mig ste/ rang bzhin ni ye shes lnga'o// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/
440b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ zhal g.yas mthing ka/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gli dang 'khor lo/ g.yon pa gnyis ni dgra sta dang rtse gsum/ 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis
440b4(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu 'grengs pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa ste/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni
440b5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ u ha haM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lcang lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags kyi byin brlabs
440b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan po bsrung ste/ byang phyogaso sbyong zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// lha'i rgyal po nor lho'o bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la don byed
441a1(rgyud 'grel): cing / rnam thos kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin du 'byung po rnams kyis kyang skyabs su mchi zhes bya'o// de la bdag kyang phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o//
441a2(rgyud 'grel): de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal tau/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug sems can gyi don la sprul pa'i skyes khyab pa de la bdag gis phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun
441a3(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ ces bya ba ni/ shes bya dang bag chags kyi sgrib pa 'joms shing / 'jig rten gyi rnam par rtogs pa grol zhing / rgyal ba rnam pa la nas sangs rgyas so// 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs
441a4(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa khyod la 'dud do// zhes bya'o// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci ma log cing nges par bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/ yang dag po'i ye shes thob cing / sems can
441a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi don mdzad pa'o// de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis bdag kyang sems can la snying rje byas shing spyan sngar mchis so// zhes bya ba'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos kyi bu'i tshig gi de nas so// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srungs//
441a6(rgyud 'grel): thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs kyi rgyal po dri za thams cad la dbang mdzad pa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa'o// chos
441b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa// sangs rgyas dpal la bdag phyag 'tshal/ zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig rten la bshad nas sku mya ngan las 'das te/ chos de'i 'od zer 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la
441b2(rgyud 'grel): khyab ste/ de bzhin du de sangs rgyas shing snying rje che la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o// gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad spangs shing
441b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rnams btul ba ste/ de bzhin du 'khor ba'i mun nag sel zhing sangs rgyas pa'o// de lta bu'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis bdag cag dri za rnams ni sems can rnams la snying rje byas shing spyan sngar mchis so// gau ta ma
441b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// de ni lha rnams phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshul gyi ye shes de ni bdag cag rnams kyis mi shes te/ bsam gyiso mi khyab pa/ rang bzhin dang bral ba/
441b5(rgyud 'grel): skyo ba med pa'i rang bzhino// srin po mthong na rab 'jigs pa// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa dang / sdug pa rnams dri za srin po mang po 'dus pa'o// kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas// thal
441b6(rgyud 'grel): mo sbyar te 'khor gyur lags/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal la/ srin po'i gdon dang / dri za'i gdon rnams kyis phyogs bzhi nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
442a1(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar nas 'jig rten mgon po la'o// bdag ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung // shar phyogs rgyal skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
442a2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung zhing / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ste/ rig sngags 'di 'tshong ba'i gang zag la shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid cing sems can gyi don byed pa'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du// srin po rnams
442a3(rgyud 'grel): dang sha za dang // zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'do' zhing / de rnams kyis kyang skyong bar byed pa'o// dri za dang ni rlung lha rnams// de dag bdag gi bzlog
442a4(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ zhes bya bu ni/ dri zla'i rgyal po yul 'khor snang gis kyang / rbo drA gtong dang reg pa dang / sngags dang ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bo zlog cing rig sngags la gus par byed pa ste/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni
442a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi rin chen rigs// mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal lo// ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyun tsan+ta/
442a6(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ser mo/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che/ g.yon pa gnyis na pad+ma dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa'o//
442b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dung zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing / sgeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o//
442b2(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ i Te mi Te la sogs rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung phyogs skyong bar gyur cig/ ces bya ba ni// ra phyogasu skyong ba ste/ rig sngags 'di la bka' stsal cing
442b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can don la skyong ba'o// srin po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ shwar phyogs na gnod par byed pa ste rnams ni/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams shar phyogs nas byung ba bzlog pa'o//
442b4(rgyud 'grel): lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi bo mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la skyabasu mchis te/ shar phyogs kyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal ba'o// de la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs
442b5(rgyud 'grel): na yod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o// de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal ba ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom drug lhan/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshalo zhes pa'o// rdzogs pa'i
442b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ ces bya ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bcom ste/ de lnga dang bral nas mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de lta bu'i sangs rgyas
443a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis kun nas kun tu 'jigs pa bcom ste/ de yang 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa bcom pa'o// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci ma log cing
443a2(rgyud 'grel): ga sngags kyi ngo bo nyid bstan te/ de'i ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom ste/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas chos la mthun par byas shing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ yul
443a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor srung gi tshig gi de nas so// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po// thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phogs skyes pos kyang stan las langs te/ bocom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo
443a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba'o// 'jig rten mgon po skyabs mdzad pa// 'jig rten kun la phan byar mdzad/ ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i
443a5(rgyud 'grel): skus khyab ste/ de rnams la byams pa dang snying rje gzigs nos sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mong
443a6(rgyud 'grel): po rnams btsam zhing dpa' bo ste/ sku gsung thugs thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas pa de'i chos bzhin grul bum bdag cag gis mchis te/ sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o// grul
443b1(rgyud 'grel): bum yi dgas srul po rnams// stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ lho phyogs na/ grul bum gdon rigs mi gcig pa 'byung ste/ sbun pa dang myi srun pa sha stag mang po 'dus pa'o// kho ra khor yug yongasu skor nas/
443b2(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs phyogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la gus pas thal mo sbyar ba'o// bdag ni rgyal po 'phags
443b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes po// lho phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ste/ gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba'i de la lho phyogs skyong par byed pa'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du//
443b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po rgyu ba gzi brjid 'phrog/ ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang bar du gcod cing gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/ drag shul gyis ni gnod par byed pa'o// grul bum yi dgas srul po rnams// de dag bdag gis
443b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog par bgyid/ zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis grul bum gyi gdon bzlog pa dang zong gtong dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlog ste/ de yang reg sngags kyi rgyal mo'i rig pas
443b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi pad+ma'i rigs so// rig sngags 'di'i mtshon pa ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes so// mtshon byed ni rig sngags bdag nyid// phung po ni 'du shes kyi
444a1(rgyud 'grel): phung po ste/ khams ni ma'i khams so// skye mched na lha m+b+ha/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no// sangs rgyas lnga'i da rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/
444a2(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar mo/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang pad+ma/ g.yon pa gnyis na lcags kyu dang zhags pa/ 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang
444a3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa ste/ cung zad khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ A le a li le la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
444a4(rgyud 'grel): po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig gis rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag dang sems can thams cad la rgyal po chen po 'phog
444a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pos rog sngags kyi dam las ma 'da' bar srung ba'o// grul bum dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos kyang / lho phyogs skyong zhing nad thams cad 'joms shing / grul bum la sogs
444a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yi dgas bzlog par byed cing / rig sngags 'chang ba'i gang zag la skyong bar byed pa'o// lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po/ lho phyogs
444b1(rgyud 'grel): skyong bar mchis te/ de la bdag gis phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 'gro ba'o// de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ gul bum gyi gdon la sogs pa 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o// de
444b2(rgyud 'grel): yong bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom ste zhing sangs rgyas te/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sems can thams cad la snying rjes khyab ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes
444b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ ces bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul zhing / 'jig rten gyi bya ba por
444b4(rgyud 'grel): nas mun pa'i mun nag sol te/ de lta bu'i 'khor ba bzhag nas sangs rgyas te/ lus ngag yid yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// de'i ye shes kyis kun nas kun tu nyon mongs pa rnams la sprul pa'i skus 'jig
444b5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi khams la khyab ste/ de rnams kyis 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar byed cing / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// yang dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing
444b6(rgyud 'grel): mchis/ zhes bya bo ni/ nyon mongs pa lnga bcom zhing dpa' ba ste/ phyin ci ma log pa ye shes thob cing / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dud pa ste/ bdag cag grul bum gyi rigs la sogs
445a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshul gyi gzi brjid kyis sems can la 'tshe bar mi byed cing snying rje dang ldan pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags skyes po'i tshig gis de nas so// rgyal
445a2(rgyud 'grel): pi chen po mig mi bzang / thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po de yang stan las longs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar
445a3(rgyud 'grel): nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes po'o// mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten l+ya// bcom ldan lam rnams ston mdzad pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis ye shes de yang nus te/ de'i ye shes brtan par byed pa
445a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bstun pa'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin mthun par lto zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom pas na dpa' bo ste/ de bcom zhing ye shes
445a5(rgyud 'grel): thob pa ste/ bdag cag klu rnams kyang sems can gyi don byed cing snying rje la gnas pa'o// 'jig rten dag ni nyi zla 'dra// rin chen snying po stobs po che// zhes bya ba ni/ rang gis ye shes shAr taM/ de'i ye shes kyang
445a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la khyab pa'o// de bzhin ra nya zla yang rang gi 'od zer gyis sdang ba'o// de'i 'od zer thob cing yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams so// klu dang mkha' snyi
445b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba pa// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / klu'i gdon sa bdag la sogs pa nub phyogs nas mang po 'dus te/ de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro//
445b2(rgyud 'grel): kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'khong gyur lags/ zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams kyis kyang / dur khrod bsil ba'i tshul la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyogs bzhi nas bskor nos/ pus
445b3(rgyud 'grel): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas zhu ba 'bul ba'o// zhes bya ba'o// bdag ni rgyal po mig mi bzang // nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par
445b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis kyang klu'i gdon srung ba'i don du/ nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid do// zhes bya ba'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i nyen 'khor du//
445b5(rgyud 'grel): klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / srin po'i gdon dang / sa bdag la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ sems can rnams
445b6(rgyud 'grel): la gnod par bgyi // zhes pa'o// lho min dbang po stobs po che// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyid/ zhes bya ba ni/ sa bdag gi gdon la sogs pa/ gsang ba po dang klu rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos gno
446a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'i sems pa'i gdon dang / rgod gtong dang / gzhan gyis rig pa dang / de rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang de rnams bzlog par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi rdo rje ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi rdo
446a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rigs ma ste/ mtshon pa ni/ me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bdag nyid do// phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ khams ni nam mkha'i khams so// skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched do// rang
446a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing sa// zhal g.yas dkar ba/ gauyon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas
446a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na/ ral gr-I dang / rdo rje/ g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang rdo rje rgya gram/ de'i 'og ma gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od dang
446a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ khro bo'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ Ta ka ga Ta ka ge zhes bya pa la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ bcom

446b2(rgyud 'grel): nang ni lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ nub phyogs kyi rgyal po spyan mi bzang dang / yang dag thabs gcig tu gzi brji che zhing stobs che ba/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan te/ lha

446b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi po bcom zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shos kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab cing thugs rje'i spyan gyis lta ba'i bcom ldan 'das
446b5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ ces bya ba ni/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / bag chags kyi sgrib pa de nyid spangs po'o// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdzogs
446b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad spangs nas sangs rgyas pa'o// gau ta ma yang bdag cag gis kyang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang

447b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po rnams la bsrung ba dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bde bar gnas shing yang dag pa'i ye shes thob ste/ gal te 'jig rten gyi kham su skye bar 'gyur na/ rig pa 'di dang mi 'bral zhing nam skye ba'i dus su dran
448a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur zhing / bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang de bzhin du bsrung ba dang / skyob pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni

448a5(rgyud 'grel): chol 'di dag gis thugs la bzung ste/ de bzhin du gsum pa dang skyes kyang yin no// de bas na yongasu bzung ngo zhes bya ba'o// kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi la yang nas yang

448b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang gsungs par 'gyur te/ de yang byams pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba'o// de ltar bdag gis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/

449a3(rgyud 'grel): po che bzhin du yid/ de lta bu'i chos kyi nyams myed sems lan thams nas sangs nas shings sdig can 'du kyi rilas rnams la mi 'jigs pa bstan pa'o// sor mo re re la yang 'od zer sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ 'od zer sa yang
449a4(rgyud 'grel): shes lha'i rang bzhin ro// ye shes la mi dang be lnga ste/ pang po lnga ni rigs lnga las lnga'i sa lnga po de lnga stong pa nyid bas mo// de lta bu'i phyag rgya 'byung po rnams la ston pa'o// bsam mi khyab pa'i rig skalas di
449a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o 'angs 'di bstam zla ba ni/ rig stegs ste pa bzhin gyi ye shes da nanas mas ste/ das po med pa'i rang bzhin brjod med pa/ dag pa 'di yin zhes bya bar brjod pa na so// sngams kyi phyag rgya

449b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi dril bu dkur brten cing gnas pa'o// de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dbu steng du mdzad pa'o// g.yas pa gsum ni rdo rje/ bzhi pa na ral gri/ lnga pa na 'khor lo/ g.yon pa gsuM
450a1(rgyud 'grel): na rin po che/ bzhi pa na zhags pa/ lnga pa na lcags kyu/ de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// thabs shes rab ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pas rgyas

450a6(rgyud 'grel): bas 'di'i sngags bshang ma thag tu sa g.yo ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba'o// sa ni kun tu g.yos zhes bya ba ni/ rnam pa drug tu g.yas/ ji bzhin du g.yos she na sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yoso//
450b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu cham tsham/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun tu
