450b6(rgyud 'grel): bsags te/ tshogs bsags pa de yang / sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ste/ mnyam pa nyid kyi sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o// 'byung po kun 'jigs nyen pa yi// rig sngags 'di 'dra gsung bar mdzad/ ces bya ba ni/
451a1(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi dmod mos ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang bcom zhing thul bar rlog pa ste/ de lta bu'i gzi brjid che ba'i rig sngags ni sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas gsung ba'o// de nas kun mkhyen ston
451a2(rgyud 'grel): pa po// sems can kun la thugs rtse ba shes bya ba ni/ de nas ni mtshams sbyor ba de nas so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan te/ de yang sems can rigs mi cig pas theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sems
451a3(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la/ byams pa dang snying rjes khyab pa'o// gnod sbyin srin po dri za dong // klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba ba/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can las kyi 'bras bu mi cig pas/ 'byung po'i lus su gzhan la gnod pa'i sems dang
451a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan par skyes te/ de yang yi dgas dang / byol song gI lus su skyes pa'o// 'byung po rgyu ba gAzi brjid 'phrog/ gul bum yi dgas stsal po dang / zhes bya ba ni/ de rgyu ba dang sems can phrad par gyur na/ gti mu gA dang zhe sdang yod
451a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ sems can rnams la gzi brjid 'phyog ste/ snying rje'i semos dang mi ldan pa'o// lha minu gshed byed ro langs dang // brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci// zhes bya ba ni/ dri rnams la bza' ba med cing skom pa'i sbyin pa ma btang
451a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing khro ba ste/ la la yang mchod rdzas la sogs pa za bar yod pa ni/ sbyin pa gtong zhing khro bar byas pa'o// skems byed dang nau rims drag dang // de bzhin bram ze srin po dang / zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan la grags pa 'dod pas//
451b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi sgrog gcod cing / sbyin pa zad pa med pa btang ste/ de'i 'bras bus kyang srin po la sogs par skye zhing snying rje med pa'o// skyo byed rims nang zhag gsum pa// de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams// zhes bya ba ni 'byung
451b2(rgyud 'grel): bo dang / 'byung ba ma yin pa/ rims de dag kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa ste/ gzhan yang nang rlung dang / bad kan+da dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa bzhi brgya brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yang 'joms pa'o// skrag cing rab
451b3(rgyud 'grel): tu 'dar gyur te// phyogs bcur rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang / zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid mthong bas 'jigs shing skrag pa ste/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang 'bros par 'gyuraro// de dag
451b4(rgyud 'grel): la ni thugs rje'i phyir// rig sngags 'di brjod par mdzad/ ces bya ba ni/ de dag kyang las kyi 'bras bus skyes te/ de yang sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sems kyis sems can la 'bros par 'gyur// de dag kyang las kyis
451b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bus skyes te/ de yang sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sems kyis sems can la mnyam pa nyid du khyab ste/ de yang rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyisu med pa ste/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi
451b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi ye shes so// thabs kyi ngo bo nyid ni rig sngagaso// de'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te/ phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po'o// khams ni sa'i khams te/ skye mched ni mig gis skye mched do//
452a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyun can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ zhal g.yas mthing ka/ gAyon ljang
452a2(rgyud 'grel): gu/ rgya ba dmar ba'o// dbu la 'khor los brgyan pa'o// zhi ba'i gzugs can mo'o// phyag g.yos dang po na/ snying khar rdo rje brten cing / g.yon dril bu dku la brtan pa'o// de'i 'og ma g.yas pa gsum na ral gri dang /
452a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang / dgra sta'o// de bzhin du g.yon pa gsum na/ zhags pa dang / rtse gsum dang / dung bsnams pa'o// zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs shing / pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o// rig stag+ta
452a4(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshig go/ hi ri ma khA/ ti ta kha kha kA Ta ma Ti la sogs pa'o/
452a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags chen mo'i rig sngags chen mo 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang rig sngags las 'gal bar byed par gyur na/ tshe 'di la yang sdug bsngal drag po thob/
452a6(rgyud 'grel): cing / phyi ma la yang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gi chos la yang dag par rtogs shig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' la mi bden pa mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi
452b1(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// kun mkhyen lus zhig ste zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das shing / rig sngags la smra bar gyur na/ mgo bo dang lus tshal pa brgya
452b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gas shing / ar dza kA'i many+dzar bzhin du 'gas te/ tshe 'di la yang nad kyis sdug bsngal chen po thob par 'gyur ro// shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par lhung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhing 'khor
452b3(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gro ba re zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i 'byung po rnams ni/ shi 'phros ma thag tu mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du/ mnar med sreg ste/ gal te dmyal ba de nas 'phos na yang
452b4(rgyud 'grel): dmyal ba gzhan du yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ rgyas par bshad pa'i de nas so// rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni
452b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcom pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs la mkhas pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gnyen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum/
452b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la khyad par 'phags pa 'di thos pa'o// skrag cing sngangs te/ mi dga' la spyi bung zhes byed nas/ thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mdog shor zhing
453a1(rgyud 'grel): ba spu rnams kyang gyen du log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dad pa skyes nas thal mo sbyar ba'o// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun par dang / tshig mthun pa dang zhes bya
453a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni rgyal po chen po de rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o// skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to// zhes bya ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas nas//
453a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o// sdang ba'i 'byung po zad bgyid pa// rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs/ zhes bye ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs/ sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa rnams//
453a4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi dmod mas rlag par byed pa'o// dngos po med cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o// mi yi 'jig rten bden
453a5(rgyud 'grel): bgyid pa'i// rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal/ zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di 'chang ba rnams bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / skyob pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal thams cad
453a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bral bar byed pa'o// de la rig sngags 'di lags te/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ zhes bya ba ni/ sha za dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon 'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs shing / ngo bo
453b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang bral zhing mi dmigs pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gis kyang / rig sngags legs par gsungs shing legs par nyon cig ces gsungs pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis
453b2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrungs te/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ thabs dang shes rab ma bral ba'o// mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags bsil ba'i tshul lo//
453b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs ni rin po che'i rigs te/ phung po ni tshor ba'o// khams ni chu'i khams te/ skye mched ni sna'i skye mched do// ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
453b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas dkar mo/ g.yon mthing ka/ rgyab dmar po'o// phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog sar mo/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dril bu dkor brten pa/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis pa
453b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rnams ni ral gri dang / rin po che dang / mnga' bosnams pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rnams na zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu bsnams
453b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs shing / pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ste/ lo bcu gnyis pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing / sgeg pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'o// rig sngags dang /
454a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags gzhan gyis mi thub pas ni/ gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ u hu ha la ku li dzi ba/ la sogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa 'di bzung bar gsol zhes bya ba
454a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sngags dang / rbod gtong dang / gzhan gyi rig pa dang / ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung pa rnams/ rig sngags kyi gzi baN+Did dang / stobs kyis bzlog par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi ngo bo 'di yang stong pa nyid
454a3(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o// shes rab kyi ngo bo ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni rig sngags nyid do// de yang thabs dang / shes rab gnyis su med cing / mtshon pa dang
454a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon byed yang gnyisu med do// rig sngags de'i rigs ni pad+ma'i rigs te/ phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o// khams ni me'i khams te/ skye mched ni lce'i skye mched do// ye shes lnga'i ngo bo ni rig lnga'i dbu rgyan can//
454a5(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje snying khar brten pa/ g.yon pa dang pos dril bu dkur brten pa'o// g.yas gnyis na
454a6(rgyud 'grel): ral gri/ gsum pa na pad+ma/ g.yon gnyis pa na dgra sta dang / gsum pa na rtse gsum mo// de'i 'og ma g.yos g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs shing pad+ma dang zla ba'i
454b1(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan te/ zhal g.yas dkar po/ g.yon mthing ka/ rgyab ser po/ bzhad pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags pad+ma'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ 'di
454b2(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ i li i li la sogs pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni lo gcig gi bar du mtshams gcod pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ lo gcig gi sngon du yang bsrung bar byed par 'gyur/ srung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab
454b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / mtshams gcod pa dang / dug zhi ba dang / dug bsang pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur zhing / rig sngags dngosu sgrub par 'gyuraro// 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang / don thams cad sgrub pa lagaso zhes bya ba ni/
454b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ sdig can gyi rigs ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad kyang mi 'ong ste/ gal te 'ong bar gyur ni rog sngags kyi dmod mos brlag par 'gyu ro// bya ba thams cad grub cing bde bar gnas pa'o// de nas we
454b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni bar du gcod pa'i de nas// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/ de dang da mra slobs pa'i mtsham su 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang bar du chod par byas te/ rig sngags
454b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di byung ba tsam gyis kyang bar du gcod par mi nus pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di chad pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa
455a1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin po lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bsrung ba/ sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos nas/ skrag cing dngangs la mi dga' ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ khyad par du 'phags shing
455a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang yin te/ ma rungs pa rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ngan song gsum nas 'byin pa'i gzungs 'di yang dag pa'o// spyi bung zhes byed nas/ sa la
455a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzul/ kun tu 'dzul/ kun tu rab tu 'dzul bar byed do// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dang / da mod mos sdig can gyi rigs 'byung po rnams// de yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid mthong bas mo tshugs pos skad ngan
455a4(rgyud 'grel): grags ste/ de rnams kyang sa la 'dzul zhing bying por 'gyur ro// mthong bar mi gnas shing so so rang rang bros so// de nI sa zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams 'jigs pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gzhi rdo rjer sprul
455a5(rgyud 'grel): nas zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs de rnams rdzu 'phrul sa la 'dzul du mi ster zhing // rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i sa gzhir snang ba'o// de dag phyogs bzhir rgyu ge go zhes
455a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sdig can 'byung po bdud kyi rigs de rnams ni/ sa la 'dzul ma nus shing phyogs phyogs su bros te hag zang ngo // de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams bros pa'i de nas so// rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs
455b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir me lce'i phung po mngon par sprul to// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis kyang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du me sna tshogs sprul zhing / sdig can de rnams
455b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gror mi stir ba'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ tshig spel pa'i de nas so// de dag namakha' la rgyag go zhes bya ba ni/ sdig ci na rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis namakha' la rgyug ste/ phyogs mtshams bzhi la 'dzul ba med cing
455b3(rgyud 'grel): namakha' la rgyug pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ namakha' la bros pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das kyi na mkho'i gser du sprul to// zhes bya ba ni/ na mkha'i phyogs ni/ rdo rje'i gser gyi sa gzhir byin gyis brlabs ste/
455b4(rgyud 'grel): sdig can de rnams kyang 'gro dbang med cing sdug pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ sdug pa'i de nas so// 'jig rten skyong rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu lha dang / dri zas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ stong gi na mkha' bar snang
455b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'phags nas zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod par byed pa'o sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ drug shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la srog 'phrog pa'i sems/
455b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa sha stag/ sdig can gyi rigs 'byung po de rnams 'gro mi rnyed cing mar log nas/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la skyabasu tshol ba'o// gnod sbyin dang srin bu nas gnod pa byed pa'i bar rnams gzhon pa
456a1(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ dpa' zhing gzi brjid che ba ste stobs dang ldan zhing / sdig can bdud kyi rigs/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa'o// sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / 'byung po thad
456a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa dang / zhes bya bu ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi dron du byams pa dang / snying rje dang / btang snyoms kyis khyab ste/ de lta bu'i thugs rjes khyab nas/ byad dang ro langs dang / dug dang dug sbyor dang / dug
456a3(rgyud 'grel): 'thung ba dang / gzhan gyi rig pa dang / sngags dang / rbod stong dang / 'jig rten gyi ma mo dang / ngan sngags sbyor ba dang / sdig can bdud kyi rigs de rnams la sogs pa rig sngags kyi gzi brjid 'joms pa'o// 'khor bzhi
456a4(rgyud 'grel): po rnams bsrung ba dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ de bzhin du bdud kyi rigs 'byung po la sogs pa bcom zhing / bar chod med cing bde bar gnas te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed pa'o//
456a5(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags 'di brjod do// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gzhan gyis ma bcom par gnyug ma ste/ phyogs dang bral zhing rang bzhin med pa de lta bu'i ye shes brjod pa'o// de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
456a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs ni las thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ las kyi gdon thams cad 'joms pa las thams cad grub/ sna tshogs kyi rigs su snang ba'o// de yang rig sngags kyi mtshon po ni/ bya ba nan tan
456b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi ye shes so// mtshon byed ni rig sngags bdag nyid do// phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o// khams ni rlung gi khams so// skye mched ni lus kyi skye mched do// ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum
456b2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog ljang nag/ zhal g.yas dkar po// g.yon dmar po/ rgyab ser po// phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje gdengs pa/ gnyis pa na ral gri/ gsum pa na rdo rje rgya gram mo// g.yon dang po na
456b3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu/ gnyis pa zhags pa/ gsum pa 'khor lo'o// 'og ma'i phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhi 'gengs shing / zhabs g.yas pa pus mo btsugs pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin 'byung
456b4(rgyud 'grel): po rnams mnan pa'o// pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od ldan pa'o// yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ khro bo 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs so// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags las kyi snying pos ni/ las
456b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'grub cing bdud tha~Md 'dul ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ gi ma gi ma la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs skyong bar gyur cig / ces bya ba
456b6(rgyud 'grel): nisangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi byin brlabs kyi gang zag rig sngags la gus pa dang / son thams cad dang / de la bsrung ba dang / skyong bar byed cing / rig sngags kyi chos kyi bsrung po'o// lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i
457a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o// nor thams cad gzhan gyi don du byin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa ste/ de lta bu'i sems dang ldan
457a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ nor lha lta bu byung ba'o// de la bdag phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i byang chub soda' la rgyal po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o// de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bdud rnams
457a3(rgyud 'grel): las rnam par rgyal zhing dgra rnams kyang ma lus te/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas pa te/ de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das la/ bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/
457a4(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// ces bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom zhing // dpa' ba ste/ sku gsung thugs rdzogs par byas pas na rdzogs po ste/ dug gsum dang bral zhing / sangs rgyas pa'o// de lta
457a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ shes rab chen po khyod la 'dud// ces bya ba ni/ sngon bskal pa grangs med pa'i dus su tshogs rdzogs te/ de ltar ma lus par sems can thams cad rdzogs par 'dod nas/ theg
457a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs bstan pa ste/ rkang gnyis kyi tshogs kyi dam pa/ phyi nang gi tshogs la mkhas pa/ thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad la byams pas khyab pa'o// de lta bu'i thub pa chen po
457b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud pa'o// gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa de ni lha rnams ma 'tshul to// zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i ye shes ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang de bzhin no// de lta bu'i ye shes zhes pa ni/ lta ci smos
457b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ rang nyid kyis rang gi rig pa yang mi shes pa'o// rang gi rig pa'i ci'i phyir ma shes na/ rang la skyes pa'i ma rig pas ma shes pa'o// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// zhes
457b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni yang dag par bdud bzhi bcom ste/ de 'dul bas na dpa' bo ste/ ngo lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa la yang dag par 'dud de/ bdag cag kyang snying rje dang ldan zhing mchis pa'o// zhes bya ba'o// gnang sbyin dang / srin pa
457b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams mi 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa las gung du dengs shig ces bya ba ni/ ma rung ba'i sdig can 'byung po rnams ni/ gang zag r-ig sngags 'chang ba dang / sem
457b5(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la gnod pa byas nas/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos mgo bo a tsa ka ra ma dza ri'i rdog pa bzhin du tsha lAM par 'gas pa'o// gA la te mang+ga 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du ma dong na// zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa mo 'chang
457b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gong du sdig can ma rungs pa rnams kyis bzung bar gyur ma/ de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du rig pa 'chang ste/ de'i chos bzhin du gang thog dang seni la bsrung bar byis te/ myur du ma thon na nyes pa chen por 'gyur/
458a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang / nang drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bkra' las 'das pa sdig can gtum po'i rigs 'byung po rnams ni nang drag po mdza dang / phrol mig dang /
458a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras dang lhog pa dang / sha kr-i dang me sbal dang chu bur dang / 'brum bu dang / lus thams cad rul zhing g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad kyi thebs shing srog dang 'bral te/ shi 'phos nas kyang munar med du skye ba'o// de'i rkyen gyis
458a3(rgyud 'grel): mgo dang snying tshal pa rgyar 'gas par 'gyur to zhes bya ba ni// gang zag ji bzhin du gnod par byed bzhin te sdig can de yang sdug bsngal drag po thob ste/ nang chen pos btab pa'o// de'i mos la sdug bsngal du mo 'byung ba
458a4(rgyud 'grel): dang brlag pa dang / mtha' med par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag po 'byung ste/ gar yang 'gro sa med cing lcang lo can gyi pho byang yang mi thob ste/ de'i lus kyang zhig cing rul par 'gyur
458a5(rgyud 'grel): ro/ 'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang skya reng 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang bsal ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'dis thos nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'di gdon pa dang sgom pa dang
458a6(rgyud 'grel): yid la byed pa dang / gdam ngag byin po dang / bshad pa dang / rjes su yi rang zhing 'chang ba ste/ de dag la gnod par 'gyur na/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'o// yang na rig sngogs 'di mnyam na se naM la 'tshe bar mi
458b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du dengs shig ces bya ba ni/ gnod par byed pa rnams gang zag dang sems can thaMd kyi don la myur du thon cig ces bya ba'o// yang na rig sngags kyi dmong mos sdug bsngal
458b2(rgyud 'grel): myur du thob po zhes bya ba'o// gal te myur du ma dngos na 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'ongs shing ma btang bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i
458b3(rgyud 'grel): tshong pa'i 'jigs po dang / g.yan pa'i nang la sogs pas myur du thebs par 'gyur ro// de'i rkyen gyi mgo bo dang snying tshal pa rgyar 'gas par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig
458b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi dmod mos a dza ri'i gdogs pa bzhin du 'gas pa'o// de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang / brlag pa dang mtha' med par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du rig sngags kyi dmos mos 'gro sa mi
458b5(rgyud 'grel): rnyed cing / de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal drag po thob ste/ shi nAs kyang man+tar med kyi mes sregs cing / dmyal ba nas dmyal bar 'khor ro// gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba/ nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa/ zhes bya ba
458b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ zas su khrag za dang shi za dang la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogapa rgyu zhing ma byed cig ces bya'o// de dgas kyang legs gsungs
459a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ mdo bshad thos nas spang bar gyis// zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis// rig sngags 'di yang yang dag par gsungs te/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams
459a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang // rje su yi rang zhing srung ba ste/ de bzhin du khyad par du 'phags pa'i mdo 'di thob par gyur na/ sems can la gnod par byed pas sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa thob pa'o// de bas na sbyangs par gyis zhes bya ba'o//
459a3(rgyud 'grel): sha za lus 'phags skem byed dang // 'byung po 'jigs byed srul po rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang sems can la ga nod par bya ste/ de yang dam la btags nas gnod par byed pa spangs pa'o//
459a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i// mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas thong // zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs te/ de bzhin rgyal po bzhi po rnams kyis
459a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig srung ste/ rigs sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sdig can 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa'o// lha dang lha minA rlung lha dang / dri zla dang ni gdon gyi bla/ zhes bya ba ni/ zhe sdang dang gti mug gis
459a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad la gnod par byas te/ nga yang rigs sngags kyi gzi brjid dam pa thob pa'o// 'byung po dang ni sha za dang / de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ ser sna dang / zhe sdang dang / 'dod
459b1(rgyud 'grel): chags kyi sems can rnams la 'tsher bar byas te/ de yang rigs sngags kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs pas gnod mi nus pa'o// kun tu 'khrugs shing kun tu g.yos// skra gcing kun tu rab tu 'gul// zhes bya ba ni/ rig
459b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di'i gzi brjid dang / stobs kyi saM lan drug du g.yos te/ de bzhin du ltas chen po bco brgyad byung ba'o// kun tu khrugs shing kun tu g.yos pa ni sha re dma' ste/ nub mtho ba'o// nub dma' na shar mtho//
459b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs phyogs rnams kyang de bzhin no// mgo 'khrugs shing phyogs rnams gtor ba'o// de bas kyang skrag cing kun tu 'gul ba ste/ yun ring zhing drag pa'o// gdon dang gnod par byed pa rnams// lhung zhing rab tu pham
459b4(rgyud 'grel): por 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs kyi 'byung po rnams ni/ sems can la gnod par byed pas rang pham ste/ sdug bsngal chen po thob cing rig sngags kyi domaung mos 'joms pa'o// sa bzhi dag
459b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang rab tu g.yos// sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// ces bya ba ni/ rigs sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa g.yo zhing 'byung po rnams skrag par byed/ sa de yang
459b6(rgyud 'grel): rnga bo che dang cha lang dang dril bu'i skad 'byung ngo // kun tu rabau tu 'byung ngo zhes bya'o// yi dgas dang ni grul bum rnams// sdang ba'i gdon ni bzlog byed pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang sems can drag
460a1(rgyud 'grel): bor gnod par byas te/ gzhan gang gis kyang mi thub cing de'i gnyen po lta bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te/ mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur na// 'jigs pa drag po 'bebs par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni/ gnod
460a2(rgyud 'grel): byed sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang sdig pa'i seMs dang ldan pa dang seMn gyi srog 'dod pa rnams// rig sngags kyi rgyal mi bsil ba'i tshal 'dis brlag par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas chos dang ngag 'dun la/ dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa//
460a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la dga' zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams skyong bar byed de/ sangs rgyas
460a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la rje su yi rang zhing rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas// legs
460a5(rgyud 'grel): par rje su yi rang ngo // zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'byung de rnams kyang rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi chos la dga' zhing snga nas kyang chos la dad pa yod de/ de ltar dad pa kun tu rab
460a6(rgyud 'grel): tu skyes nas dga' bas rab tu dga' ste/ chos la mchod pa legs par mchod nas/ de rnams kyi rje su yi rang ngo // zhes bya ba'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi 'byung po dam la btags pa'i ga nas
460b1(rgyud 'grel): skabs te brgyad pa'o// // de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po dam la btags pa'i de nas so// rgyal po chen po bzhi par snang las babs nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po de yang chos la rab tu dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das
460b2(rgyud 'grel): la snga nas kyang dad pa skyes te/ de ltar yang rab tu skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga si la/ gA la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas zhes bya ba ni/ so so rang gi 'od zer yang 'phags te/ bsil
460b3(rgyud 'grel): ba tshal gyis chos 'di la dang pa yang nas yang du skyes te/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yang de bzhin no// de bas na rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang legs lhags po zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
460b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' nas zhabs kyi pad+ma la gus pas phyag 'tshal ba'o// thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom
460b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o// gros mthun pa dang tshigs mthun pa dang skad mthun par/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
460b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol to// zhes bye ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas shing rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi chos la gus po'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba tshal gyis
461a1(rgyud 'grel): mdo chen po 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang sems can thams cad la rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis khyab ste/ sdang ba'i sems zhi bar byed pa 'khor ba rnams
461a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom zhing yang dag pa'i ya shre m+bI las bstan pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhos zhabs la phyag bgyi ba dang / zhes bgyi ba ni gus par bya ba phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po chen po bzhis rang yang srung zhing ngag gis 'don pa dang /
461a3(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis bzung ba dang / lus kyi bcang bar byas te/ rigs sngags 'di yang btags nas kyang / ngan song gsum du mi 'gro zhing byang chub kyi lam bstan pa'o// 'khor bzhi po rnams la srung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/
461a4(rgyud 'grel): dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam dge snyen ma la sogs pa'i sems can rnams yang bsrung ba'i dam pa'o// yongasu skyob pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan las kyang khyad par du 'phags te/ zhi ba dang bde
461a5(rgyud 'grel): legasu 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o// gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams 'joms pa lagaso// zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa bdud kyi rigs rnams kyi 'byung po de yang
461a6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms shing rigs sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dog gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la rig sngags kyi 'dri bar
461b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ste/ de yang 'khor bzhi la rtag tu srung bar byed pa'o// dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge snyen nam dge snyen ma de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la cag tu 'khor ba'i 'khor bzhi yin te/ rig sngags
461b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang de dag srung zhing bar chod bsal te rtag tu bde ba thob pa'o// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bzung bgyi brjod par bgyi kun chub par bgyi'o// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab
461b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di dur khrod chen po yi dwags dang 'byung po rnams kyis gnyen po 'ang / mi'i sems can rnams kyi ston pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skyong bar byed pa ste/ 'khor bzhi po dag gis
461b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'chang ba dang / bzung nus kyang sems can thams cad la bstan nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa ste/ 'khor bzhi po dag gi kyang lus ngag yid bzung ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
461b5(rgyud 'grel): sa bya ba ni/ rgyal pa bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das la yang zhu ba 'bul ba'o// dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam dge snyen ma gang la la zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi po ngag dang sems can thams
461b6(rgyud 'grel): cad la bsrung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed de/ 'di'i lam nas kyang byang chub kyi tshogs bstan pa'o// bdag srung ba dang bdag sba ba dang / gzhan sba ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni/ gang
462a1(rgyud 'grel): zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams srung ba ste/ byams pa dang snying rje'i lam nas bdag gis kyang sems can gyi don la bstan par bya zhes bya ba'o// bsil ba'i
462a2(rgyud 'grel): tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang brjod pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de la ni/ zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs shes rab gnyisu med pa ste/ chos dang longs spyod dang sprul pa'i
462a3(rgyud 'grel): skus khyab pa ste/ de bzhin du 'di la gus pa byas pa'i gang zag ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral ba'o// gnod sbyin dang srin bu nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nyan 'khor yang gnas por mi 'gyur na/
462a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod par bgyid pa lta ga la sems lags zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ dpa' ba stobs che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ dpa' ba stobs che zhing sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa
462a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gang zag 'di 'chang ba la da lha'i rkyenu lta ci smos te/ tshe phyi ma la yang de bzhin no// de gang du mtshan gcig tsam gnas pa der yang zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyul mo bsil ba'i tshul 'di yang grong ngem
462a6(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/ ljongs la sogs pa la yi ge gcig tsam yang dag par gyur na/ de bzhin du 'byung po 'am/ yi dgas la sogs pa gnod par mi 'gyur te/ grong de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la
462b1(rgyud 'grel): yang khrag khrug dang rtsod pa dang rims drag po'i nang mi 'byung ste/ gzhan gyi dang rgyal po'i chad pa yang mi 'byung ngo // gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nyen 'khor du yang nye bar mi 'gyur
462b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan de yang lus la btags pa'am/ yid kyis 'dzin pa 'am ngag du gdon pa 'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'om/ mchod rten gyi rtse mo la btags nas/ de thos pa dang de mthong ba tsam gyis de'i
462b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyi gzi brjid kyis rgyang grags kyi bar tshun chad du yang nye bar mi nus so// de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lha smos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis
462b4(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab pa rnams kyis rje su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ba'o// da ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ sems can gyi don la gsungs pa
462b5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ gnyis pa'i sems mang cing / nges par the tshom med do zhes bya ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la mi ma lags pa'i gnod pas thebs pa'i mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod na zhes bya
462b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ yul 'khor bsrung ba dang byad dang ro langs kyi nad kyis btab pa dang bsgoms nyes dang bri nyes la sogs pa gso ba dang / bkra mi shis pa bkra shis par byed pa dang / gzhan yang de la sogs pa thams cad la
463a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags te/ gzhan yang mkha' la rgyu ba'i yi dgas rnams bzlog pa'i cho ga yang dag par bshad par bya'o// lci ba chu dang bsres pa'i sa// dkyil 'khor yang dag byug par bya// nAd pa'i mdun du yang dag tu/
463a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gzhan yang mkhas pas shes// sa tshon lnga nI yang dag tu// rgyal byi'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par bris// dbusau su sna tshogs pad+ma la// phyi rim rdo rje ra ba ste// de phyir 'khor lo sna tshogs rtsibs// de phyir lha rnams zlum
463a3(rgyud 'grel): por bri// de yi phyi rim gru bzhi la// lha rnams pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad// tA ra bzhi yis yang dag brgyan// dra ba la sogs brgyan pa lnga// rin chen sna bdun gzhal yas khang // gdugs dang ba ngan da
463a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin brgyan// mdzes pas yang dag rnam par brgyanA// pad+ma 'khor lho lha rnams dang // ye shes lha dang 'jig rten lha gzhan yang gsungs pa de bzhin du// mkhas pa'i blo yis shes par bya// bzhi pa'i dbus su
463a5(rgyud 'grel): yang ngag tu// rnam par rgyal pa dbus su gzhag/ lto bA ldi ba rke ba ring // mchu 'phyangs mtshan ma legs pa la// nag pau ra ri rtsa ba spangs// de lta bu'i bum pa lnga// gu gulA la sogs bdug par byA// rin chen 'bru
463a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga snyan rdzi dang // dri lnga byang chub shing lnga dang // mgul chings dang ni gdugs dang mo// me tog phreng dang rin chen phreng // gzhan yang ji snyid yang dge brgyan// de bzhin rgya mo pa'i bum pa'i gzugs// gnas yas
463b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bzhag/ rims nad phyugs nad gang yin pa// de ni bkra shis la sogs dang // dbang bskur sbyin bsregs de bzhin te// lha dang rab gnas de bzhin shes// rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis// dkyil cho ga blo yis yang
463b2(rgyud 'grel): dag shes// gro gra shing shun dar sogs la// gur gum 'gi hang la sogs bri// phyi rim mu khyud ra po la// rgyal ba'i mtshan ni yang dag bri// dar gyi bcings pa'i pad+ma la// de steng phyag mtshan rgyas pa bri// ral gri skyabs sbyin
463b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen dang // rin chen steng du rdo rje gnas// zhabs pa lcags kyu bum pa dang // de snang rdo rje yang dag gnas// mtshams bzhi rdo rje rgya gram yin// be tsun dang ni ut+pal dang // pad+ma la sogs 'khor lo dang // gzhan yang
463b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan gang yod pa// mkhas pas brtag nAs b+hi bAr bya// de nas mu khyud zlum po la// rdo rje rgyu gum yang dag bri// rdo rje rgya bram bar du ni// las kyi snying po yang dag bri// phyag mtshan par du rdo rje rigs kyi yi ge dgod// de nas
463b5(rgyud 'grel): mu khyud gsum po la// sngar gsungs las kyi snying po bri// dri nas mu khyud 'khor lo bri// 'khor lor bri ba'i yi ge ni// rig sngags skyed byed yang dag tu// hUM dang phaT gyis rnam par brgyas// de nas mu khyud gsum po la// rig sngags
463b6(rgyud 'grel): snying po yang dag bri// de nas pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// yang snying snying po bri bar bya// de bzhin mu khyud bskor ba la// gzhan gyis mi thub snying po bri// de dbus yi ge gnas pa ni// bsil ba'i tshal gyi bskyed yid bri// yi ge'i
464a1(rgyud 'grel): nang du mkhas pas ni// yang dag gis ni bri bar bya// de bzhin rig sngags 'chang bris la// mgul lam phyoT sau Da gdags par bya// de bzhin btags par gyur na no// nad dang 'jigs pas mi tshugs te//
464a2(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan la sogs de bzhin du// mi rigs thams cad mi tshugaso// tshe ring sbrul bsngal thams cad med// ngan song gsum yang de bzhin no// rgyal ba'i bsrung ba yang dag tu// nga yis yang dag bshad par gyis// rdo rje ri
464a3(rgyud 'grel): rab gur dang ni// bla res sa gzhi dra ba dang // rdo rje'i rang bzhin shes par bya// de phyi me ri sna tshogs kyis// yang dag gis ni bskor ba'o// nad pa'i drung du dkyil 'khor 'di// de bzhin yang dag bri bar bya// ring bsring gdung
464a4(rgyud 'grel): rten lugs ma 'am// tsha tsha la sogs mchod rten gang // nang pa'i mdun du yang dag mchodade// rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal gyis gzungs// cho ga'i dus su yang dag gdon// bar gyis mi chod de bzhin du// bzlas pa la
464a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs de bzhin bya// phyogs skyong gza' dang rgyu skar dang // de bzhin 'byung po la sogs la// rjesu mthun par dbul bar bya// dri dang me tog spos dang ni// ar ka lA sogs yang dag dbul// de bzhin mkhas pas thun
464a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor du// yang rig gis ni do bul bar bya// ni pa la sogs khrus byas la// rig sngags gtad pa'i cho ga bya// dbang skur la sogs gzhan yang mthun// de bzhin sdom pa 'bog pa dang // gzhan yang la sogs
464b1(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa ste// de bzhin la sogs byas nas ni// gang yang las kyang 'grub par 'gyur// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi// dkyil 'khor dang bsrung ba bshad pa'i gnas skabs te/ dgu pa'o//
464b2(rgyud 'grel): de myur ba kho nar bde legs dang nang ma mchis pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs pas bsrung ba byas na// sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad kyang de bzhino//
464b3(rgyud 'grel): bde bar 'gyur zhing thar par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ tshe da lho dang phyi ma la yang bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar pa'o// mi ma lags pa de rnams de la log pa mi bgyid cing /
464b4(rgyud 'grel): myur du mchi bar 'gyur lags te zhes bya ba ni/ 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag rnams la 'byung po de rnams grogs mi byed na/ 'byung po de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmyod mos sdug bsngal drag po 'thob par 'gyur
464b5(rgyud 'grel): ro/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o// bsil ba tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni/ de ltar don che ba lagaso zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
464b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la/ sems can rnams la bde bar rnam par byas shing tshe da ltar dang phyi ma'i sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam dge snyen ma gang la la sogs
465a1(rgyud 'grel): niHyang nas yang du bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po bzhis zhu ba 'bul ba ste/ de yang 'khor bzhi'i don la zhu ba 'bul ba'o// bsil pa'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ grong
465a2(rgyud 'grel): ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/ de la sogs pa la yod pa tsam gyis kyang 'jigs pa thams cad 'bral bar 'gyur te/ 'chang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mgul du btags nas gus par byas par gyur na/ rig
465a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i nus pas sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur te/ tshe nga lha dang tshe phyi ma de bzhin no// brjod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ klog pa dang bsgom pa rje su yi rang ba de lo bshad par byed pa/ de la
465a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa byas par gyur na/ de bzhin du sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro// kun chub par bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi sems can gyi don la khyab pa'o//
465a5(rgyud 'grel): yang na rig pa ni na mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste/ sems can gyi don la khyab pa'o// sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/
465a6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di ni rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o// de dag gi gang zag ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing de bzhin du gsum du yin no// dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge
465b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin rnams// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gnas du mchis nas/ ming smos par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/ mi ma yin pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang / tshes brgyad dam/ bcu dgu 'am/ nya 'am/ stong la sogs pa la/ rgyal po
465b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po bzhi dang / de bzhin du byas par gyur na/ gdug pa can gyi gnod sbyin rnams kyang dang par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya ba ni/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang /
465b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di la 'chang bar 'gyur na/ dod par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don yang thob par 'gyur ro// dge slong ngam zhes bya ba nas/ dge bsnyen ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi la yang bsil ba tshal gyi mdo 'dis
465b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar 'gyur ro// che ge mo zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad ngo // yang na ni gang zag sems can 'di 'chang ba'o// btsun pa
465b5(rgyud 'grel): ma ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la yang nas yang du zhus pa'o// dang pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams/ rgyal po'i pho brang lhung lo can du mchis nas zhes bya ba
465b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sngon du bshad pa bzhin du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di'i bka' bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po de/ mchod pa byas na/ nang thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun du/
466a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin rnams 'dus shing / 'byung po thams cad tshogs pa'i nang du yang // bsgrags nas zhes bya ba ni// gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / bgegs
466a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs stong phrag brgya cu rnams kyi mdun du/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di bsgrags na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur// der de dag mngon par dga' bar 'gyur to zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi
466a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de rnams kyis kyang grogs byed par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni ngo ltar don tshon pa lagaso zhes bya ba ni
466a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// yang dag pa'i don thob ste/ mi'i yul du skye bar gyur nas kyang / chos 'di dang mi 'bral ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don la rgyal po
466a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po bzhis yang nas yang du zhu ba phul ba'o// dge slong dum zhes bya ba la stsogs pa ni/ sde pa bzhi dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa lnga'i// sde pa bzhi ni/ phal chen pa dang / thams cang yod
466a6(rgyud 'grel): par smra ba dang / gnas brtan pa dang / mang po skur pa'i sde'o// mi dge ba bcu ni/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / rdzun du sme ba dang / tshig rtsub mo dang / ngag 'khyal pa dang /
466b1(rgyud 'grel): phra ma'o// brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o// dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa lnga ni/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / chang dang lnga
466b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di bton pa tsam gyis kyang / de rnams kyi sdom pa nyams kyang / de'i sdig pa las thar par 'gyur ro// chang mi btung ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin du mchi ba dang / zhes bya ba
466b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ chang mi 'byung ba ni/ sgrog pa dang / sha dang / bud med dang lA stsogs pa bkag pa kri ya'i gzhung // dran pa ni rig sngags 'di 'dra ba ste/ de 'dra ba tsam gyis kyang zas nyams pa lngas kyang thar par 'gyur ro//
466b4(rgyud 'grel): shes bzhin du mchis pa ni/ sdig pa'i rang bzhin du mchis pa ni/ sdig pa'i rang bzhin du shes pa yin te/ de bzhin du shes pa'i rang bzhin yang shes pa'o// dge dang mi dges mi tshugs shing // de dran pa tsam
466b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis thar par 'gyur ro// zas rnam pa lnga la 'di lta ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi zhus pa'o// pu ram dang sbrang rtsi dang / til dang shA dang / nya sha rnam yongasu spangs par bgyi'o//
466b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi zas yino// de yang sdig par 'gyur ba'i zas yin pas/ bu ram ni 'bu rnams kyi zas yin no// sbrang rtsi ni bum pa'i zas so// til ni srog chags rnams kyi zas so// sha ni
467a1(rgyud 'grel): srog gcad pas sdig pas sdig par 'gyur zas so// nya sha yang de bzhin no// de'i phyir na zas rnam pa lnga yongasu spang ba'o zhes gsungs pa'o// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni zas lnga po de sdig par
467a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis zhu ba'i phyir bos pa'o// gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams zhes bya ba ni/ zas rnam pa lnga po de spangs par
467a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur na/ dbug tshad lnga brgya'i nang tshun chad du gdon rnams kyis mi tshugaso// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni/ bye ba khrag khrig gi gA rlung gi bye ma snyed/ kyis/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang
467a4(rgyud 'grel): rjesuM yi rang ste/ de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rje su yi rang pa ste/ de rnams bka' bden pas sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o// de dag gzhom pa'i
467a5(rgyud 'grel): slad du yi ngam 'di bgyi 'tshal lagaso// zhes bya ba ni/ de ltar gyi shAkya thub pas gsungs te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed cing 'khor ba las thar te/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don thob nas/ rig pa'i
467a6(rgyud 'grel): don gyi rjesu 'brang ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sems can gyi don du yang nas yang du zhu ba'o// dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas dge snyen ma gang la la zhes bya
467b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ sems can thams cad do// bsil ba tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad bsil bar byed pa'o// 'dzin pa zhes bya ba
467b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa ni/ dad par byas shing rje su yid dang par gyur na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ sems can thams cad thar pa thob pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'o// bsil ba'i tshal
467b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdo chen po 'di de ltar don che ba lagaso zhes bya ba ni/ na mkha' bzhin du khyab pa ste/ me long gi gzugs bsnyen bzhin du sgyur mar snang bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la khyab pa'o//
467b4(rgyud 'grel): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan mu stegs can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bdud kyi rigs sdig can/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i lta ba log pa'i rigs/ de rnams kyi don mi 'grub cing the tshom gyis dus su yang 'phom
467b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir na mdo 'di la dad pa la don che bo'o// mi mu lags pa rnams kyis bar ma ngor 'gum pa dang zhes bya bu la sogs pa ni/ 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de la/ chu dang me dang / rkun ma dang / choms
467b6(rgyud 'grel): rkun dang / seng+ge dang / glang po che dang / dug dang / thog dang / rgyal po'i chang pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa yin te/ yang na ni mi rig pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis rims kyi bsad pa'o// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ zhes bya ba ni/
468a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa de rnams klag par byed pa'o// de ni de dag la gnod par 'tshal ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa ni bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams glags tshol te/ gang zag de gus par gyur na//
468a2(rgyud 'grel): glags mi rnyed cing bar du gcod par mi nus so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na sems can rnams bsrung ba dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ snying rje che zhing / sems can thams cad la byams pas
468a3(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di chad pa thams cad dang bral zhing bde bar gnas pa'o// de nas zhes pa ni/ bsil ba tshal gyi yon tan bshad pa de naso// rgyal po chen po bzhis tshig
468a4(rgyud 'grel): su bcang de gsol ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi phan yon rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigasu bcad de bshad pa'o// mi mchog gang zhig mdo 'di dag/ yongasu rdzogs pas
468a5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ gling bzhi na gnas pa'i 'jig rten 'di gang zag gang gis kyang gus par byas shing 'chang ba de dag la bsrung ba gzhan gyi mtshungs pa mdo// bde legs bgyid pa de la ni/ srin
468a6(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyang 'tshe mi bgyid// ces bya ba ni/ gzi brjid che zhing stobs dang ldan te/ tshe phyi ma yang ngan song gsum las grol zhing / de ltar yang dpal dang ldan te/ de de dag 'dzin pa'i gang zag yang dag pa'i
468b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub thob pa'o// yang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po na yod pa'i bgegs rnams kyis kyang / 'tshe bar mi nus shing / srin po rnams kyang lha ci smos pa'o// su yang rung ste mdo 'di dag/ mi mchog gis ni gsungs
468b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// zhes bya ba ni lha 'am/ mi 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ yi dgas la sogs pa gang zag 'di la gus par byas pa de la sogs pa'i sems can gzhan la yang / phan thogs pa ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
468b3(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / kun skyob dang / log par dang sel dang / gser thugs dang / 'od srung rnams kyis kyang bsrungs pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsrung ste/ de yang phyag na
468b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyuraro// da ltar yang sems can gyi don la/ rig sngags la rje su yi rang zhing bsrungs pa'o//
468b5(rgyud 'grel): yongasu rdzogs shing ma chad par shin tu tshang bar 'chung bgyid pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtun dang / shes rab la sogs pa yongasu rdzogs
468b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ de yang de'i 'khor gsum dag pas 'chang ba'o// yang na pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de la gnod sbyin yi dgas dang / 'byung po grul bum srin
469a1(rgyud 'grel): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams kyis kyang / rig sngags 'di la rjes su yi rang bstan pa bsrung ba ste/ 'di la tshig gcig kyang smras par 'gyur na/ 'byung po rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang
469a2(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'o// smyo byed rgyu ba klu rnams dang / de lta bu dag 'tshe mi bgyid// ces bya ba ni/ smyo byed kyi gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod de/ de bzhin du klu'i gi don yang yin no// de rnams kyis srong tho rangs nams
469a3(rgyud 'grel): phyed la rgyu zhing / sems cini rnams la tshe bar byed pa'o// de rnams kyis kyang mi tshug sau shing / sems can rnams la bde bar byed pa'o// de la mi mA l-ig snga dang gdon// myur du mgum du 'chi bar 'gyur/ yang dag
469a4(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi dmong mos mtsho bar byed pa'i 'byung po de rnams mgo tshal po brgyar 'gas shing / 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi ma thag tu mnga' 'phangs pa bzhin
469a5(rgyud 'grel): du mnar med par skye'o// de la ces kyang mi tshugs ste/ de la rtse bar yang mi nus zhes bya ba ni u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin/ shin tu dkon pa/ rigs sngags kyi rgyalu mi 'di yang mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ste/ 'di'i
469a6(rgyud 'grel): nus pas gang gis kyang tshe bar mi nus pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi po yis// bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes brjod de/ zhes bya ba ni stong phrag nyi shu rtse brgyad kyi dri za rnams dang / de bzhin du grul bum dang /
469b1(rgyud 'grel): klu dang gan+d+hong sbyin rnamaso// de rnams kyi gdon gyis kyang 'tshe bar mi nus shing / phyogs rnams kyang bsrung par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// de nyid du ni mi snang 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni/ ngur
469b2(rgyud 'grel): khrod bsil ba'i tshal du/ bcom ldan 'das lta bar chod byed cing glags lha ba rnams glags mi rnyed cing / bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas na/ sems can la 'tsho bar mi byed cing / mi snang bar
469b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'o// de nas zhes pa ni/ tshig su bcad pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das te zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba bsil ba'i tshal gyi nang na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi dang
469b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bzhugs pa'i namA la 'das pa'o// nam langs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bzhugs tau/ zhes bya ba ni/ rnam rtog gsum dang bral ba'i dur khrod bsil bya'i tshul gyi dbus su
469b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi dang bcas pa'o// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus su/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
469b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o// dge slong dag mdangs gsum dag rgyal po chen po bzhi bu dang bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'khor rnams dur khrod
470a1(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i tshal du 'ongs te/ de dag gis kyang glags tshol ba ste/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ glags tshol mi nus par gnas pa'o// nga'i rkang pa la
470a2(rgyud 'grel): mgo bos phyag 'tshal tA/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi dang 'byung po de rnams kyis/ bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal la rje su
470a3(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ba'o// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni rgyal po bzhi dang / 'byung po thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'khod/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhis nga'i thad du bsil ba'i tshal
470a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mdo chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi la bka' stsol zhing / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi don yang dag par bstan pa'o// khyed kyis de dag legs
470a5(rgyud 'grel): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas bshad do zhes bye ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// rig pa mthar thug pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
470a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'o// btsun pa de ltar 'tshalo zhes gsol to// zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis
470b1(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsalnga pa mnyan nas zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rigs sngags kyi rgyal po 'di la rje su yi rang zhing / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / bsgom pa la sogs pa byas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la
470b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni/ chang pa med cing tshog lnga yang ba/ khyab pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa/ rig pa phyi nang yang dag par bstan pa/ thabs shes rab gnyisu med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsol nas/
470b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gzhonu sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyas par bka' stsal te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas kun dga' bos sdus pa'o//
470b4(rgyud 'grel): dge slong dang zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa nyis brgya lnga bcu'o// dge slong ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa'o// dge bsnyen dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po ma skyes dgra la sogs pa'o// dge
470b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen ma de dag yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni/ ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo la sogs pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rdza su yi rang ba'o// gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnam
470b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / rnaganas gtsang ma'i lha rnams dang / gzhon yang lha dang / lha ma yin la sogs pas rjesu yi rang ba'o// rigs kyi rgyal mo bsil ba tshal gyi mdo'i 'bum 'grel/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po las kyi rdo rjes
471a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ba rdzogaso// // smon lam stobs kyi grong khyer mu gyer btsas// mkhas par grags pa'i mi mnyam rdo rje'i sras// skye ba lnga brgyar sbyangs pa'i 'bras bu yis// rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la ma rmongs
471a2(rgyud 'grel): shing // gsang sngags gdams pa ma lus thugs la mnga' ba can// mtshan yang don yod rdo rje zhes par grags// sngon gyi smon+da lam dbang gis bong yul dbusu byon// smon lam stobs kyis dam pa 'bri lo'i bla mar gyur//
471a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzas gling byang phyogs brag dmar dpal gyi bsam ya su// rgyal po khyad par 'phags khri pa'i rdung rgyud sras// lha gcig khyad par 'phags pa lha tsam dar sgron gyis// bkra shis pho brang rje lung dgon pa ru// lo
471a4(rgyud 'grel): pa Na zhabs ni btogs nas dam chos 'di bsgyur ba// bsgyur ba'i bsod nams gang thob bsags pa des// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can kun// bla med byang chub myur du thob par shog/
471a5(rgyud 'grel): // bsod naman bas rgyas kyis mtshon ma gyur 'gro ba'i yis// tshe rabs du mar bsalas pa'i sdig grib ma lus kun// dug 'dis drug lnga'i me lce chu yis bcil babanan// ring min byang ru stong bri dzin 'phang myur thob shog/ ces mi dbang po lnga bas b+ha
471a6(rgyud 'grel): gas tshig zib gyi sbyin lam bam // bkris/ dge'o//
